SourceText:
By clicking in the button below you will unlock all the workshops.

NOTE: Users should not use this functionality to unlock workshops, this is not recommended unless strictly necessary.
text:
Ngokuchofoza inkinobho engezansi uzovula konke ukuqeqeshwa.

PHAWULA: Abasebenzisi akufanele basebenzise lokhu ukuze bavule ukuqeqeshwa, lokhu akutuswa ngaphandle uma kudingeka ngempela.

SourceText: Unlock workshops

SourceText: All workshops are now unlocked.
text: Konke ukuqeqeshwa sekuvuliwe manje.

SourceText:
By clicking in the button below you will reset the app to its initial settings. 

This means that all your progress and usage data will be deleted and your app will work as if it was just installed for the first time.

NOTE: Resetting the app is permanent and you will not be able to recover any information.
text:
Ngokuchofoza inkinobho engezansi uzosetha kabusha i-app ibuyele kumasethingi ayo asekuqaleni. 

Lokhu kusho ukuthi yonke imininingwane yakho yentuthuko nokusebenzisa izosuswa futhi i-app yakho izoba sengathi isanda kufakwa.

PHAWULA: Ukuhlela kabusha i-app akubuyiseleki emuva futhi ngeke ukwazi ukuthola noma yimiphi imininingwane ekade ikuyo.

SourceText: UNICEF Website

SourceText:
Parenting during COVID is hard. Be proud of yourself for making it this far.

We are working on new content here to support you with talking to your teens and children about COVID.

The most up to date information on COVID-19 can be found on the WHO and UNICEF websites:
text:
Ukuba umzali ngesikhathi se-COVID kunzima. Ziqhenye ngokuthi ukwazile ukuhamba uze ufike kuleli qophelo.

Sibhala izinto ezintsha lapha ukuze sikusize ukwazi ukukhuluma nezingane zakho ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili nezisencane nge-COVID.

Imininingwane yakamuva mayelana ne-COVID-19 itholakala kuwebusayithi ye-WHO neye-UNICEF:

SourceText: Tell us about your issue
text: Sitshele ngenkinga yakho

SourceText: The first time my mother asked me if I wanted to spend time with her, I told her to leave me alone because I was in the middle of a game. But she insisted like she always does. I said she could watch me playing if that's what she wanted. After a few minutes she started asking me questions about the game. It was annoying at the beginning, but after a while I was happy that she was finally interested in what I was doing. She even gave it a try!
text: Ngesikhathi umama eqala ukungibuza ukuthi ngiyafuna yini ukuchitha isikhathi naye, ngamtshela ukuthi angiyeke ngoba ngangisadlala umdlalo wami. Kodwa waphoqa njengoba ehlala enza. Ngamtshela ukuthi angangibukela njengoba ngidlala uma kuyilokho akufunayo. Ngemva kwemizuzu embalwa waqala ukungibuza imibuzo ngomdlalo. Kwakucasula ekuqaleni, kodwa ngemva kwesikhathi ngase ngijabule ngoba ekugcineni wayebonisa ukuthi uyayithanda into engiyenzayo. Waze ngisho wacela nokudlala!

SourceText: My father told me I’m playing too much basketball after school, so we must set a family rule. He promised we'll think about a solution together, so we both feel good about it. I didn't believe it's possible but said, “OK, let's try”. We negotiated and agreed that the rule will be playing basketball is allowed after doing homework and until family dinner. It is hard for me to see my friends playing after school, so I'm doing my best to finish homework first and join them. I also have now the whole evening to do other things I want after the family dinner like watching basketball in the NBA.
text: Ubaba wangitshela ukuthi ngidlala ngokweqile i-basketball ngemva kwesikole, ngakho kumelwe kubekwe umthetho womndeni. Wangithembisa ukuthi sizocabanga ngesixazululo ndawonye, ukuze sizijabulise sobabili. Ngangingacabangi ukuthi lokho kungenzeka kodwa ngathi, “KULUNGILE, ake sizame”. Sabonisana sabe sesivumelana ngokuthi umthetho uzoba ukuthi kuvumelekile ukudlala i-basketball ngemva kokwenza umsebenzi wasekhaya kuze kube isikhathi sesidlo sakusihlwa njengomndeni. Kunzima kimi ukubona abangane bami bedlala lapho isikole siphuma, ngakho ngenza okusemandleni ami ukuba ngiqede umsebenzi wasekhaya kuqala bese ngiyahamba ngiyodlala nabo. Manje senginesikhathi sonke kusihlwa sokwenza ezinye izinto engifuna ukuzenza ngemva kokudla isidlo sakusihlwa njengomndeni njengokubukela i-basketball ku-NBA.

SourceText: Your goal was to spend one-on-one time with your teen.
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukuchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: DAY – Do it every day
text: USUKU – Kwenze nsuku zonke

SourceText: PLAY – Let your teen choose the activity
text: DLALA – Vumela ingane yakho ikhethe enizokwenza

SourceText: STAY – Give your teen all of your attention
text: HLALA – Nikeza ingane yakho sonke isikhathi sakho

SourceText: Why was this tip helpful for you?
text: Kungani leli cebiso libe usizo kuwe?

SourceText: "@local.choice_1" was helpful because...
text: "@local.choice_1" libe usizo ngoba...
note: The string @local.choice_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: "@local.choice_2" was helpful because...
text: "@local.choice_2" libe usizo ngoba...
note: The string @local.choice_2 should not be translated.

SourceText: "@local.choice_3" was helpful because...
text: "@local.choice_3" libe usizo ngoba...
note: The string @local.choice_3 should not be translated.

SourceText: Having a specific time to do this helps me to remember.
text: Ukuba nesikhathi esiqondile sokwenza lokhu kungisiza ngikhumbule.

SourceText: With a routine, my teen and I can both keep our schedule free.
text: Lapho kunenqubo elandelwayo, mina nengane yami siyakwazi ukuhlala sinesikhathi esivulekile.

SourceText: Spending time with my teen every day helps to build trust with them/him/her.
text: Ukuchitha isikhathi nsuku zonke nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kusiza ekwakheni ukwethembana phakathi kwami nayo/nazo.

SourceText: Ah yes, even 10 minutes together makes a big difference – that makes it easy to schedule it in, next to your work and chores!
text: Yebo, ngisho nemizuzu engu-10 nindawonye yenza umehluko omkhulu – lokho kwenza kube lula ukuhlela, phakathi komsebenzi wakho wokuziphilisa nemisebenzi yasekhaya!

SourceText: Letting my teen choose what to do builds their confidence.
text: Ukuvumela ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikhethe esizokwenza kwakha ukuzethemba kwayo.

SourceText: If my teen chooses, s/he is more likely to want to spend time together.
text: Uma ingane yami ikhetha, maningi amathuba okuthi izofuna ukuchitha isikhathi nami.

SourceText: Letting my teen choose shows that I care about his/her interests.
text: Ukuvumela ingane yami ikhethe kubonisa ukuthi nginendaba nezinto ezithandayo.

SourceText: By accepting my teen’s suggestions, I show that I listen to him/her.
text: Ngokwamukela imibono yengane yami, ngibonisa ukuthi ngiyayilalela.

SourceText: Saying something nice about my teen’s choice helps them feel valued.
text: Ukusho into enhle ngalokho ingane ekukhethile kuyenza izizwe ibhekwa njengebalulekile.

SourceText: So true! And if our teens choose, they are encouraged to also take responsibility in other areas of their lives.
text: Kuyiqiniso ngempela! Uma izingane zethu ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili zikhetha, zisuke zikhuthazwa nokuba zizimele nakwezinye izici zokuphila kwazo.

SourceText: By preventing interruptions, I show my teen that s/he is most important.
text: Ngokugwema iziphazamiso, ngibonisa ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi ibaluleke kakhulu.

SourceText: Even if I can’t join my teen’s activity, like sports, I can still cheer them on.
text: Ngisho noma ngingeke ngikwazi ukuhlanganyela kulokho okwenziwa yingane, njengezemidlalo, ngiyakwazi ukuqhubeka ngiyigqugquzela.

SourceText: When I pay attention, I can learn so much about my teen’s interests, views and abilities.
text: Lapho nginakisisa, kuningi engingakufunda ngalokho okuthandwa yingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi, imibono kanye namakhono ayo.

SourceText: Yes! If we give our teens our full attention, they will more likely do the same for us the next time we ask them for something!
text: Yebo! Uma izingane zethu sizinikeza isikhathi sethu sonke, cishe ziyokwenza okufanayo kithi esikhathini esizayo lapho sicela okuthile kuzo!

SourceText:
Many parents experience challenges in having one-on-one time with their teens. 

Here are the top 8 challenges parents told us they experience when planning or spending one-on-one time with their teen. If you experienced one of these or are afraid that you will, tap it to get a possible solution. You can tap and explore other challenges afterwards.
text:
Abazali abaningi babhekana nezinselele zokuchitha isikhathi nezingane zabo ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. 

Nazi izinselele ezingu-8 eziphezulu abazali abasitshele ukuthi babhekana nazo lapho behlela noma bechitha isikhathi nezingane zabo ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Uma uye wabhekana nokuthile kulokhu noma uma wesaba ukuthi uzobhekana nakho, kuchofoze ukuze uthole isixazululo. Ungakuchofoza bese uhlola ezinye izinselele kamuva.

SourceText: Did you have any challenges when trying to spend time with your teen?
text: Ingabe zikhona izinselele obe nazo ngesikhathi uzama ukuchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili?

SourceText: What challenge did you have when trying to spend time with your teen?
text: Iyiphi inselele obe nayo ngesikhathi uzama ukuchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili?

SourceText: I don’t have enough time.
text: Anginaso isikhathi esanele.

SourceText: My teen does not want to spend time with me.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ayifuni ukuchitha isikhathi nami.

SourceText: My teen only wants to watch TV or play on his/her phone.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ifuna kuphela ukubukela i-TV noma ukudlala ngomakhalekhukhwini wayo.

SourceText: My teen wants to do things that are not safe or that cost money.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ifuna ukwenza izinto ezingaphephile noma ezidla imali.

SourceText: My teen wants to do things that I cannot physically do.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ifuna ukwenza izinto engihluleka ukuzenza mina.

SourceText: My teen chose a competitive activity. I won and s/he got angry.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikhethe into encintisanayo. Ngiye ngaphumelela kodwa ingane yami yathukuthela.

SourceText: I struggled to end the one-on-one time.
text: Ngikuthole kunzima ukuqeda isikhathi ebengisichitha nengane.

SourceText: All my children want one-on-one time with me at the same time.
text: Zonke izingane zami zifuna ukuchitha isikhathi nami ngesikhathi esifanayo.

SourceText: Yes, it can be really hard to find time during the day, with work, chores, and everything else.
text: Yebo, kungaba nzima kakhulu ukuthola isikhathi phakathi nosuku, ngenxa yomsebenzi wokuziphilisa, imisebenzi yasekhaya kanye nakho konke okunye.

SourceText: Sorry that you struggled with that. It can make us feel bad if our children do not want to spend one-on-one time with us.
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuthi ukuthole kunzima lokho. Kungasenza sizizwe kabi uma izingane zethu zingafuni ukuchitha isikhathi nathi.

SourceText: Think of a time when my teen is more open to me, like in the morning or right before bedtime.
text: Ngicabanga ngesikhathi lapho ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikhululeke kakhudlwana kimi, njengasekuseni noma ngaphambi kokuba ilale.

SourceText: Sit next to my teen when they are doing something they enjoy and show interest in what they like.
text: Ngihlala eduze kwengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili lapho yenza into eyijabulelayo futhi ngibonise ukuthi nginothando lwento ethandwa yingane.

SourceText: Do something fun with the whole family.
text: Yenza okuthile okumnandi nomndeni wonke.

SourceText: Great! Picking a time when your teen is more talkative will help them to respond well to your attempt to connect.
text: Kuhle! Ukukhetha isikhathi lapho khona ingane eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikhuluma kakhulu khona kuzoyisiza isabele kahle emizamweni yakho yokuxhumana nayo.

SourceText: Nice! Watching your teen’s favourite T.V. show or sports match together will show them that you care. Just be patient; they will open up to you over time!
text: Kuhle! Ukubukela uhlelo lwe-TV noma lwezemidlalo oluthandwa ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kuzoyibonisa ukuthi unendaba nayo. Yiba nesineke; izokhululeka ngokuhamba kwesikhathi!

SourceText: Perfect! Sometimes it can be easier to start with spending time with the whole family. That way your teen can get more comfortable with spending one-on-one time with you over time.
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ngezinye izikhathi kungaba lula ukuqala ngokuchitha isikhathi nomndeni wonke. Ngaleyo ndlela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili izokwazi ukukhululeka lapho ichitha isikhathi nawe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

SourceText: Sorry that you had that challenge. Children often want to spend time watching T.V. or playing with a gadget. Well done for being patient with your teen!
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuthi ube naleyo nselele. Ngokuvamile izingane zifuna ukuchitha isikhathi zibukela i-TV noma zidlala ngemishini yezobuchwepheshe. Siyakuhalalisela ngokuba nesineke nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili!

SourceText: Suggest fun things my teen and I could do together.
text: Sikisela izinto ezimnandi mina nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili esingazenza ndawonye.

SourceText: Find something educational to do with my teen on the gadget.
text: Thola okuthile okufundisayo ongakwenza nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili emshinini wezobuchwepheshe.

SourceText: Ask my teen to show me how their phone/gadget works.
text: Cela ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba ingibonise indlela umakhalekhukhwini/umshini wayo wezobuchwepheshe osebenza ngayo.

SourceText: That's perfect! If you need inspiration, here are some ideas from other families of what you could do together. Remember, let your teen choose.
text: Kuhle lokho! Uma udinga isikhuthazo, nanka amacebiso athile avela kweminye imindeni alokho eningakwenza ndawonye. Khumbula, vumela ingane yakho eneminyaka eyishumi nambili ukuba ikhethe.

SourceText: Wonderful!  There are lots of fun and educational apps on phones that you can explore together. Ask questions, show interest, and remember to say something nice.
text: Kuhle kakhulu!  Kunama-apps amaningi amnandi nafundisayo komakhalekhukhwini eningawahlola ndawonye. Buza imibuzo, bonisa uthando bese ukhumbula ukusho into enhle.

SourceText: Nice! Teens love it when you show interest in their gadget and when they get to explain something they know to you. This is a great starting point!
text: Kuhle! Izingane ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ziyajabula lapho ubonisa isifiso sokwazi ngomshini wazo wezobuchwepheshe nalapho zithola ithuba lokukuchazela okuthile ezikwaziyo. Lesi yisiqalo esihle!

SourceText: You are not alone here. Many parents sometimes have this challenge, too. One-on-one time should always be safe, and it does not have to cost a thing!
text: Awuwedwa lapha. Abazali abaningi ngezinye izikhathi nabo baba nale nselele. Ukuchitha isikhathi ndawonye kumelwe kuhlale kuphephile, futhi akudingeki kudle imali!

SourceText: Explain to my teen why their suggestion is not safe or possible and ask them for other ideas.
text: Ukuchazela ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi kungani umbono wayo ungaphephile noma ungenakwenzeka futhi uyicele ukuba icabange okunye okuhlukile.

SourceText: Suggest other fun activities that we could do together.
text: Sikisela ezinye izinto ezimnandi eningazenza ndawonye.

SourceText: Awesome! It is very important that your teen understands why you cannot do the activity that they suggested. Ask them for other ideas!
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iqonde ukuthi kungani ungeke ukwazi ukwenza into eziyisikisele. Yicele ukuba ize neminye imibono!

SourceText: This is perfect! If you need any inspiration, you can find suggestions for activities @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text. Remember, let your teen choose the activity!
text: Lokhu kuhle kakhulu! Uma udinga noma yisiphi isikhuthazo, ungathola amacebiso ezinto ongazenza @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text. Khumbula, vumela ingane yakho ikhethe enizokwenza!
note: The string @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text should not be translated.

SourceText: Sorry to hear this. Our teens may be disappointed if we cannot do what they want to do, like playing sports or doing other physically demanding activities. But remember, what is most important is that we spend time with them. That looks different for everyone!
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuzwa lokhu. Izingane zethu ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili zingase zidumale uma singakwazi ukwenza lokho ezifuna ukukwenza, njengokudlala ezemidlalo noma ukwenza ezinye izinto ezikhandla umzimba. Kodwa khumbula ukuthi okubaluleke kakhulu ukuchitha isikhathi nazo. Lokho kuhlukile kuwo wonke umuntu!

SourceText: Watch my teen do the activity and cheer them on.
text: Bukela ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili yenza okuthile futhi ngiyigqugquzele.

SourceText: Suggest other fun activities we can do together.
text: Sikisela ezinye izinto ezimnandi eningazenza ndawonye.

SourceText: Wonderful! Even if you are watching instead of doing the activity together, you can show your interest by describing and praising what your teen is doing!
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ngisho noma kuthiwa ubukele esikhundleni sokwenza lokho ndawonye, ungabonisa ukuthi uyakuthanda lokho ngokuchaza nokuncoma lokho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ekwenzayo!

SourceText: That’s perfect! If you need any inspiration, you can find suggestions for activities @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text. Remember, let your teen choose the activity!
text: Kuhle kakhulu lokho! Uma udinga noma yisiphi isikhuthazo, ungathola amacebiso ezinto ongazenza @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text. Khumbula, vumela ingane yakho ikhethe enizokwenza!
note: The string @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text should not be translated.

SourceText: This sometimes happens! Competitive games can be challenging for teens (and adults!) if they have difficulty with losing.
text: Lokhu kuyenzeka ngezinye izikhathi! Imidlalo yokuncintisana ingaba yinselele ezinganeni ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili (kanye nakubantu abadala!) uma zinenkinga nokungaphumeleli.

SourceText: Suggest other activities that we can do together instead of against each other.
text: Sikisela ezinye izinto eningazenza ndawonye esikhundleni sokuncintisana.

SourceText: Play the activity in teams, so I can encourage my teen if our team loses.
text: Dlalani imidlalo ngamaqembu, ukuze ngikwazi ukukhuthaza ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili uma iqembu lethu lidliwa.

SourceText: Remember, let your teen choose! You can find suggestions for activities you could do with your teen @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text, if you need it.
text: Khumbula, vumela ingane yakho eneminyaka eyishumi nambili ukuba ikhethe! Ungathola amacebiso ezinto ongazenza nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text, uma uwadinga.
note: The string @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text should not be translated.

SourceText: If you and your teen are in the same team, you can help them manage their emotions if your team loses.
text: Uma wena nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili niseqenjini elilodwa, ungayisiza ilawule imizwelo yayo uma iqembu lenu lidliwa.

SourceText: Yes, the end of one-on-one time can sometimes be difficult.
text: Yebo, ukuphela kwesikhathi osichitha nengane yakho kungase kube nzima ngezinye izikhathi.

SourceText: Say to my teen, “We have one minute before the end of one-on-one time today”, so my teen is prepared.
text: Ngithi enganeni yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, “Kusele umzuzu owodwa ngaphambi kokuba isikhathi sethu esisichitha ndawonye siphele namuhla”, ukuze ingane yami ikulungele.

SourceText: Inform my teen of how much time I have for one-on-one time and ask them to keep track on a clock or watch.
text: Ngitshela ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi kusele isikhathi esingakanani esisichitha ndawonye bese ngiyicela ukuba ibheke isikhathi isho lapho siphela.

SourceText: Plan one-on-one time right before another activity that my teen enjoys.
text: Hlela isikhathi esisichitha ndawonye ngaphambi nje kwenye into ethandwa yingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: Wonderful! By giving your teen a heads-up, the end of one-on-one time will not come as a surprise. Also, you can remind your teen that you will spend time together again tomorrow.
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ngokunikeza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili isixwayiso kusengaphambili, isikhathi sokuphela kwenkathi yokuchitha isikhathi ndawonye ngeke sibe yinto engalindelekile. Ungaphinde ukhumbuze ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi nizophinde nichithe isikhathi ndawonye kusasa.

SourceText: Great! That way your teen has the responsibility to monitor the time and will be aware when time is almost up. Remind them that you will spend time together again tomorrow.
text: Kuhle! Ngaleyo ndlela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iba nomthwalo wokuqapha isikhathi futhi izobona ukuthi isikhathi sekusele kancane siphele. Yikhumbuze ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi nizophinde nichithe isikhathi ndawonye kusasa.

SourceText: Wonderful! If you spend time together right before dinner, you can happily say, “one-on-one time is over. Let’s get ready for dinner with the rest of the family!”
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Uma nichitha isikhathi ndawonye ngaphambi kokuba nidle isidlo sakusihlwa, ungathi ngenjabulo, “inkathi yokuchitha isikhathi ndawonye iphelile. Masilungele ukudla isidlo sakusihlwa nawo wonke umndeni!”

SourceText: Many parents face this. It can be difficult to spend one-on-one time with our teens when we have more than one child.
text: Abazali abaningi babhekana nalokhu. Kungaba nzima ukuchitha isikhathi nezingane zethu uma sinezingane eziningi.

SourceText: Ask another adult or older sibling to look after the younger children during the one-on-one time with my teen.
text: Cela omunye umuntu omdala noma umuntu ozalwa naye ukuba anakekele ingane esencane ngesikhathi ngichitha isikhathi nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: Think of a time when the other children are not around and spend time with my teen then.
text: Cabanga ngesikhathi lapho ezinye izingane zisuke zingekho bese ngichitha isikhathi nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: Plan one-on-one time in a place other than at home.
text: Hlela ukuchitha isikhathi nengane kwenye indawo ngaphandle kwasekhaya.

SourceText: Perfect! This way, you can give your undivided attention to your teen, so they feel valued and loved.
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ngale ndlela ungakwazi ukunaka ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka.

SourceText: Great! You can try spending time with your teen when the other children have already gone to bed, or are playing outside.
text: Kuhle! Ungazama ukuchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili lapho ezinye izingane sezilele noma lapho zidlala ngaphandle.

SourceText: Wonderful! Maybe you can walk to the shops together or go watch a sports match, so you can chat without having the other children demand your attention.
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Mhlawumbe ningahamba ndawonye niye ezitolo noma nihambe niyobukela ezemidlalo, ukuze nixoxe ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa ezinye izingane ezisuke zifuna ukunakwa nazo.

SourceText: Your goal was to introduce ONE positive consequence (for your teen taking responsibility) and ONE negative consequence (for your teen breaking a household rule). You tapped the @data.habit.consequence.in_text_title - great job for remembering!
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukwethula umphumela omuhle OWODWA (lapho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili izimela) kanye nomphumela ongemuhle OWODWA (lapho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphula umthetho wasekhaya). Uchofoze okuthi @data.habit.consequence.in_text_title - wenze kahle ngokukhumbula!
note: The string @data.habit.consequence.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Your goal was to introduce ONE positive consequence (for your teen taking responsibility) and ONE negative consequence (for your teen breaking a household rule).
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukwethula umphumela omuhle OWODWA (lapho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili izimela) kanye nomphumela ongemuhle OWODWA (lapho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphula umthetho wasekhaya).

SourceText: introduce a consequence together
text: wethuleni ndawonye umphumela

SourceText: Did you have any challenges when trying to introduce a consequence together?
text: Ingabe ube nobunzima obuthile lapho uzama ukwethula umphumela ndawonye?

SourceText: What was difficult for you about introducing a consequence with your teen?
text: Yini ebinzima kuwe ngokwethula umphumela kanye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili?

SourceText: I got very angry when my teen broke the rule.
text: Ngiye ngathukuthela kakhulu lapho ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili yephula umthetho.

SourceText:
When we take a pause before responding, it helps us to calm down and respond better. 

Next time your teen makes you angry, try to take a pause first. Even a few deep breaths can make a big difference!
text:
Lapho sithula kancane ngaphambi kokuphendula, lokho kusisiza sehlise umoya futhi siphendule kahle. 

Ngokuzayo lapho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikuthukuthelisa, zama ukuthula kancane ngaphambi kokuphendula. Ngisho nokudonsa umoya izikhathi ezimbalwa kungenza umehluko omkhulu!

SourceText: My teen got very angry with me after I gave the consequence.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili yangithukuthelela lapho ngiyitshela umphumela wezenzo zayo.

SourceText:
When your teen gets angry, you might need to walk away until you are both calm. 

Check to make sure your consequence is fair and reasonable. Listen to your teen’s explanation, and make sure to give a “Safety Amnesty” if they broke a rule in order to stay safe.
text:
Lapho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ithukuthela, kungase kudingeke uye kwenye indawo kuze kube yilapho nobabili senizolile. 

Hlola ukuze uqiniseke ukuthi umphumela owubekayo unobulungisa futhi uyacabangela yini. Lalela incazelo yengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, bese uqikelela ukuthi unikeza “Ushwele Wokuvikeleka” uma iphule umthetho ukuze ihlale iphephile.

SourceText: I introduced the consequence without first discussing it with my teen.
text: Ngethule umphumela ngaphambi kokuba ngixoxe ngawo kanye nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: Can you make a consequence for if this happens again? When we establish a consequence together with our teens, the consequence will be more realistic, and our teens will be more willing and able to follow the rule.
text: Ungawubeka yini umphumela walokhu uma kuphinde kwenzeke? Lapho sibeka imiphumela kanye nezingane zethu ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, umphumela uyoba ngokoqobo nakakhulu, futhi izingane zethu zizozimisela nakakhulu futhi zikwazi ukulandela umthetho.

SourceText: I forgot to follow through with the consequence.
text: Ngikhohlwe ukuwulandela lo mphumela.

SourceText: We all make mistakes! The more consistent we are with our consequences, the more likely our children will choose to behave positively in the future.
text: Sonke siyawenza amaphutha! Lapho siyisebenzisa njalo imiphumela esiyibekile, maningi amathuba okuthi izingane zethu zizoziphatha ngendlela efanele esikhathini esizayo.

SourceText: Even with the consequence, my teen still does not follow the rule.
text: Ngisho noma kukhona imiphumela ebekiwe yezenzo zayo, ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ayiwulaleli umthetho.

SourceText:
If your teen keeps breaking rules, you might need to spend more positive time with them. 

Try to keep going with your other goals  – like self-care, one-on-one time, and praise. All these skills will help your teen feel more loved and secure… and you less stressed!
text:
Uma ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iqhubeka iphula imithetho, kungase kudingeke uchithe isikhathi esengeziwe nayo. 

Zama ukuqhubeka neminye imigomo yakho – njengokuzinakekela, ukuchitha isikhathi nengane, nokuyincoma. Onke la makhono azosiza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili izizwe ithandwa futhi ivikelekile... futhi kunciphise ukucindezeleka kuwe!

SourceText: We only created a negative consequence, not a positive consequence.
text: Senze kuphela umphumela ongemuhle, asiwenzanga umphumela omuhle.

SourceText: It can be difficult to think of positive consequences sometimes. Positive consequences will encourage your teen to take more responsibility, and you will see the difference!
text: Ngezinye izikhathi kungase kube nzima ukucabanga ngomphumela wokwenza kahle izinto. Imiphumela emihle izokhuthaza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba izimele nakakhudlwana, futhi uzowubona umehluko!

SourceText: My teen suggested being hit as a negative consequence.
text: Ingane yami isikisela ukuthi ishaywe njengomphumela ongemuhle wokwephula umthetho.

SourceText:
Teens can be used to seeing hitting as the only possible consequence for breaking rules. 

Brainstorm some calm consequences with them that could help them understand that they have done something wrong. These will be more effective and will set positive examples!
text:
Izingane ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili zingase zithambekele ekubhekeni ukushaywa njengokuphela komphumela ongemuhle wokwephula imithetho. 

Xoxa nezingane ngemiphumela engahileli ukushaywa engazisiza ziqonde ukuthi zenze into embi. Lezi zizosebenza kakhudlwana futhi izobeka izibonelo ezinhle!

SourceText: Your goal was to discuss a possible crisis situation with your teen and make a plan for it.
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukuxoxa nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngesimo esiyinhlekelele esingase sivele bese nenza icebo laso.

SourceText: prepare for a possible crisis with their teens
text: lungiselela inhlekelele engase ivele nezingane zabo ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili

SourceText: prepare for a possible crisis with your teen
text: lungiselela inhlekelele engase ivele nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili

SourceText: My teen told me that something serious happened to them and I did not know how to handle it.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ingitshele ukuthi kukhona into ebucayi eyenzeke kuyo futhi angazanga ukuthi ngisisingathe kanjani leso simo.

SourceText: Praise your teen for telling you; that is not easy to do! Remember, you can use all the skills you picked from your toolbox: Take a pause, use the four steps of problem solving, and reach out to get the support you and your teen need!
text: Ncoma ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngokukutshela; lokho akulula ukukwenza! Khumbula, ungasebenzisa onke amakhono owathole ebhokisini lakho lamathuluzi: Thula kancane, sebenzisa izinyathelo ezine zokuxazulula inkinga, bese ufuna usizo oludingwa nguwe nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili!

SourceText: Get support
text: Thola ukwesekwa

SourceText: The conversation made me very uncomfortable because I was reminded of a negative experience I had.
text: Ingxoxo ingenze ngangakhululeka ngoba ingikhumbuze ngento ebuhlungu eyenzeka kimi.

SourceText: When we are reminded of such experiences, it is normal to feel upset or angry. It is important to find a time when you are calm, so that you can think of what support you need. You may need to talk to someone.
text: Lapho sikhunjuzwa izinto ezinjalo ezenzeka kithi, kungokwemvelo ukucasuka noma ukuthukuthela. Kubalulekile ukuthola isikhathi lapho usuzolile sokucabanga ngokwesekwa okudingayo. Kungase kudingeke ukhulume nothile.

SourceText: One of us did not feel comfortable.
text: Oyedwa kithi ubezizwa engakhululekile.

SourceText: This is difficult stuff to talk about. Find a relaxing time for it. We know it is much easier to not talk about these things and to hope they will never happen to us. However, learning to deal with crisis is like getting insurance; it is ALWAYS best to think about them and be prepared.
text: Lokhu kuyinto okunzima ukukhuluma ngayo. Zitholele isikhathi sokuphumula. Siyazi ukuthi kulula kakhulu ukungakhulumi ngalezi zinto sinethemba lokuthi ngeke zenzeke kithi. Nokho ukufunda ukubhekana nenhlekelele kufana nokuthola umshwalense; KUHLALE kungcono ukucabanga ngakho nokuzilungiselela.

SourceText: Your home practice was to try out REAL, POSITIVE and EXACT instructions with your teen.  We noticed you tapped the @data.habit.instruct_positively.in_text_title - great job for remembering!
text: Ukuphrakthiza endlini bekusho ukuzama ukulandela iziqondiso EZINGOKOQOBO, EZIWUSIZO NEZIQONDILE nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.  Siphawule ukuthi uchofoze okuthi @data.habit.instruct_positively.in_text_title - wenze kahle ngokukhumbula!
note: The string @data.habit.instruct_positively.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Your home practice was to try out REAL, POSITIVE and EXACT instructions with your teen.
text: Ukuphrakthiza endlini bekusho ukuzama ukulandela iziqondiso EZINGOKOQOBO, EZIWUSIZO NEZIQONDILE nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText:
Thank you for sharing! Well done for trying to give your teen positive instructions and for building a positive relationship with your teen. 

Your teen deserves praise and YOU as well!
text:
Siyabonga ngokwabelana nathi! Wenze kahle ngokuzama ukunikeza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iziqondiso eziwusizo kanye nokwakha ubuhlobo obuhle nengane yakho. 

Ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ifanelwe ukunconywa NAWE ufanelwe ukunconywa!

SourceText: Which of the tips helped you?
text: Yimaphi amacebiso akusizile?

SourceText: GET REAL – Can your teen do what you are about to ask?
text: BHEKANA NAMAQINISO – Ingabe ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ingakwenza yini lokho ozokucela?

SourceText: GET POSITIVE – Use positive words and praise them!
text: CABANGA NGEZINTO EZIKHUTHAZAYO – Sebenzisa amazwi akhuthazayo futhi uzincome izingane!

SourceText: GET CLEAR – Be clear and specific!
text: CACISA – Cacisa futhi ungagwegwesi!

SourceText: Wonderful! When we ask our teen to do something that is realistic, it is easier for them to succeed.
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Lapho sicela ingane yethu eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba yenze into ekwaziyo ukuyenza, kulula ngayo ukuba iphumelele.

SourceText: When we praise them, our teens feel encouraged to listen to us again!
text: Lapho sizincoma, izingane zethu zizizwa zikhuthazekile ukuba ziphinde zisilalele!

SourceText: Awesome! When we think ahead of specific instructions to give our teen, our instructions become much easier to follow!
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Lapho sicabanga kusengaphambili ngeziqondiso ezicacile esingazinika ingane yethu eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, iziqondiso zethu kuba lula ukuzilandela!

SourceText: Did you have any challenges?
text: Ingabe zibe khona izinselele obhekene nazo?

SourceText: What challenge did you have?
text: Yiziphi izinselele obe nazo?

SourceText: My teenager did not want to follow the instruction.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ayifunanga ukulandela iziqondiso.

SourceText: I did not find time to spend one-on-one time with my teen.
text: Angisitholanga isikhathi engingasichitha nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: I gave a negative instead of a positive instruction.
text: Nginikeze isiqondiso esingesihle esikhundleni sokunikeza esihle.

SourceText: I shouted at my teen when they behaved negatively, instead of giving them a positive instruction for what they should do.
text: Ngiyithethisile ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili lapho yenza into engalungile, kunokuyinikeza isiqondiso esifanele salokho kufanele ikwenze.

SourceText: I know; our children need time to learn to follow instructions. Be patient, try again, and remember to praise them every time they follow an instruction!
text: Ngiyazi; izingane zethu zidinga isikhathi ukuze zifunde ukulandela iziqondiso. Yiba nesineke, uphinde uzame, ukhumbule ukuzincoma izingane njalo lapho zilandela isiqondiso!

SourceText: Do you want to try one of the following things?
text: Ingabe ufuna ukuzama okunye kulokhu okulandelayo?

SourceText: Think of a time each day that I can spare five minutes or a bit more time.
text: Cabanga ngesikhathi usuku ngalunye lapho khona unemizuzu emihlanu ongenzi lutho ngayo noma ngaphezulu.

SourceText: Find a chore that we could do together in a fun way.
text: Thola umsebenzi wasendlini esingawenza ndawonye ngendlela emnandi.

SourceText: Ask my teen or someone else to help me with a chore, so I have some extra free time.
text: Cela ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili noma omunye umuntu ukuba angisize ngomsebenzi othile ukuze ngibe nesikhathi esengeziwe esikhululekile.

SourceText: Perfect! Even spending 5 minutes makes a big difference, and if you do it at the same time every day (like at breakfast or before bed), it will be easier to keep it up!
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ngisho nokuchitha imizuzu emihlanu kwenza umehluko omkhulu, futhi uma ukwenza ngesikhathi esifanayo nsuku zonke (njengasesidlweni sasekuseni noma ngaphambi kokulala), kuba lula ukukwenza njalo!

SourceText: Great! That way you get your work done and have a fun time together with your teen!
text: Kuhle! Ngaleyo ndlela ukwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wakho uwuqede uphinde ube nesikhathi esimnandi ndawonye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili!

SourceText: Wonderful! By sharing responsibilities, you will have more time to do something fun with your teen – it’s so important!
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ngokwaba imisebenzi, uzoba nesikhathi esiningi sokwenza into emnandi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili – kubalulekile kakhulu!

SourceText: Yes, it takes some time to get used to giving positive instructions – it’s really worth trying again! Think about the behaviour you would love to see your teen do more and think of positive ways to give that instruction!
text: Yebo, kuthatha isikhathi ukujwayela ukunikeza iziqondiso ezinhle – kuzuzisa ngempela ukuphinde uzame! Cabanga ngendlela yokuziphatha ongathanda ukuyibona kakhulu enganeni yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili bese ucabanga ngezindlela ezinhle zokunikeza leso siqondiso!

SourceText:
It is difficult to come up with instructions while we are still angry. Try and find a time when you are calm to introduce a positive instruction to your teen. 

In the next @global.weekly_workshop, we’ll talk more about how we can manage our emotions!  You can find more relaxation activities @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text.
text:
Kunzima ukunikeza iziqondiso uma sisacasukile. Zama ukuthola isikhathi lapho usuzolile ukuze unikeze isiqondiso esihle enganeni yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. 

Kokulandelayo @global.weekly_workshop, sizoxoxa kabanzi ngendlela esingalawula ngayo imizwelo yethu!  Ungathola imisebenzi eyengeziwe yokuphumula @data.parent_centre.relax_and_activities.location_text.

SourceText: Your goal was to make a family budget and savings plan. We noticed you tapped the @data.habit.money.in_text_title - great job for remembering!
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukwenza uhlelo lwezimali zomndeni kanye nohlelo lokonga imali. Siphawule ukuthi uchofoze okuthi @data.habit.money.in_text_title - wenze kahle ngokukhumbula!
note: The string @data.habit.money.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Your goal was to make a family budget and savings plan.
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukwenza uhlelo lwezimali zomndeni kanye nohlelo lokonga imali.

SourceText:
Thank you for sharing your experiences! Well done for thinking about how you can budget and save with your family. This will really help you to work towards your family goals. 

Together you can achieve so many good things!
text:
Siyakubonga ngokwabelana ngalokho okwenzeke kuwe! Wenze kahle ngokucabanga ngendlela ongabhajetha ngayo nongonga ngayo imali nomndeni wakho. Lokhu kuzokusiza ngempela ukwazi ukufinyelele imigomo yomndeni wakho. 

Ndawonye ningafinyelela izinto eziningi ezinhle!

SourceText: make a budget together with their family
text: ukwenza ibhajethi ndawonye nemindeni yabo

SourceText: Did you have any challenges when making your budget together?
text: Ingabe ube nezinselele lapho nenza ibhajethi yenu ndawonye?

SourceText: What whas difficult for you about making your budget together?
text: Yini ebinzima kuwe ngokwenza ibhajethi yenu ndawonye?

SourceText: I did not want to tell my family how much I earn.
text: Bengingafuni ukutshela umndeni wami ukuthi ngihola malini.

SourceText: You don’t have to reveal the exact amount you earn; you could give an estimate. You could say, “In this household, we have @global.currency@global.monthly_income_estimate every month” rather than, “I make @global.currency@global.monthly_income_precise”.
text: Akudingeki ukuba udalule inani eliqondile oliholayo; ungabanika isilinganiso. Ungathi, “Lapha ekhaya siba no-@global.currency@global.monthly_income_estimate njalo ngenyanga” kunokuthi uthi, “Ngihola @global.currency@global.monthly_income_precise”.

SourceText: When budgeting, we could not agree on what should fall under needs and what should fall under wants.
text: Lapho senza ibhajethi, asikwazanga ukuvumelana ngokuthi yini ewela ngaphansi kwezidingo nokuthi yini ewela ngaphansi kokufunwayo.

SourceText: People’s wants and needs are different sometimes. Talking about them together can help you and your teen to understand each other, respect your differences, and see where you can compromise.
text: Lokho okufunwa abantu nalokho abakudingayo akufani ngezinye izikhathi. Ukukhuluma ngazo ndawonye kungasiza wena nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba niqondane, nihloniphe ukungafani kwenu futhi nibheke nezindawo eningaxegisa kuzo.

SourceText: I did not understand what to do.
text: Angikuqondi lokho okumelwe ngikwenze.

SourceText: I’m sorry to hear this. I know it can be difficult! Why don’t we go through it again? Your teen or other family members can join and help you!
text: Ngiyaxolisa ngokuzwa lokhu. Ngiyazi ukuthi kungaba nzima! Kungani singake siphinde sikuzame futhi? Ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili noma amanye amalungu omndeni angajoyina akusize!

SourceText: My teen did not want to do the budgeting with me.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ayifunanga ukwenza ibhajethi kanye nami.

SourceText:
Try making the budget with other adults in your home first. Your teen may get interested in what you are doing. 

Making a budget may sound serious but try to make it fun – make it a game during one-on-one time! Or you can try to make the budget for @global.w_money_grandma first. 

Remember to praise them when you are done!
text:
Zama ukwenza ibhajethi kanye nabanye abantu abadala ekhaya kuqala. Ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ingase ithande ukwenza lokho okwenzayo. 

Ukwenza ibhajethi kungase kuzwakale kuyinto ebucayi kodwa zama ukwenza lokhu kube mnandi – kwenze kube umdlalo eniwudlala lapho nichitha isikhathi ndawonye! Noma ungazama ukwenza ibhajethi ye-@global.w_money_grandma kuqala. 

Khumbula ukubancoma lapho usuqedile!
note: The string @global.w_money_grandma should not be translated.

SourceText: You deserve some praise, too. Thank you again for using @global.parent_app. It shows you really care!
text: Nawe uyakufanelekela ukunconywa. Siyakubonga ngokusebenzisa i-@global.parent_app. Kubonisa ukuthi uyakhathalela ngempela!
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText: Your goal was to praise your teen. You’ve tapped the @data.habit.praise_teen.in_text_title this week. Great job for remembering!
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukuncoma ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Uchofoze okuthi @data.habit.praise_teen.in_text_title kuleli sonto. Wenze kahle ngokukhumbula!
note: The string @data.habit.praise_teen.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Your goal was to praise your teen.
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukuncoma ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: Did you have a chance to praise your teen this week?
text: Ingabe ulitholile ithuba lokuncoma ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kuleli sonto?

SourceText: Yes
text: Yebo

SourceText: No
text: Cha

SourceText: It can sometimes be hard to remember to praise our teens. Next time you spend one-on-one time with your teen, try and think of one thing you can praise them for. You can even say, “Thank you for spending time with me!”.
text: Ngezinye izikhathi kungase kube nzima ukukhumbula ukuncoma intsha yethu. Esikhathini esizayo lapho uchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, zama ukucabanga ngento eyodwa ongayincoma ngayo. Ungaze uthi, “Ngiyabonga ngokuchitha isikhathi nami!”.

SourceText: Well done - great job for remembering!
text: Usebenzile - wenze kahle ngokukhumbula!

SourceText: How did your teen respond?
text: Ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili isabele kanjani?

SourceText: Surprised
text: Imangele

SourceText: Happy
text: Ijabulile

SourceText: My teen did not like it
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ayizange ikuthande lokho

SourceText: I do not know
text: Angazi

SourceText: Remember, it takes some time for your teen to get used to seeing you praise them. The more time you spend with them, the better it will go!
text: Khumbula, kuthatha isikhathi ukuba ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ijwayele ukukubona uyincoma. Lapho iqhubeka ichitha isikhathi nawe, kuzoya kuba ngcono!

SourceText: Well done for observing how your teen felt; keep it up!
text: Wenze kahle ngokuqaphela indlela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ezizwa ngayo; qhubeka wenza kanjalo!

SourceText: It happens - just be patient. Make sure to keep spending time with your teen, so they will value your opinion more and more. When your praise is genuine, you will see the benefits soon!
text: Kuyenzeka - yiba nesineke. Qinisekisa ukuthi uqhubeka uchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, ukuze ibheke umbono wakho njengobalulekile. Lapho ukuncoma kwakho kuqotho, uzozibona izinzuzo maduzane!

SourceText: No problem - try to observe how they respond the next time!
text: Ayikho inkinga - zama ukubona indlela ingane esabela ngayo esikhathini esizayo!

SourceText: Your goal was to make ONE rule with your teen this week.
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukwenza umthetho OWODWA nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kuleli sonto.

SourceText: Well done for this! It’s not easy, and teenagers won’t keep to the rules all the time, but making a few key rules together is a great start. Praise yourself for trying this - we are proud of you!
text: Wenze kahle kulokhu! Akulula, futhi intsha ngeke iyihloniphe imithetho ngaso sonke isikhathi, kodwa ukubeka imithetho embalwa esemqoka ndawonye kuyisiqalo esihle. Zincome ngokuzama lokhu - siyaziqhenya ngawe!

SourceText: make rules with their teens
text: yenza imithetho kanye nentsha yabo

SourceText: Did you have any challenges when trying to make a rule together?
text: Ingabe ube nobunzima obuthile lapho uzama ukubeka umthetho ndawonye?

SourceText: What was difficult for you about making a rule with your teen?
text: Yini ebinzima kuwe ngokubeka umthetho kanye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili?

SourceText: My teen and I could not agree on a rule.
text: Mina nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili asikwazanga ukuvumelana ngomthetho.

SourceText: Think about whether the rule is reasonable. Can your teen follow it? When making rules as a family, it helps to think about your teen, how old they are, and what is important to them.
text: Cabanga ngokuthi umthetho uyafaneleka yini. Ingabe ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iyakwazi ukuwulandela? Lapho nibeka imithetho njengomndeni, kuyasiza ukucabanga ngengane yenu, ukuthi ineminyaka emingaki nokuthi yini ebalulekile kuyo.

SourceText: My teen felt it was unfair that they have to follow the rule while I don’t have to follow it.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ibe nomuzwa wokuthi akulungile ukuthi yona kumelwe ilandele umthetho kuyilapho mina kungadingeki ngiwulandele.

SourceText:
We should always remember that children learn best from us. The more we follow the rules, the more they will follow the rules, too. 

You can adjust the rule to make sure that it is realistic for everyone to follow, considering your responsibilities and your teen’s responsibilities (for example, school or work activities).
text:
Kufanele sikhumbule njalo ukuthi izingane zifunda kangcono kithi. Lapho silandela imithetho, kuba lula ngazo ukulandela imithetho. 

Ungawushintsha umthetho ukuze uqinisekise ukuthi wonke umuntu uyakwazi ukuwulandela, ucabangela imithwalo yakho kanye nemithwalo yengane yakho (ngokwesibonelo, imisebenzi yesikole noma eyasekhaya).

SourceText: I felt uncomfortable, because I feel that I should be the one establishing the rule, not my teen.
text: Ngizizwe ngingakhululekile, ngoba nginomuzwa wokuthi yimi okufanele enze umthetho hhayi ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: My partner felt uncomfortable, because they feel that they should be the one establishing the rule, not the teen.
text: Engithandana naye uzizwe engakhululekile, ngoba unomuzwa wokuthi nguye okufanele abeke umthetho hhayi osemusha.

SourceText: When we establish rules together with our teens, that helps the family to understand each other better. The rules will be more realistic, and our teens will be more willing and able to follow the rules.
text: Lapho sibeka imithetho ndawonye nentsha yethu, lokho kusiza umndeni uqondane kangcono. Imithetho kuyoba elandelekayo, futhi intsha yethu iyozimisela futhi ikwazi ukulandela imithetho.

SourceText: When we tried to set a rule, we got into an argument.
text: Lapho sizama ukubeka umthetho, savele saxabana.

SourceText: Was your teen in a good mood when you tried to set the rule? It is best to set rules when the situation is calm. If you or your teen are tired or hungry, it is better to talk about rules at a later time.
text: Ingabe ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ibisesimweni esikahle lapho uzama ukubeka umthetho? Kungcono ukubeka imithetho lapho isimo sizolile. Uma wena noma ingane yakho ikhathele noma ilambile, kungcono ukukhuluma ngemithetho ngesinye isikhathi.

SourceText: We were not able to stick to the rule.
text: Asikwazanga ukunamathela emthethweni.

SourceText: The rule needs to be specific and realistic. Make sure to have a rule that can be kept easily, like having one meal together every Sunday instead of every night. Do you need to be more flexible about the rule?
text: Umthetho kudingeka uqonde futhi ulandeleke. Qinisekisa ukuthi uba nomthetho okulula ukuwulandela, njengokuba nesidlo esisodwa enisidla ndawonye njalo ngeSonto esikhundleni sokwenza lokho nsuku zonke. Ingabe kudingeka ube nomthetho ovumelana nezimo?

SourceText: Your goal was to map risks and support systems with your teen - both in your community and online.
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukubona izingozi kanye nokuthola izindlela zokwesekwa kanye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili - kokubili emphakathini wakho naku-inthanethi.

SourceText: map risks and support with their teens
text: thola izingozi kanye nokwesekwa kanye nentsha yabo

SourceText: map risks and support with your teen
text: thola izingozi kanye nokwesekwa kanye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili

SourceText: My teen and I disagreed on which areas and online activities were unsafe.
text: Mina nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili asivumelani ngokuthi yiziphi izindawo kanye nezinto eziku-inthanethi ezingaphephile.

SourceText: Well done for trying the activity! When we listen to our teenagers, even if we disagree, we learn to understand their thinking. Try and find time to do the activity again - try to really listen and show you understand them before sharing your thoughts.
text: Wenze kahle ngokuzama lo msebenzi! Lapho silalela intsha yethu, ngisho noma singavumelani, sifunda ukuqonda indlela ecabanga ngayo. Zama ukuthola isikhathi sokuphinda wenze lo msebenzi - zama ukulalelisisa futhi ubonise ukuthi uyayiqonda intsha ngaphambi kokuba uyiphendule.

SourceText: My teen identified the house of someone I trust as unsafe. I was shocked and did not know what to do.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikhombe indlu yomuntu engimthembayo yathi ayiphephile. Bengishaqekile futhi ngingazi ukuthi ngenzeni.

SourceText: It is shocking to learn that people who are close to us and who we trust may be a danger to our teens. Remember to take a pause when you are upset, and try to listen calmly to your teen. Find someone you can talk to about this, perhaps a friend or support service, so you can get the support you need.
text: Kuyashaqisa ukuthola ukuthi abantu abasondele kithi nesibethembayo bangaba yingozi entsheni yethu. Khumbula ukuthatha ikhefu lapho ucasukile, bese uzama ukulalela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili uzolile. Thola othile ongakhuluma naye ngalokhu, mhlawumbe umngane noma abahlinzeka ngokweseka, ukuze uthole usizo oludingayo.

SourceText: My teen insisted that the bar (or another place I don’t feel is safe) is safe for them to visit. I don’t know how to convince my teen.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikholelwa ukuthi i-bar (noma enye indawo enginomuzwa wokuthi ayiphephile) iyindawo ephephile engaya kuyo. Angazi ukuthi ngingayikholisa kanjani ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: This can be very frustrating. To find a solution, your teen needs to feel heard - so listen calmly to your teen's reasons, and only then share your own thoughts. Then, think together about a rule that allows them to have fun but stay safe.
text: Lokhu kungakhungathekisa kakhulu. Ukuze uthole isixazululo, ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili idinga ukuzwiwa - ngakho yilalele ngokuzola ingane yakho, bese uveza umbono wakho ngemva kwalokho. Ngemva kwalokho, cabangani ndawonye ngomthetho ovumela ingane ukuba izijabulise kodwa ihlale iphephile.

SourceText: As an adult, I feel responsible to protect - but when I told my teen what is safe and what is not, my teen got angry.
text: Njengomuntu omdala ngizizwa nginomthwalo wokuvikela ingane yami - kodwa lapho ngiyitshela ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngalokho okuphephile nokungaphephile, ivele yathukuthela.

SourceText: Our teenagers may know things about our communities and technology that we are not aware of. When we actively involve our teens in the mapping activity and really listen to them, they feel heard and valued, and it can be easier to come up with a plan that everyone agrees on.
text: Intsha yethu ingase yazi izinto esingazazi thina mayelana nemiphakathi yethu kanye nezobuchwepheshe. Lapho sihilela intsha yethu ekubekeni imithetho yendawo, futhi siyilalelisisa, izizwa ilalelwa futhi ibalulekile, futhi kungaba lula ukuza necebo elamukelwa yiwo wonke umuntu.

SourceText: It was hard to identify support resources available in my community, because I don’t know my community so well / there are few services available.
text: Bekunzima ukubona izinsiza ezikhona emphakathini wangakithi ngoba angiwazi kahle umphakathi engikuwo / noma kunezinkonzo ezimbwalwa ezitholakalayo.

SourceText: It is difficult to know every detail about our communities. Involve another family member or friend in your mapping activity. You can even visit some of the services available and ask what they do. The more we know, the better we can keep our families safe!
text: Kunzima ukwazi yonke imininingwane ngemiphakathi yethu. Hilela elinye ilungu lomndeni noma umngane lapho ubeka imithetho yendawo. Ungavakashela nezinye zezinkonzo ezikhona futhi ubuze ukuthi zenzani. Kuba ngcono lapho kukuningi esikwaziyo ukuze sigcine imindeni yethu iphephile!

SourceText: I don’t know much about technology, so I don’t know how to talk about it with my teen.
text: Akukuningi engikwaziyo ngezobuchwepheshe, ngakho angazi ukuthi ngikhulume ngithini ngakho enganeni yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: That's totally fine! You can still support your teen. Ask your teen to explain the gadgets they use - you could do this during one-on-one time. This is a great opportunity to show interest in your teen’s life and to discuss potential risks together. If you are not sure which rules to set, you can always agree, with your teen, to try a new rule for two weeks and then discuss how things are going and change the rule if needed!
text: Lokho kulungile ngempela! Ungakwazi ukusekela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Cela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba ichaze ngemishini yobuchwepheshe eyisebenzisayo - lokhu ungakwenza lapho nichitha isikhathi ndawonye. Leli yithuba elihle lokubonisa isifiso sokwazi ngokwenzeka ekuphileni kwengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili futhi nixoxe ndawonye ngezingozi ezingase zibe khona. Uma ungaqiniseki ngemithetho okumelwe uyibeke, ningavumelana nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngokuthi nizame umthetho omusha amasonto amabili bese nixoxa ngokuthi izinto zihamba kanjani bese nishintsha umthetho uma kudingeka!

SourceText: Your goal was to try and resolve a problem or conflict together with your teen.
text: Umgomo wakho ubuwukuzama ukuxazulula inkinga noma ingxabano ndawonye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: resolve problems with their teens
text: ukuxazulula izinkinga nentsha yabo

SourceText: resolve the problem with your teen
text: ukuxazulula izinkinga nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili

SourceText: I forgot the steps of problem solving.
text: Ngizikhohliwe izinyathelo zokuxazulula inkinga.

SourceText: It takes some practice to use all four steps of problem solving. Next time a problem comes up, look at the four steps together with your teen - it will make a big difference!
text: Kudingeka uphrakthize ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzisa zonke izinyathelo zokuxazulula izinkinga. Esikhathini esizayo lapho kuvela inkinga, bheka izinyathelo ezine kanye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili - kuzokwenza umehluko omkhulu!

SourceText: I started with the solutions right away.
text: Ngivele ngaqala ngezixazululo.

SourceText: When we have a problem, we always want to get to the quickest end result and can forget about the steps. To come up with the best solution together, it is helpful to first have a full understanding of the problem and the different solutions.
text: Lapho sinenkinga, sihlale sifuna umphumela osheshayo bese sikhohlwa izinyathelo okumelwe sizithathe. Ukuze sithole isixazululo esingcono ndawonye, kuyasiza ukuqale uqonde inkinga ngokuphelele kanye nezixazululo ezihlukahlukene.

SourceText: Four steps of problem solving
text: Izinyathelo ezine zokuxazulula inkinga

SourceText: We could not agree on a solution to try out and we got into an argument.
text: Asivumelananga ngesixazululo esizosizama sabe sesiphikisana.

SourceText: Sometimes it can be difficult to agree with everyone in the family, especially if everyone is not yet calm. You could agree to try one solution first, and then another. Also, if you get stuck, try to get together later to agree on the solution together.
text: Ngezinye izikhathi kungase kube nzima ukuvumelana nawo wonke umuntu emndenini, ikakhulukazi lapho wonke umuntu engakazoli. Ungavuma ukuzama isixazululo esisodwa kuqala, bese kulandela esinye. Uma kwenzeka ubambeka, zamani ukuhlangana kamuva ukuze nivumelane ngesixazululo ndawonye.

SourceText: I got angry when the problem came up and I forgot to use the problem-solving steps.
text: Ngathukuthela lapho kuvela inkinga futhi ngakhohlwa ukusebenzisa izinyathelo zokuxazulula inkinga.

SourceText: When a problem comes up, we all get angry or stressed sometimes. Remember, when you feel angry or stressed, you can take a pause to help you stay calm and then solve the problem you are facing.
text: Lapho kuvela inkinga sonke siyathukuthela noma sicindezeleke ngezinye izikhathi. Khumbula, lapho uzizwa uthukuthele noma ucindezelekile, ungathatha ikhefu ukuze likusize uhlale uzolile bese uxazulula inkinga obhekene nayo.

SourceText: My teen got angry and did not want to talk about the problem.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iye yathukuthela futhi yenqaba ukukhuluma ngenkinga.

SourceText: Your teen might be too overwhelmed to deal with the problem right away. Recognise and name their emotions, and create a time later in the day or week to discuss and solve the problem together. By giving your teen time, the problem can be solved well.
text: Kungenzeka ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili isakhungathekile kakhulu ukuba ibhekane nenkinga ngokushesha. Qaphela futhi uyazi ngegama imizwa yengane yakho, bese wenza isikhathi kamuva osukwini noma phakathi nesonto ukuze nixoxe futhi nixazulule inkinga ndawonye. Ngokunika ingane yakho isikhathi, inkinga ingaxazululwa kahle.

SourceText: This week, your goal was: Whenever you are feeling stressed or upset, take five breaths in and out before you react. You tapped the @data.habit.breathe.in_text_title - well done!
text: Kuleli sonto, umgomo wakho bekuwukwenza lokhu: Noma nini lapho uzizwa ucindezelekile noma ucasukile, donsa umoya izikhathi ezinhlanu bese uyawudedela ngaphambi kokuba uthathe isinyathelo. Uchofoze okuthi @data.habit.breathe.in_text_title - wenze kahle!
note: The string @data.habit.breathe.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: This week, your goal was: Whenever you are feeling stressed or upset, take five breaths in and out before you react.
text: Kuleli sonto, umgomo wakho bekuwukwenza lokhu: Noma nini lapho uzizwa ucindezelekile noma ucasukile, donsa umoya izikhathi ezinhlanu bese uyawudedela ngaphambi kokuba uthathe isinyathelo.

SourceText: How did this work out?
text: Lokhu kusebenze kanjani?

SourceText: Your goal was also to talk to your teen about how you both felt in a stressful situation.
text: Umgomo wakho bekuwukuba ukhulume nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili mayelana nendlela nobabili enizizwe ngayo esimweni esicindezelayo.

SourceText: How did this go?
text: Kuhambe kanjani?

SourceText: Did you experience any of these challenges when sharing how you feel with your teen?
text: Ingabe uye wabhekana nenye yalezi zinselele ngesikhathi uchazela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili indlela ozizwa ngayo?

SourceText: What was difficult for you about sharing how you feel with your teen?
text: Yini ebinzima kuwe ngokutshela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili indlela ozizwa ngayo?

SourceText: I was afraid my teen would think I was weak.
text: Bengesaba ukuthi ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili izocabanga ukuthi ngibuthaka.

SourceText: Sharing feelings, especially the difficult ones, sets an important example for your teen! It actually makes everyone in the family stronger, because you can understand and support each other better.
text: Ukuxoxa ngemizwa, ikakhulukazi leyo enzima, kubekela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili isibonelo esibalulekile! Empeleni kuqinisa wonke umuntu emndenini ngoba nikwazi ukuqondana nokusekelana kangcono.

SourceText: I felt uncomfortable about naming specific difficult feelings.
text: Ngizizwe ngingakhululekile ukubiza ngamagama imizwa eqondile enzima.

SourceText: Being specific is not rude or insensitive - it really helps others to understand you clearly and this prevents confusion in the family. Feelings like anger and stress are part of our lives. All we need to do when we feel angry and stressed is handle our emotions well by taking a few deep breaths before responding.
text: Ukukhuluma ngokuqondile akusho ukuba luhlaza noma ukungacabangeli - kusiza abanye bakuqonde ngendlela ecacile futhi lokhu kuvimbela ukudideka emndenini. Imizwa enjengentukuthelo nokucindezeleka iyingxenye yokuphila kwethu. Okudingeka nje sikwenze lapho sizizwa sithukuthela noma sicindezelekile ukusingatha imizwelo yethu kahle ngokudonsa umoya izikhathi ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuba uphendule.

SourceText: My teen felt uncomfortable when I shared my feelings.
text: Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili izizwe ingakhululekile lapho ngiyitshela indlela engizizwa ngayo.

SourceText: Starting a new thing is always difficult at first. Give yourselves some time to get used to it and keep showing a good example by observing and sharing your feelings. Over time, your teen will learn to do the same, and they will feel even more loved and cared for!
text: Ukuqala into entsha kuhlale kunzima ekuqaleni. Zinike isikhathi sokuyijwayela futhi uqhubeke nokuba isibonelo esihle ngokuqaphela nokukhuluma ngemizwa yakho. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili izofunda ukwenza okufanayo, futhi izozizwa ithandwa nakakhulu, inakekelwa!

SourceText: When I shared my feelings, my teen asked many questions, which made me uncomfortable.
text: Lapho ngixoxa ngendlela engizizwa ngayo, ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iye yabuza imibuzo eminingi engenze ngazizwa ngingakhululekile.

SourceText: Sharing feelings helps your teen to be aware and learn to do the same. You can choose how much detail you want to share about the situation. It’s up to you! You can also choose to answer questions later by saying, “I am feeling angry/stressed now. Could you please give me some time? We can talk about this more tonight”.
text: Ukukhuluma ngemizwa yakho kusiza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili yazi futhi ifunde ukwenza okufanayo. Ungakhetha ukuthi yimininingwane engakanani ofuna ukuyiveza ngaleso simo. Kuxhomeke kuwe! Ungakhetha nokuphendula imibuzo kamuva ngokuthi uthi, “Ngizizwa ngithukuthele/ngicindezelekile manje. Ngicela ungiphe isikhashana? Singakhuluma kabanzi ngalokhu namuhla kusihlwa”.

SourceText: I was too stressed or angry to try sharing my feelings – I prefer to be alone when I feel like that.
text: Bengicindezeleke noma ngithukuthele kakhulu ukuzama ukukhuluma ngemizwa yami – Ngithanda ukuba ngedwa uma ngizizwa ngaleyo ndlela.

SourceText: It’s okay to not want to share at that time. Find some time to explain later, when you feel calmer, so that everyone can understand.
text: Kulungile ukungafuni ukukhuluma ngaleso sikhathi. Thola isikhathi kamuva sokuchaza, lapho usuzizwa uzolile, ukuze wonke umuntu akwazi ukuqonda.

You are doing your best every day and we’re all proud of you!

Involving your family in how you spend your money can take away a lot of stress and arguments. 

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title to help your family with budgeting and saving. It's actually easy - you will see!

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title and see how YOU can use praise in your family.

SourceText: Praise time!
text: Isikhathi sokuncoma!

SourceText:
When you see your teen next, praise them for one thing they are doing well! 

And when was the last time you praised yourself or another adult in your household? Try it!
text:
Ngokuzayo lapho ubona ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, yincome ngento ethile eyenze kahle! 

Ugcine nini ukuzincoma noma ukuncoma omunye umuntu omdala ekhaya lakho? Kuzame!

SourceText:
Hi awesome parent, a new workshop awaits you tomorrow. It seems like you haven’t finished the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title yet. It’s really a short one (promise!) – you can even complete it while waiting for dinner to cook. Why don’t you go through it when you have a few minutes? 

Thank you again for using @global.parent_app.
