Siyakubonga ngokusebenzisa i-@global.parent_app.

SourceText: Great that you completed the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, a new workshop is unlocked. Try it - you will see the difference in your teen’s behaviour.
text: Kuhle ukuthi uphothule i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kusasa, kuzovulwa ukuqeqeshwa okusha. Kuzame - uzowubona umehluko endleleni ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili eziphatha ngayo.
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi @field.user_name! New week, new workshop! Learn how to set household rules in a way that will increase the chances of your teen keeping them.
text: Sawubona @field.user_name! Isonto elisha, ukuqeqeshwa okusha! Funda indlela yokubeka imithetho yasekhaya ngendlela ezokwandisa amathuba okuthi ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iyigcine.
note: The string @field.user_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi @field.group_name! New week, new workshop! Learn how to set household rules in a way that will increase the chances of your teen keeping them.
text: Sawubona @field.group_name! Isonto elisha, ukuqeqeshwa okusha! Funda indlela yokubeka imithetho yasekhaya ngendlela ezokwandisa amathuba okuthi ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iyigcine.
note: The string @field.group_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Sometimes it feels like your teens are still grumpy even when you’ve done the best you can. Remember that you are doing an amazing job, and that there will be good times with them too!
text: Ngezinye izikhathi kuzwakala sengathi intsha yakho isathukuthele ngisho noma wenze konke okusemandleni akho. Khumbula ukuthi wenza umsebenzi omuhle kakhulu, nokuthi zizoba khona izikhathi ozijabulela nayo intsha!

SourceText:
Thank you again for using @global.parent_app and for committing to your parenting journey. 

The @local.workshop_data.in_text_title will show you how to set rules in a way that will help your teen to understand and follow them better.
text:
Siyakubonga futhi ngokusebenzisa i-@global.parent_app nangokuzibophezela ohambweni lwakho lokuba umzali. 

I-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title izokubonisa indlela ongabeka ngayo imithetho ngendlela ezosiza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iyiqonde futhi iyilandele kangcono.

SourceText: You are close to gaining another parenting tool! Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title, set ONE simple and realistic rule with your teen, and see things change!
text: Sekuseduze uthole elinye ithuluzi lokuba umzali! Qedela i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title, beka umthetho OWODWA olula nolandelekayo kanye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, bese ubona ushintsho lwenzeka!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Have you managed to set a rule together with your teen?
text: Ingabe ukwazile ukubeka umthetho ndawonye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili?

SourceText:
Tomorrow a brand new @global.parent_app workshop is ready for you. 

Try to complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title before starting the new workshop. It won’t take long and will help your teen to follow rules better!
text:
Kusasa kukhona okusha @global.parent_app ukuqeqeshwa okukulindele. 

Zama ukuphothula i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title ngaphambi kokuba uqale ukuqeqeshwa okusha. Ngeke kuthathe isikhathi eside futhi kuzosiza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ilandele imithetho kangcono!

SourceText:
Congratulations, you completed the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title.

Tomorrow, a new workshop will help you know what to do when teens show bad (or good) behaviour!
text:
Halala, uyiphothulile i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title.

Kusasa, ukuqeqeshwa okusha kuzokusiza wazi lokho ongakwenza lapho intsha iziphatha ngendlela embi (noma enhle)!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText:
Hi @field.user_name! You are nearly at the end of your @global.parent_app workshops! Thank you for your long-lasting commitment. 

This week’s workshop is about keeping our teens safe, both online and in the community. Enjoy!
text:
Sawubona @field.user_name! Ususeduze nokuqeda ukuqeqeshwa kwakho kwe-@global.parent_app! Siyabonga ngokuzibophezela kwakho kwesikhathi eside. 

Ukuqeqeshwa kwakho kwaleli sonto kumayelana nokugcina intsha yethu iphephile, kokubili ku-inthanethi kanye nasemphakathini. Yijabulele!

SourceText:
Hi @field.group_name! You are all nearly at the end of your @global.parent_app workshops! Thank you for your long-lasting commitment. 

This week’s workshop is about keeping our teens safe, both online and in the community. Enjoy!
text:
Sawubona @field.group_name! Nonke seniseduze nokuqeda ukuqeqeshwa kwenu kwe-@global.parent_app! Siyabonga ngokuzibophezela kwakho kwesikhathi eside. 

Ukuqeqeshwa kwakho kwaleli sonto kumayelana nokugcina intsha yethu iphephile, kokubili ku-inthanethi kanye nasemphakathini. Yijabulele!

SourceText:
This has been the hardest of times to be a parent. You should be so proud of yourself for everything you have done. 

Think about every time you have made your teen smile and all the care you have given them. Parents are incredible, and you are incredible!
text:
Lesi bekuyisikhathi esinzima kakhulu sokuba umzali. Kumelwe uziqhenye ngakho konke okwenzile. 

Cabanga ngazo zonke izikhathi owenze ngazo ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili yamamatheka kanye nakho konke ukunakekela oyinike khona. Abazali bayamangalisa, nawe uyamangalisa!

SourceText:
You have have gained so many parenting skills already over the past weeks!

Complete the next workshop to gain another helpful skill.
text:
Usuzuze amakhono amaningi kakade okuba umzali emasontweni adlule!

Qedela lokhu kuqeqeshwa okulandelayo ukuze uthole elinye ikhono eliwusizo.

SourceText:
To keep your teen safe, it helps to chat together about your community and their online experiences. 

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title and see how you can do this!
text:
Ukuze ugcine ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphephile, kuyasiza ukuxoxa ndawonye ngomphakathi wakho kanye nalokho okutholakala ku-inthanethi. 

Qedela i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title ubone indlela ongakwenza ngayo lokhu!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Have you talked with your teen about safety measures?
text: Ingabe usukhulumile nengane yakho ngezindlela zokuphepha?

SourceText:
It seems you haven’t finished the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title yet. Making a plan together with your teen can prevent many problems – give it a try before moving on!

Well done for using @global.parent_app to support your family.
text:
Kubonakala sengathi awukayiqedi i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title okwamanje. Ukwenza isu ndawonye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kuvimbela izinkinga eziningi – ake ukuzame lokhu ngaphambi kokuqhubeka!

Wenze kahle ngokusebenzisa i-@global.parent_app ukuze usekele umndeni wakho.

SourceText: Congratulations, you completed @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, a new workshop is ready for you to help you and your family deal with any situation – together you can do so much!
text: Siyakuhalalisela, uphothule i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kusasa, ukuqeqeshwa okusha kukulindile ukuze kusize wena nomndeni wakho nibhekane nanoma yisiphi isimo – ndawonye kuningi eningakwenza!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Remember – this week is about YOU!  We hope you are treating yourself well. You deserve this!
text: Khumbula – leli sonto limayelana NAWE!  Sithemba ukuthi uzinakekela kahle. Uyakufanelekela lokhu!

SourceText: Start a brand new @global.parent_app workshop tomorrow. You will see the good results!
text: Qala ukuqeqeshwa @global.parent_app okusha kusasa. Uzobona imiphumela emihle!
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText: Have you told your @global.parent_app partners about the app yet? From tomorrow, you can start doing your @global.parent_app workshops together!
text: Ingabe usubatshelile obambisene nabo @global.parent_app nge-app? Kusukela kusasa, ningaqala nenze ukuqeqeshwa @global.parent_app kwenu ndawonye!

SourceText:
Hi @field.user_name! You are making such good progress on your parenting journey! 

Having a teen means having a lot of unexpected problems to deal with. This workshop will show you how to deal with them.
text:
Sawubona @field.user_name! Wenza intuthuko enhle ohambweni lwakho njengomzali! 

Ukuba nengane eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kusho ukubhekana nezinkinga eziningi ezingalindelekile. Le ngqungquthela izokubonisa ukuthi ungabhekana kanjani nazo.
note: The string @field.user_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Hi @field.group_name! You are making such good progress on your parenting journey!

Having a teen means having a lot of unexpected problems to deal with. This workshop will show you all how to deal with them.
text:
Sawubona @field.group_name! Wenza intuthuko enhle ohambweni lwakho njengomzali!

Ukuba nengane eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kusho ukubhekana nezinkinga eziningi ezingalindelekile. Le ngqungquthela izonibonisa nonke indlela yokubhekana nazo.
note: The string @field.group_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Your commitment is an inspiration to everyone. Keep calm and carry on!
text: Ukuzibophezela kwakho kuyisikhuthazo kuwo wonke umuntu. Qhubeka uzolile bese uyaqhubeka!

SourceText:
With teenagers, and in life, unexpected problems come up and we have to deal with them. 

Start the next workshop to learn how to successfully address these problems.
text:
Lapho kukhona intsha, kanye nasekuphileni, kungavela izinkinga ezingalindelekile ekuphileni futhi kumelwe sibhekane nazo. 

Qala ukuqeqeshwa okulandelayo ngokufunda indlela yokubhekana ngokuphumelelayo nalezi zinkinga.

SourceText:
You are on the right track to start solving problems together with your teen! 

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title and gain another important parenting skill!
text:
Usendleleni efanele yokuqala ukuxazulula izinkinga ndawonye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili! 

Qedela i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title bese uthola elinye ikhono elibalulekile lokuba umzali!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText:
Have you tried the four steps of problem-solving with your teen yet? 

KNOW IT, SOLVE IT, TRY IT, TEST IT!
text:
Ingabe usuzizamile izinyathelo ezine zokuxazulula inkinga nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili? 

ZAZI, ZIXAZULULE, ZIZAME, ZIHLOLE!

SourceText:
Tomorrow a brand new @global.parent_app workshop is ready for you. 

Try to complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title before starting the new workshop. Knowing how to solve problems together will help in many situations!
text:
Kusasa kukhona okusha @global.parent_app ukuqeqeshwa okukulindele. 

Zama ukuphothula i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title ngaphambi kokuba uqale ukuqeqeshwa okusha. Ukwazi indlela yokuxazulula izinkinga ndawonye kuzosiza ezimweni eziningi!

SourceText: Great that you completed the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, a new workshop is unlocked to help you keep your teen safe.
text: Kuhle ukuthi uqedile i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kusasa, ukuqeqeshwa okusha kuzovulwa ukuze kukusize ugcine ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphephile.
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText:
Hi @field.user_name! Congratulations for starting @global.parent_app week 5.

A new parenting workshop awaits you with tips on how we can stay calm and in control when our teens are driving us crazy.
text:
Sawubona @field.user_name! Siyakuhalalisela ngokuqala @global.parent_app isonto 5.

Ukuqeqeshwa okusha kwendlela yokuba umzali kukulindile kanye namacebiso endlela yokuhlala uzolile futhi ulawula isimo lapho intsha yethu isiphithanisa ikhanda.

SourceText:
Hi @field.group_name! Congratulations for starting @global.parent_app week 5.

A new parenting workshop awaits you with tips how we can stay calm and in control when our teens are driving us crazy.
text:
Sawubona @field.group_name! Siyakuhalalisela ngokuqala @global.parent_app isonto 5.

Ukuqeqeshwa okusha kwendlela yokuba umzali kukulindile kanye namacebiso endlela yokuhlala uzolile futhi ukwazi ukulawula isimo lapho intsha yethu isiphithanisa ikhanda.

SourceText: We have a new workshop available for you about managing anger and stress. It will help you take better care of yourself.
text: Sinokuqeqeshwa kwakho okusha okukhona okumayelana nokulawula intukuthelo nokucindezeleka. Kuzokusiza uzinakekele kangcono.

SourceText: Happy, sad, angry, excited, worried? Well done for recognizing how you and others felt today! And remember, tomorrow is a brand new day.
text: Ujabulile, udangele, uthukuthele, uyathokoza, ukhathazekile? Wenze kahle ngokubona ukuthi wena nabanye benizizwa kanjani namuhla! Khumbula, kusasa usuku olusha.

SourceText:
We all feel overwhelmed sometimes. Taking a deep breath helps! 

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title to get some useful tools to deal with stress.
text:
Sonke sizizwa singakhungathekile ngezinye izikhathi. Ukudonsa kakhulu umoya kuyasiza! 

Qedela i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title ukuze uthole amathuluzi awusizo okubhekana nokucindezeleka.
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: How have your stress levels been this week? Try to take a few deep breaths before responding to your teen - it makes a big difference.
text: Abe njani amazinga akho okucindezeleka kuleli sonto? Zama ukudonsa umoya izikhathi ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuphendula ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili - kwenza umehluko omkhulu.

SourceText: Well done for taking a big breath before responding to your teen! Each time you are taking a pause, you are getting back control.
text: Wenze kahle ngokudonsa umoya ngaphambi kokuphendula ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili! Isikhathi ngasinye othatha ngaso ikhefu, ukwazi ukulawula isimo.

SourceText:
Tomorrow a brand new @global.parent_app workshop is ready for you. 

By completing the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title first, you lay a really important foundation: If you feel good, your family will do better too!
text:
Kusasa kukhona okusha @global.parent_app ukuqeqeshwa okukulindele. 

Ngokuphothula i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title kuqala, ubeka isisekelo esibaluleke ngempela: Uma uzizwa kahle, nomndeni wakho uzozizwa kahle!

SourceText: Well done for completing the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, you can access a new workshop to help you relax and build valuable skills!
text: Wenze kahle ngokuphothula i-@local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kusasa, ungangena ekuqeqeshweni okusha ukuze kukusize uphumule futhi wakhe amakhono abalulekile!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Here is a fun activity to do with your teen!
text: Nayi imisebenzi emnandi ongayenza nengane eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili!

SourceText:
Hi @fields.user_name! Thank you for using @global.parent_app and committing to your parenting. 

Remember to tap your @global.parent_points!
text:
Sawubona @fields.user_name! Siyakubonga ngokusebenzisa i-@global.parent_app nangokuzibophezela ekubeni umzali. 

Ukhumbule ukushaya i-@global.parent_pointsyakho!

SourceText: That’s wonderful!
text: Kuhle kakhulu lokho!

SourceText: Nice work!
text: Umsebenzi omuhle!

SourceText: Your commitment is not taken for granted.
text: Ukuzibophezela kwakho akuyona into encane.

SourceText: Keep up the good work!
text: Qhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi omuhle!

SourceText: This is lovely!
text: Kuhle lokhu!

SourceText: Tap yourself on the shoulder. You deserve this.
text: Zincome manje. Uyakufanelekela lokhu.

SourceText: Every @global.parent_point counts!
text: Ngakunye @global.parent_point kubalulekile!
note: The string @global.parent_point should not be translated.

SourceText: Remember to sit down and relax today - taking care of yourself is an important parenting skill.
text: Khumbula ukuhlala phansi uphumule namuhla - ukuzinakekela kuyikhono elibalulekile njengomzali.

SourceText: Relax now
text: Phumula manje

SourceText: Did you relax already? Tap it!
text: Ingabe usuphumulile kakade? Ichofoze!

SourceText:
Here are this week’s takeaway skills! 

Use them at home and find them anytime in your @global.parent_centre.
text:
Nanka amakhono akuleli sonto ohamba nawo! 

Wasebenzise ekhaya futhi uwathole noma nini ku @global.parent_centre yakho.
note: The string @global.parent_centre should not be translated.

SourceText: Home Practice
text: Ukuprakthiza Ekhaya

SourceText: Small actions, big results! Parents who practice their workshop skills at home get better results.
text: Izenzo ezincane, imiphumela emikhulu! Abazali abaprakthiza ekhaya amakhono abawathole ekuqeqeshweni bathola imiphumela emihle.

SourceText: Next week, you’ll share with your group how your home practice went. You can also support and remind each other during the week.
text: Ngesonto elizayo, uzoxoxela iqembu lakho indlela okuhambe ngayo ukuprakthiza ekhaya. Ningasekelana futhi nikhumbuzane phakathi nesonto.

SourceText: Let's talk about how your home practice went this week.
text: Masikhulume ngendlela ukuprakthiza kwakho ekhaya okuhambe ngayo kuleli sonto.

SourceText: How did it go?
text: Kuhambe kanjani?

SourceText: Well done for exploring solutions to your challenges. Go try them out. Your relationship with your teen will get stronger and stronger!
text: Wenze kahle ngokuhlola izisombululo zezinselele zakho. Hamba uyozizama. Ubuhlobo bakho nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili buzoqina nakakhulu!

SourceText: talk to their teens about how they feel
text: ukukhuluma nentsha yabo ngendlela ezizwa ngayo

SourceText: talk to your teen about how you feel
text: ukukhuluma nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngendlela ezizwa ngayo

SourceText: Sorry we missed this!
text: Siyaxolisa asikubonanga lokhu!

SourceText: Do you want to share it with us?
text: Ingabe ufuna ukusixoxela ngakho?

SourceText: Thank you for sharing your challenge! We will use this feedback to make @global.parent_app better.
text: Siyakubonga ngokusixoxela ngezinselele zakho! Sizosebenzisa lokhu kuphawula ukuze senze i-@global.parent_app ibe ngcono.
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText: Sorry to hear the tips did not help you.
text: Siyaxolisa ukuzwa ukuthi amacebiso awazange akusize.

SourceText: Do you want to share with us what you think would help you?
text: Ingabe uyafuna ukusitshela ukuthi yini ocabanga ukuthi ingakusiza?

SourceText: Thank you for sharing! You are an awesome parent for trying to spend time with your teen. It makes all the difference. Keep up the good work, and remember, I am always here to support!
text: Siyabonga ngokwabelana nathi! Ungumzali omuhle ngenxa yokuzama ukuchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Kwenza umehluko omkhulu. Qhubeka wenza umsebenzi omuhle, ukhumbule ukuthi ngihlale ngilapha ukuze ngikusekele!

SourceText: Let’s do a short relaxation activity together – it will take less than 1 minute and you will feel more relaxed.

SourceText:
You are a star!

Every day, recognise something you have done well. Reward yourself with something that makes you happy. And take a deep breath to relax.
text:
Uyiqhawe!

Nsuku zonke, qaphela into oyenze kahle. Zivuze ngento ekwenza ujabule. Udonse umoya ukuze uzole.

SourceText: Customise @global.parent_app
text: Hlela Ngendlela Oyithandayo @global.parent_app
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText: Talk Together
text: Khulumani Ndawonye

SourceText: Share ideas, support each other!
text: Yabelanani ngemibono, sekelanani!

SourceText: Try it Together
text: Kuzameni Ndawonye

SourceText: Let's practice together.
text: Masiprakthize ndawonye.

SourceText:
Home practice is how we make our family life better. But it often brings challenges. 

Let's share our successes and problems, and help each other find new ideas to try!
text:
Ukuprakthiza ekhaya kuyindlela esenza ngayo ukuphila komndeni kube ngcono. Kodwa ngokuvamile kuletha izinselele. 

Ake sixoxe ngempumelelo kanye nezinselele zethu futhi sisizane ukuze sithole amacebiso amasha esingawazama!

SourceText:
Think about how your home activities went this week. 

Take turns to discuss: 
* What went well and what was a problem? 
* What solutions can you think of together? 
* Pick one solution and try it later with your teen! 

(Or you can even practice it now so it will be easier later!)
text:
Cabanga ngokuthi imisebenzi yakho yasekhaya ihambe kanjani kuleli sonto. 

Nikanani amathuba okuxoxa: 
* Yini ehambe kahle futhi yini ebe yinkinga? 
* Yiziphi izixazululo eningazicabanga ndawonye? 
* Khetha isixazululo esisodwa bese uyasizama kamuva nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili! 

(Noma ungayiprakthiza khona manje ukuze kube lula kamuva!)

SourceText: Discussion example from @data.workshop.w_1on1.title
text: Isibonelo sengxoxo esivela ku-@data.workshop.w_1on1.title
note: The string @data.workshop.w_1on1.title should not be translated.

SourceText: Start Positively Together
text: Qalani Kahle Ndawonye

SourceText:
It's great to see you again! 

Let's start with caring for you.
text:
Kuhle ukukubona futhi! 

Ake siqale ngokunakekela wena.

SourceText:
Take turns:
* Share: How are you feeling today?
* Praise someone in your group for something they did well this week!

Remember that no matter how you feel, it’s great you are here. You all deserve praise.
text:
Shintshanani:
* Yabelana: Uzizwa kanjani namuhla?
* Ncoma othile eqenjini lakho ngokuthile akwenze kahle kuleli sonto!

Khumbula ukuthi kungakhathaliseki ukuthi uzizwa kanjani, kuhle ukuthi ulapha. Nonke nifanelwe ukunconywa.

SourceText: Ideas from other families:
text: Amacebiso avela kweminye imindeni:

SourceText: Let's see how this week has been.
text: Ake sibone ukuthi lihambe kanjani leli sonto.

SourceText: This week you have done...
text: Kuleli sonto wenze lokhu...

SourceText:
You are showing such commitment to being a parent and to caring for yourself. 

You are fantastic.
text:
Ubonisa ukuzibophezela ekubeni umzali kanye nasekuzinakekeleni. 

Wenza kahle kakhulu.

SourceText: Watch Together
text: Bukelani Ndawonye

SourceText: Let's watch a video together!
text: Masibukele ividiyo ndawonye!

SourceText: Watch
text: Bukela

SourceText: Let's watch a video!
text: Masibukele ividiyo!

SourceText: Welcome @fields.group_name
text: Siyakwamukela @fields.group_name
note: The string @fields.group_name should not be translated.

SourceText: It's great to see you again! Let’s start with a song for families everywhere.
text: Kuhle ukukubona futhi! Masiqale ngengoma yemindeni ekuyo yonke indawo.

SourceText: Let's Slow Down
text: Masehlise Isivinini

SourceText: You’ve completed this week’s workshop.
text: Ukuqedile ukuqeqeshwa kwaleli viki.

SourceText: Organisation Registration
text: Ukubhaliswa Kwenhlangano

SourceText: If you are going through the @global.parent_app programme with the support of an organisation, they should have given you a code. Please enter the code in the box below and press Done.
text: Uma wenza lolu hlelo @global.parent_app usekelwa yinhlangano, kufanele ngabe unikwe ikhodi. Sicela ufake ikhodi ebhokisini elingezansi bese uchofoza okuthi Ngiqedile.
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText: Done
text: Ngiqedile

SourceText: You may be asked to share this code with people who will support your @global.parent_app journey.
text: Ungase ucelwe ukuba wabelane ngale khodi nabantu abazosekela@global.parent_app uhambo lwakho.
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText:
At the end of the day, take a minute to: 

* Talk to your teen about one fun thing they did. 
* Praise yourself for one thing you did well today. 
* You are a star!
text:
Ekupheleni kosuku, zinike umzuzu wokwenza lokhu: 

* Khuluma nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngento eyodwa emnandi eyenzile. 
* Zincome ngento eyodwa oyenze kahle namuhla. 
* Uyiqhawe!

SourceText:
* Ask each other, “What made you happy today?”
* Ask each other, “What difficulty did you face today?”
* Ask each other, “How can I help you?”
* Try to do this together every day; it could be when you are eating dinner together or before you go to bed.
text:
* Buzanani, “Yini ekwenze wajabula namuhla?”
* Buzanani, “Yibuphi ubunzima oye wabhekana nabo namuhla?”
* Buzanani, “Ngingakusiza kanjani?”
* Zamani ukwenza lokhu ndawonye nsuku zonke; kungaba lapho nidla isidlo sakusihlwa ndawonye noma ngaphambi kokuba niyolala.

SourceText:
* You can’t always travel, but you can always dream! Ask your teen these questions:
* Where would you want to travel to? How long would you be away? What would you pack? What would you do on your trip? What would you see?
* Look at a map together or draw one.
* Choose a country that your teen has never heard of and learn more about the country.
text:
* Ngeke ukwazi ukuthatha uhambo ngaso sonke isikhathi, kodwa ungaphupha njalo! Buza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili le mibuzo:
* Ungathanda ukuthatha uhambo oluya kuphi? Uzohamba isikhathi eside kangakanani? Yini ozoyipakisha? Yini ozoyenza ohambweni lwakho? Yini ozoyibona?
* Bukani ibalazwe ndawonye noma nilidwebe.
* Khetha izwe ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili engakaze izwe ngalo bese nifunda okwengeziwe ngalelo zwe.

SourceText: You and your teenager can plan a guestlist of the famous people you’d most like to invite to your party. You can each have five people – they can be from the past or from the present time. Who would you invite? And would your guests get on well together?
text: Wena nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ningabhala uhlu losaziwayo eningathanda ukubamema emcimbini wakho. Ngamunye angaba nabantu abahlanu – kungaba abantu bangesikhathi esidlule noma bamanje. Ungamema obani? Ingabe izimenywa zakho zizozwana?

SourceText:
* Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.
* It might help to think of wishes, dreams, experiences at school, likes or dislikes. For example: I hate bananas, my favourite subject is science, and I really wish I could sing. 
* Say them to your teenager and ask them to guess which one is a lie. 
* Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?
* Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?
text:
* Cabanga ngezitatimende ezintathu mayelana nawe. Ezimbili kumelwe zibe yiqiniso bese esisodwa sibe amanga.
* Kungasiza ukucabanga ngezifiso, amaphupho, okwenzeke esikoleni, okuthandayo noma ongakuthandi. Ngokwesibonelo: Ngiyawazonda amabhanana, isifundo engisithanda kakhulu yisayensi, futhi ngifisa ngabe ngiyakwazi ukucula. 
Yisho lokhu enganeni yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili bese uyicela ukuba iqagele ukuthi yikuphi okungamanga. 
* Ingabe iqagele ngokunembile? Ingabe kuyimangazile?
* Manje yicele ukuba yenze okufanayo. Ingabe kukhona okusha enikufundile ngomunye nomunye?

SourceText: Tell your teenager something about when you were a teenager yourself. What things didn’t exist then? Phones with internet? What did you do for fun? What did you worry about? Don’t worry if they don’t tell you something in return – what’s important is that they listen and remember. Sometimes our teenagers forget that their parents are people too!
text: Tshela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngokuthile okwenzeka ngesikhathi usemusha nawe. Yiziphi izinto ezazingekho ngaleso sikhathi? Omakhalekhukhwini abane-inthanethi? Yini enaniyenza yokuzijabulisa? Yini owawukhathazeka ngayo? Ungakhathazeki uma ingane yakho ingakutsheli lutho – okubalulelkile ukuthi ikulalele futhi iyakhumbula. Ngezinye izikhathi intsha yethu iyakhohlwa ukuthi abazali bayo bangabantu nabo!

SourceText:
* Think of a superpower. For example, going anywhere instantly, travelling in time, reading minds. 
* Ask your teen, “If you had the superpower to […], how would you use it?”
* Encourage them to give their superhero a name and act it out. 
* Now let your teen choose a superpower for you.
* Make sure you act out your superpower, too!
text:
* Cabanga ngokuba namandla angaphezu kwavamile. Ngokwesibonelo, ukuya noma kuphi ngokuphazima kweso, ukuya enkathini edlule neseza, ukubona imicabango yabantu. 
* Buza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, “Uma ubunamandla angaphezu kwawemvelo oku […], ubungawasebenzisa kanjani?”
* Yikhuthaze ukuba iqambe i-superhero yayo igamat. 
* Manje vumela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba ikukhethele amandla angaphezu kwawemvelo.
* Qinisekisa ukuthi nawe uyawalingisa amandla akho angaphezu kwawemvelo!

SourceText:
Have a conversation with your teen about something they like.

It can be about anything they choose to talk about: sports, friends, music, celebrities…

Try to listen to your teen and give them space to talk.
text:
Xoxa nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngokuthile ekuthandayo.

Kungaba yinoma yini ekhetha ukuxoxa ngayo: ezemidlalo, abangane, umculo, osaziwayo…

Zama ukulalela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili futhi uyivumele ukuba ikhulume.

SourceText:
* Choose a storyteller to start making up a story.
* Story listeners can interrupt with a word at any time.
* Storyteller needs to fit that word in their story.
* When the story is finished, try with a different storyteller!
text:
* Khetha umxoxi wendaba ukuba aqale ukukhanda indaba ayixoxayo.
* Abalalele indaba bangaphazamisa noma nini ngokusho igama elithile.
* Oxoxa indaba kudingeka asebenzise lelo gama endabeni yakhe.
* Lapho indaba iphela, zamani umxoxi wendaba ohlukile!

SourceText:
* Think of three different situations. For example, driving a car, sailing a boat or flying a plane.
* Say them to your teen and ask, “Which would you prefer?”
* Ask them why?
* Now think of three more situations or ask your teen to do it for you.
text:
* Cabanga ngezimo ezintathu ezihlukahlukene. Ngokwesibonelo, ukushayela imoto, ukushayela isikebhe noma ukushayela indiza.
* Yisho lokhu enganeni yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili bese uyayibuza, “Yikuphi ongakuthandar?”
* Yibuze ukuthi kungani?
* Manje cabanga ngezimo ezintathu noma ucele ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba ikwenzele lokho.

SourceText:
* Ask each other questions. They can be any questions about things you like or what you did today.
* The only rule is that you can’t answer “Yes”, “No” or “Maybe”.
* How long can you last? How creative can you get with your answers?
* Swap over and play again!
text:
* Buzanani imibuzo. Ingakubuza noma yimiphi imibuzo ngezinto ozithandayo noma ngalokho okwenzile izolo.
* Ukuphela komthetho yilowo othi awukwazi ukuphendula uthi “Yebo”, “Cha” noma  “Mhlawumbe”.
* Ungabuza imibuzo isikhathi eside kangakanani? Bungakanani ubuciko obungabusebenzisa ezimpendulweni zakho?
 * Shintshanani bese niyadlala futhi!

SourceText:
* First person says, “On Saturday, I am going to… (e.g., go to the park)”
* Second person adds to first person, “On Saturday, I am going to the park and… (e.g., visit my best friend).
* Each person adds to the previous, trying to think of all of the fun things to do on Saturday.
text:
* Umuntu wokuqala uthi, “NgoMgqibelo, ngizoya... (isib, epaki)”
* Umuntu wesibili wenezela kulokho okushiwo owokuqala, "NgoMgqibelo, ngizoya epaki futhi...(isib., ngivakashele umngane wami omkhulu).
* Umuntu ngamunye wengeza kokudlule ezama ukucabanga ngazo zonke izinto ezijabulisayo angazenza ngoMgqibelo.

SourceText:
* Start the story with “Once upon a time there was a…”
* Let your teen make up the next sentence.
* Then you make up a sentence.
* Take turns until you have a wonderful new story.
* Make sure to end the story on a positive note.
* Ask your teen what was their favourite part of the story!
text:
* Qala indaba yakho ngamazwi athi “Kwasukasukela kwakukhona…”
* Vumela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba yakhe umusho olandelayo.
* Ngemva kwalokho kuba nguwe owakha umusho.
* Shintshananani njengoba niqamba indaba entsha emnandi.
* Qinisekisa ukuthi ingoma iphela kamnandi.
* Buza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi iyiphi indawo eyithande kakhulu endabeni!

SourceText:
* Ask your teen what kind of meal they would like to eat. 
* Prepare it together!    
* Let them have a turn at being the head chef – they lead, and you follow their instructions. 
* You can even help them to make a budget for the ingredients! 

Don’t think it will work? Ask your teens what THEY would like for you and them to do together. Let them lead. Relax. Have fun.
text:
* Buza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi yini engathanda ukuyidla. 
* Kuphekeni ndawonye lokho kudla!    
* Yivumele ibe umpheki omkhulu – ihole, wena ulandele iziqondiso zayo. 
* Ungayisiza nokuba yenze isabelomali sokuthenga izinto zokupheka! 

Ucabanga ukuthi kuzosebenza? Buza izingane zakho ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi yini EZINGATHANDA ukuba wena nazo ziyenze ndawonye. Zivumele zihole. Khululeka. Zijabulise.

SourceText:
* Create a set of dance moves to your teen's favourite songs. 
* One person does a dance move and everyone else copies it.  
* Everyone takes turns being the leader. 
* Perform it for the household!
text:
* Sungula imidanso yezingoma ezithandwa yingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. 
* Umuntu oyedwa uyadansa bese bonke abanye belingisa umdanso awenzayo.  
* Wonke umuntu uthola ithuba lokuhola umdanso. 
* Yenzani lokhu ekhaya!

SourceText:
* This game can be played in pairs or with many people in a group.
* Stand facing each other or in a circle. 
* One person leads first and everyone else copies them, trying to move exactly at the same time as the leader.
* Make sure the leader moves slowly enough for everyone else to follow! Explore moving different body parts and in different levels.
* After a while, switch who is leading. Give everyone a chance to lead.
* Try it with no leaders!
text:
* Lo mdlalo ungadlalwa lapho nibabili noma niwudlale nabantu abaningi njengeqembu.
* Yimani nibhekane noma nime nenze indilinga. 
* Kuhola umuntu oyedwa kuqala bese wonke umuntu elingisa lokho akwenzayo, kulingiswa konke okwenziwa umholi ngesikhathi esisodwa.
* Qinisekisa ukuthi umholi akasheshi kakhulu ukuze wonke umuntu akwazi ukulingisa akwenzayo! Zama ukunyakazisa izitho ezihlukahlukene zomzimba ezigabeni ezihlukahlukene.
 * Ngemva kwesikhathi esithile, shintshani umuntu oholayo. Nikezani wonke umuntu ithuba lokuhola.
* Kuzameni lokhu kungekho oholayo!

SourceText: Praise time! Look at your teen and praise them for one thing they are doing well! And when was the last time you praised yourself or another adult in your household? Try it!
text: Isikhathi sokuncoma! Bheka ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili, uyincome ngento ethile eyenza kahle! Ugcine nini ukuzincoma noma ukuncoma omunye umuntu omdala ekhaya lakho? Kuzame!

SourceText:
* Think of a new skill you could learn together with your teen. For example, keeping a ball in the air or your foot, juggling, making soup?
* Take turns in trying the new skill out.
* Make sure to praise each other, and try to learn and play together!
text:
* Cabanga ngekhono elisha eningalifunda ndawonye nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Ngokwesibonelo, ukugcina ibhola lisemoyeni noma onyaweni lwakho, ukuphonsa izinto eziningi emoyeni uphinde uzibambe zonke, ukwenza isobho?
* Shintshanani ekuzameni ikhono elisha.
* Qinisekisa ukuthi niyancomana, futhi nizame ukudlala ndawonye!

SourceText:
* Come up with three types of exercise together. For example, walking, jogging, soccer or dancing.
* Pick one together and try it out. 
* If you both like it, decide how often you are going to do it. Once or twice a week? Every morning?
* Together think of ways to make it even more fun. Can you jog to a certain point? Take turns in being the coach? Motivate each other with a small free reward?
text:
* Khethani ndawonye izinhlobo ezintathu zokuzivocavoca. Ngokwesibonelo, ukuhamba, ukugijima, ukudlala ibhola noma ukudansa.
* Khethani okukodwa ndawonye bese niyakuzama. 
Uma nikuthanda nobabili, nqumani ukuthi nizokwenza izikhathi ezingaki. Kanye noma kabili ngesonto? Njalo ekuseni?
* Ndawonye cabangani ngezindlela zokwenza lokhu kube mnandi nakakhulu. Ungakwazi yini ukugijima uye endaweni ethile? Shintshanani ekubeni abaqeqeshi? Khuthazanani ngomklomelo omncane wamahhala?

SourceText:
* The first person gets to choose or sing a song.
* Everyone else must guess the name of the tune (to make it harder they can guess the singer).
* The first one to guess it right becomes the next leader.
text:
* Umuntu wokuqala nguye okhethayo noma ocula ingoma.
* Wonke omunye umuntu kumelwe aqagele igama lengoma (ukuze akwenze kube nzima angathi niqagele igama lomculi).
Owokuqala ukuyiqagela kahle uzoba ngumholi olandelayo.

SourceText:
This game is best with at least 3 people.
* Start in a circle and pass one “snap” around the circle (or a “clap” if you cannot snap).
* You “snap” once to throw the “snap”, and once to catch it. Look at the person you are throwing it to.  
* The direction (up, down, straight, curved, rolling the ground) and force (hard, soft, medium) that you throw the snap should affect how the person catches it.  
* You can bounce the “snap”, throw it in the air, and catch it a few times before passing it.  
* When everyone gets good at this, you can start moving around the room, still passing the “snap”.  
* Can you throw under the leg? Behind the back? Through your head? Intercept a pass? Have fun with the “snap”!
text:
Lo mdlalo umnandi kakhulu lapho udlalwa okungenani abantu abathathu.
* Qala endilingeni udlulise umsindo owodwa owenza ngeminwe ujilekeleze indilinga (noma ungashaya izandla kanye uma ungakwazi ukwenza umsindo ngeminwe).
* Uwenza kanye umsindo weminwe ukuze uwudlulisele komunye, bese uwenza kanye ukuze uwamukele. Bheka umuntu odlulisela umsindo kuye.  
* Indawo oqondise kuyo (phezulu, phansi, okuqondile, okutshekile, okuginqika phansi) kanye namandla (kakhulu, kancane, ngendlela ephakathi nendawo) owasebenzisayo lapho udlulisa umsindo weminwe uthinta indlela umuntu awamukela ngayo.  
* Ungashayisa umsindo odongeni, uwuphonse emoyeni, uwubambe izikhathi ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuba uwudlulisele phambili.  
* Lapho wonke umuntu esekwazi kahle ukukwenza lokhu, ningahambahamba egumbuni nilokhu niqhubeka ngokudlulisela umsindo weminwe.  
* Ungakwazi yini ukuwuphonsa ngaphansi kwemileze? Ngemuva komhlane? Kujikeleze ikhanda? Uvimbe okuya komunye umuntu? Kujabuleleni ukudlala nge-”snap”!

SourceText:
Choose a sport or exercise to do together. Decide on a schedule. Are you going to do it every day? For how long? 

Try it out for a week. At the end of the week, ask yourself and your family these questions:
* How is it going? 
* How did you feel at the start of the week? 
* How do you feel at the end of the week? 
* What can we do differently next week?
text:
Khetha umdlalo noma ukuzivocavoca eningakwenza ndawonye. Vumelanani ngohlelo. Ingabe nizokwenza nsuku zonke? Isikhathi esingakanani? 

Kuzameni isonto elilodwa. Ekupheleni kwesonto, zibuze wena kanye nomndeni wakho le mibuzo:
* Kuhamba kanjani? 
* Uzizwe kanjani ekuqaleni kwesonto? 
* Uzizwe kanjani ekupheleni kwesonto? 
 * Yini esingayenza ngendlela ehlukile?

SourceText:
Take turns being the “leader”. Say the intro sentences to activate everyone. Then the “leader” gives an instruction and everyone does the activity as fast as possible:
* Leader: “There’s a fire on the mountain!”        
* Together: “Run, run, run!”
* Leader: “There’s a fire on the mountain!”        
* Together: “Run, run, run!”
* Leader: “Touch something red.” 
* Leader: “There’s a fire on the mountain!”        
* Together: “Run, run, run!”
* Leader: “There’s a fire on the mountain!”        
* Together: “Run, run, run!”
* Leader: “Jump up and down ten times.”
* Leader: “There’s a fire on the mountain!”        
* Together: “Run, run, run!”
* Leader: “There’s a fire on the mountain!”        
* Together: “Run, run, run!”
* Leader: “Put the shoes in the shoe rack.”
text:
Shintshanani ngokuba “umholi”. Yisho imisho eyisethulo ukuze wonke umuntu aqale. “Umholi” ube esenikeza isiqondiso bese wonke umuntu enza umsebenzi ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka:
* Umholi: “Kunomlilo phezu kwentaba!”        
* Ndawonye: “Baleka, baleka, baleka!”
* Umholi: “Kunomlilo phezu kwentaba!”        
* Ndawonye: “Baleka, baleka, baleka!”
* Umholi: “Thinta okuthile okubomvu.” 
* Umholi: “Kunomlilo phezu kwentaba!”        
* Ndawonye: “Baleka, baleka, baleka!”
* Umholi: “Kunomlilo phezu kwentaba!”        
* Ndawonye: “Baleka, baleka, baleka!”
* Umholi: “Gxuma gxuma izikhathi eziyishumi.”
* Umholi: “Kunomlilo phezu kwentaba!”        
* Ndawonye: “Baleka, baleka, baleka!”
* Umholi: “Kunomlilo phezu kwentaba!”        
* Ndawonye: “Baleka, baleka, baleka!”
* Umholi: “Beka izicathulo endaweni yokubeka izicathulo.”

SourceText:
This game is best when more than 2 people play.
* One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair or making dinner. 
* Another person asks, “What are you doing?”
* The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”  
* The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?” 

The answer must always be something different than what you are actually doing!
text:
Lo mdlalo umnandi kakhulu lapho udlalwa abantu abangaphezu kwababili.
* Umuntu oyedwa wenza sengathi wenza into ethile – ngokwesibonelo, ukukama izinwele noma ukupheka isidlo sakusihlwa. 
* Omunye umuntu uyabuza, “Wenzani?”
* Umuntu wokuqala kudingeka asho okuthile okungahlobani nokukama izinwele, ngokwesibonelo, “Ngibopha izicathulo.”  
* Umuntu wesibili ube eseqala ukwenza sengathi ubopha izicathulo kuze kubuze umuntu omusha, “Wenzani?” 

Impendulo kumelwe ihluke njalo kulokho osuke ukwenza ngempela!

SourceText:
* Shake your left hands in the air 8 times while counting to 8.
* Do it as fast and loud as you can.
* Repeat with your other hand. Repeat with both feet.
* Do it 7 times, then 6 times and continue until you get to 1.
* Everyone calls out “Crazy chicken” and does their best crazy chicken dance!
text:
* Vayiza isandla sakho sobunxele emoyeni izikhathi ezingu-8 kuyilapho ubala uze ufike ku-8.
* Kwenze ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka ubange umsindo omkhulu ngangokunokwenzeka.
* Kuphinde lokho ngesinye isandla sakho. Kuphinde ngazo zombili izinyawo.
* Kwenze izikhathi ezingu-7, bese kuba yizikhathi ezingu-6 uqhubeke njalo uze ufike ku-1.
* Wonke umuntu kumelwe amemeze athi “Inkukhu esanganayo” bese benza okusemandleni akhe ukudansa njengenkukhu esanganayo!

SourceText:
Sit down, close your eyes and listen to your breath as it goes in and out. 

Notice how you feel. 

When you are ready, open your eyes again.
text:
Hlala phansi, uvale amehlo akho bese ulalela ukuphefumula kwakho njengoba umoya ungena uphuma. 

Qaphela indlela ozizwa ngayo. 

Lapho usukulungele, phinde uvule amehlo akho.

SourceText: Try this whenever you are feeling stressed and you need a break to reconnect.
text: Zama lokhu noma nini lapho uzizwa ucindezelekile futhi udinga ukuthatha ikhefu ukuze uzole.

SourceText:
Close your eyes. 

Let's use the magic power of three to stay present and relax. 

Name three sounds you can hear right now. 
Name three smells you can smell right now. 
Name your three favourite foods. 

What are three things you can be grateful for right now? They don't have to be big.
text:
Vala amehlo akho. 

Masisebenzisa amandla omlingo ezinto ezintathu ukuze ube nokuthula futhi uzole. 

Yisho imisindo emithathu oyizwayo manje. 
Yisho amaphunga amathathu owahogelayo manje. 
Yisho ukudla okuthathu okuthanda kakhulu. 

Yiziphi izinto ezintathu ongabonga ngazo njengamanje? Akudingeki kube yizinto ezinkulu.

SourceText: At the end of a tough day, thinking of three things to be grateful for can help us find the courage to try again tomorrow.
text: Ekupheleni kosuku olunzima, ukucabanga ngezinto ezintathu ongabonga ngazo kungakusiza uthole isibindi sokuzama futhi kusasa.

SourceText:
Close your eyes and think about the day. 

Name 1 thing that you are grateful for. 
Name 1 thing that you did well. 
Name 1 thing that you love.
text:
Vala amehlo akho bese ucabanga ngosuku. 

Yisho into eyodwa obongayo ngayo. 
Yisho into eyodwa oyenze kahle. 
Yisho into eyodwa oyithandayo.

SourceText: Well done, you are a hero!
text: Wenze kahle, uyiqhawe!

SourceText:
Close your eyes. 

Use the magic power of three to stay connected and relax.

Breathe in to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe out to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe in to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe out to the count of three. 1, 2, 3.
text:
Vala amehlo akho. 

Sebenzisa amandla omlingo ezinto ezintathu ukuze ube nokuthula futhi uzole.

Donsa umoya ube ubala uze ufike ku-3. 1, 2, 3. 
Khipha umoya ube ubala uze ufike ku-3. 1, 2, 3. 
Donsa umoya ube ubala uze ufike ku-3. 1, 2, 3. 
Khipha umoya ube ubala uze ufike ku-3. 1, 2, 3.

SourceText:
Do you feel any different? Deep breathing helps our whole body and mind to calm down. 

You are a star!
text:
Ingabe ukhona umehluko owuzwayo? Ukudonsa kakhulu umoya kusiza wonke umzimba kanye nengqondo ukuba kuzole. 

Uyiqhawe!

SourceText:
Close your eyes.

Listen to your breath as it goes in and out five times.

Notice how you feel.
text:
Vala amehlo akho.

Lalela ukuphefumula kwakho njengoba udonsa umoya uphinde uwukhiphe izikhathi ezinhlanu.

Qaphela indlela ozizwa ngayo.

SourceText: When you are ready open your eyes again. You are in control!
text: Lapho usukulungele phinde uvule amehlo akho. Nguwe olawulayo!

SourceText:
Close your eyes. 

Take a minute to think about the day.

Think about one positive or fun thing you did.
Praise yourself for one thing you did well today. 
Think of one thing you can do differently tomorrow.  
Think of one thing that you are grateful for.
text:
Vala amehlo akho. 

Zinike umzuzu ukuze ucabange ngosuku.

Cabanga ngento eyodwa enhle noma emnandi oyenzile.
Zincome ngento eyodwa oyenze kahle namuhla. 
Cabanga ngento eyodwa ongayenza ngendlela ehlukile kusasa.  
Cabanga into eyodwa obongayo ngayo.

SourceText:
Close your eyes. 

Do your children ever make you feel like screaming? 

Give yourself a 10-second pause. Breath in and out slowly 5 times. 

Then try responding in a calmer way.
text:
Vala amehlo akho. 

Ingabe izingane zakho zike zikwenze uzizwe sengathi ungahayiza? 

Zinike ikhefana lemizuzwana eyishumi. Donsa umoya uwukhiphe kancane kancane izikhathi ezingu-5. 

Yibe usuzama ukuphendula ngendlela ezolile.

SourceText: Millions of parents say this helps - A LOT.
text: Izigidi zabazali zithi lokhu kuyasiza - KAKHULU.

SourceText:
Close your eyes.  

Take a moment to stop what you are doing and connect with your breath.   

What is one thing you can be grateful for right now?  
What is one thing that brings you happiness?  
What is one thing that you love?  

They don't have to be big. Sometimes the small things in life count the most!
text:
Vala amehlo akho.  

Zinike isikhathi uyeke lokho okwenzayo bese uxhumana nokuphefumula kwakho.   

Iyiphi into eyodwa ongabonga ngayo njengamanje?  
Iyiphi into eyodwa ekwenza ujabule?  
Iyiphi into eyodwa oyithandayo?  

Akudingeki kube yizinto ezinkulu. Ngezinye izikhathi izinto ezincane ekuphileni yizona ezibaluleke kakhulu!

SourceText:
Here's an activity to relax your body:  

Sit comfortably and close your eyes if you can.  
Imagine a golden ring scanning your body from your feet to your head.   
Pay attention as it moves up and down your body. Are there any areas that feel tense? Numb? Painful?   
Focus on those areas for a moment. Breathe in to the area and when you breathe out, try to let go of any tension or pain.   
Do this for a few breaths.   

Open your eyes. How does your body feel now?
text:
Nakhu ongakwenza ukuze uphumuze umzimba wakho:  

Hlala ngokunethezeka bese uvala amehlo akho uma ukwazi.  
Cabanga indilinga yegolide ihlola umzimba wakho kusukela ezinyaweni ize iyofika ekhanda.   
Naka njengoba ikhuphuka iphinde yehle emzimbeni wakho. Ingabe zikhona izindawo ozizwa ziqinile? Zindikindiki? Zibuhlungu?   
Gxila kulezo zindawo isikhashana. Donsa umoya uye kuleyo ndawo bese kuthi lapho ukhipha umoya, uzame ukudedela lokho kuqina noma ubuhlungu.   
Yenza lokhu izikhathi ezimbalwa odonsa ngazo umoya.   

Vula amehlo akho. Umzimba wakho uzizwa kanjani manje?

SourceText: You can also try this next time you find yourself lying in bed unable to sleep!
text: Ungakuzama lokhu esikhathini esizayo uma uzithola ulele embhedeni ungafikelwa ubuthongo!

SourceText:
Close your eyes.  

Notice your connection with the ground beneath you.  
What parts of your body touch the ground? What parts of your body don’t?   
Notice where it feels warm and where it feels cool.  
Feel the ground underneath you supporting you. Let your body sink into the support of the ground.
text:
Vala amehlo akho.  

Qaphela ukuxhumana kwakho nomhlaba onyathele kuwo.  
Yiziphi izitho zomzimba wakho izithinta umhlaba? Yiziphi izitho zomzimba wakho ezingawuthinti?   
Qaphela lapho kuzwakala kufudumele khona nalapho kuzwakala kubanda khona.  
Yizwa umhlabathi omi kuwo okusekelayo. Vumela umzimba wakho uzinze osizweni oluthola emhlabeni omi kuwo.

SourceText: Try this next time you feel alone or are doing a mundane activity like washing up. It can really help!
text: Kuzame lokhu esikhathini esizayo lapho uzizwa uwedwa noma lapho wenza into evamile njengokugeza. Kungasiza ngempela!

SourceText:
Sit down and close your eyes.
How many sounds can you hear?  
Listen to the sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers. 
After ten seconds, how many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear? 

Try again for another ten seconds.  
Did you hear any new sounds? Did you hear any sounds inside your own body? 
Notice how you feel now.
text:
Hlala phansi bese uvala amehlo akho.
Mingaki imisindo okwazi ukuyizwa?  
Lalela imisindo engaphakathi nengaphandle kwegumbi. Yibale ngeminywe yakho. 
Ngemva kwemizuzwana eyishumi, mingaki iminwe ephakeme? Yimiphi imisindo oyizwile? 

Phinde uzame futhi eminye imizuzwana eyishumi.  
Ingabe ikhona eminye imisindo emisha oyizwile? Ingabe ikhona imisindo oyizwile engaphakathi komzimba wakho? 
Qaphela indlela ozizwa ngayo manje.

SourceText:
Close your eyes.  

Do you every feel something so strongly that you want to run away from it?  

Instead of moving away from the feeling, let’s move towards it for a moment.  
It’s ok. Close your eyes if you feel comfortable. Take a deep breath.  

Become curious. Where are you feeling it in your body? Is it hot or cold? Hard or soft? Tight or loose?  
Ask yourself some questions. What is it telling me? What does it need? How can I be kind to myself right now?
text:
Vala amehlo akho.  

Ingabe kunomuzwa owuzwayo onamandla okwenza ufune ukuwubalekela?  

Kunokuba ubalekele indlela ozizwa ngayo, ake sisondele kuyo okwesikhashana.  
Kulungile. Vala amehlo akho uma uzizwa ukhululekile. Donsa umoya kakhulu.  

Yiba nelukuluku. Ukuzwa kuphi emzimbeni wakho? Ingabe kuyashisa noma kuyabanda? Kuqinile noma kuthambile? Kubophekile noma kukhululekile?  
Zibuze imibuzo ethile. Kungitshela ini? Kudinga ini? Ngingaba kanjani nomusa kimi njengamanje?

SourceText:
Here is something fun to help you let go of stress:   

Choose a song that reflects what you need in this moment. Do you need a gentle song to soothe your tired soul or an upbeat song to help you shake some stress out?   

Make a space and move your body to the music. Remember to breathe while you move. Let your breath and the movement go together.
text:
Nakhu okuthile okumnandi okungakusiza uqede ukucindezeleka:   

Khetha ingoma ebonisa lokho okudingayo njengamanje. Ingabe udinga ingoma epholile ukuze iwotawote umphefumulo wakho okhathele noma ingoma enesigqi esiphezulu ezokusiza ususe ukucindezeleka?   

Vula isikhala bese udansela umculo. Khumbula ukuphefumula njengoba udansa. Vumela ukuphefumula nokudansa kwakho kuhambisane.

SourceText: Even a few minutes of movement can be enough to release stress and lift your mood!
text: Imizuzu embalwa yokudansa inganela ukuqeda ukucindezeleka futhi ikwenze uzizwe ungcono!

SourceText:
Close your eyes.  
Take a moment to feel the ground under your feet. 
Think of something you feel grateful for.
Focus on your breath.
Breathe in and out.

In and out.
text:
Vala amehlo akho.  
Zinike isikhashana ukuze uzwe umhlaba onyathele kuwo. 
Cabanga ngokuthile obongayo ngakho.
Gxila ekuphefumuleni kwakho.
Donsa umoya uphinde uwukhiphe.

Donsa umoya uwukhiphe.

SourceText:
Hello! How are you feeling right now? Happy, sad, angry, excited, worried?

Notice where you feel it in your body. Notice what thoughts are connected to that feeling. Take a deep breath.
text:
Sawubona! Uzizwa kanjani njengamanje? Ujabulile, udangele, uthukuthele, uyathokoza, ukhathazekile?

Qaphela ukuthi ukuzwa kuphi emzimbeni wakho. Qaphela ukuthi yimiphi imicabango ehlobene nalowo muzwa. Donsa umoya kakhulu.

SourceText: Thank yourself for taking the time to check in with your feelings and thoughts!
text: Zibonge ngokuzinika isikhathi sokuhlola imizwa yakho nemicabango!

SourceText:
Let’s practice a calming trick that we call ‘Pause Power’. 

Plant your feet on the ground and breathe in and out three times as slowly as you can. Imagine you are smelling a flower or blowing out a candle. 

Ta Da! Pause Power!
text:
Masiprakthize iqhinga elizolisayo esilibiza ngokuthi ‘Amandla Ekhefu’. 

Beka unyawo lwakho phansi bese udonsa umoya uphinde uwukhiphe kancane kakhulu ngendlela ongakwazi ngayo izikhathi ezintathu. Zicabange uhogela imbali noma uphephetha ikhandlela. 

Nazo-ke! Amandla Ekhefu!

SourceText: This is a great trick to use when you are feeling frustrated because it will help to calm you down.
text: Leli yiqhinga elihle kakhulu ongalisebenzisa lapho uzizwa ukhungatheka ngoba lizokusiza uzole.

SourceText:
Self-praise can be really helpful, especially when we have difficult days. 

Think of your week and finish the following phrase: “This week, I am proud of myself for …” It can be anything, not just things about being a parent!

Think of one thing you did well today. Now wrap your arms around yourself and give yourself a big HUG!
text:
Ukuzincoma kungasiza kakhulu, ikakhulukazi lapho sinezinsuku ezinzima. 

Cabanga ngesonto lakho bese uqedela la magama alandelayo: “Kuleli sonto, ngiyaziqhenya ngami ngenxa…” Kungaba yinoma yini, hhayi nje kuphela izinto ezimayelana nokuba kwakho umzali!

Cabanga ngento eyodwa oyenze kahle namuhla. Manje songa izandla zakho kuwe UZANGE!

SourceText:
Sit comfortably and close your eyes. 

Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?

Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest. Say the following words silently to yourself:

May I be peaceful.
May I be safe.
May I be healthy.
May I be happy.
May there be love in my family.
May I feel loved.
text: Hlala ngokunethezeka bese uvala amehlo akho. Qaphela lokho okwenzekayo kuwe njengamanje. Yini oyicabangayo? Ingabe imicabango yakho mihle noma mibi. Uzizwa kanjani? Ingabe uzizwa ujabule noma ungajabule? Umzimba wakho uzizwa kanjani? Ingabe uzizwa ubophekile noma ukhululekile? Xhumana nenhliziyo yakho ngendlela enomusa nemnene. Ungase ufune ukubeka isandla esisodwa enhliziyweni yakho noma esifubeni. Buthule yisho la mazwi alandelayo kuwe: Kwangathi ngingaba nokuthula. Kwangathi ngingaphepha. Kwangathi ngingaba nempilo enhle. Kwangathi ngingajabula. Kwangathi kungaba nothando emndenini wami. Kwangathi ngingazizwa ngithandwa.

SourceText: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Notice if you feel any different.
text: Zinike isikhathi sokucabanga ngokwenzeke kuwe. Qaphela ukuthi ukhona yini umehluko owuzwayo.

SourceText:
Step 1. Close your eyes and take a deep breath. 

Step 2. Ask yourself, "What am I thinking?" Notice if your thoughts are positive or negative.
Notice how you are feeling emotionally. Notice if your emotions are pleasant or unpleasant. Remind yourself that whatever you feel, it is okay.
Notice how your body feels. Notice anything that hurts or is tense.

Step 3. Focus on your breath. Feel your breath as it goes in and out. You can put a hand on your stomach and feel it rise and fall with each breath. Do this for about 10 breaths.

Step 4. Expand your awareness to your whole body. Listen to the sounds in the room. 

Step 5. Take a moment to reflect on whether you feel any different. When you are ready, open your eyes.
text:
Isinyathelo 1. Vala amehlo akho bese udonsa umoya kakhulu. 

Isinyathelo 2. Zibuze, "Yini engiyicabangayo?" Qaphela ukuthi imicabango yakho mihle noma mibi yini.
Qaphela ukuthi uzizwa kanjani ngokomzwelo. Qaphela ukuthi imizwelo yakho eyenjabulo noma cha. Zikhumbuze ukuthi kungakhathaliseki ukuthi uzizwa kanjani, kulungile.
Qaphela indlela umzimba wakho ozizwa ngayo. Qaphela noma yini ebuhlungu noma ebophekile.

Isinyathelo 3. Gxila ekuphefumuleni kwakho. Yizwa ukuphefumula kwakho njengoba udonsa umoya uphinde uwukhiphe. Ungabeka isandla esiswini sakho futhi usizwe sikhukhumala siphinde sehle isikhathi ngasinye uphefumula. Kwenze lokhu izikhathi eziyishumi odonsa ngazo umoya.

Isinyathelo 4. Khulisa indlela oqaphela ngayo umzimba wakho wonke. Lalela imisindo esegumbini. 

Isinyathelo 5. Zinike isikhathi sokuhlola ukuthi ukhona yini umehluko owuzwayo. Lapho usukulungele, vula amehlo akho.

SourceText: Well done for Taking a Pause. You can do this anytime you are feeling stressed. It gives you a chance to be calmer. Even a few deep breaths or connecting with the ground beneath you can make a difference. You can also Take a Pause with your Children!
text: Siyakuhalalisela Ngokuthatha Ikhefu. Lokhu ungakwenza noma nini lapho uzizwa ucindezelekile. Kukunika ithuba lokuzola. Ngisho nokudonsa umoya izikhathi ezimbalwa noma ukuxhumana nomhlaba omi kuwo kungenza umehluko. Ungathatha Ikhefu Nezingane Zakho!

SourceText:
Stand up and stretch your arms up to the sky. Push away any clouds and let the sun shine down on you. Stretch to both sides. Stretch to the front and to the back.

Let your hand hang by your side. Squeeze your shoulders tightly up to your ears as you breathe in, scrunch your eyes, and hold your breath. Release your shoulders as you relax your body.

Relax your arms and let your arms to swing sideways, and turn your upper body. Your arms should gently hit your back as you twist from side to side.

Place one foot in front of the other and make small circles from ankles, remember to turn to both sides. Do each foot with four circles in each direction.

Now shake your whole body as fast as you can. Shake it up high! Shake it down low! Shake it all around!

Close your eyes and raise your arms slowly above your head as you breathe in. Lower your arms slowly to your side as you breathe out.

Take a moment to reflect on your experience.
text:
Yima bese ulula izingalo zibheke phezulu esibhakabhakeni. Sunduza noma yimaphi amafu bese uvumela ilanga likukhanyise. Zelule kuzo zombili izinhlangothi. Zilulele phambili nasemuva.

Lengisa isandla sakho eceleni. Cindezela amahlombe akhuphuke afike ezindlebeni njengoba udonsa umoya, hlikilhla amehlo akho bese ubamba ukuphefumula kwakho. Yehlisa amahlombe akho njengoba ukhulula umzimba wakho.

Khulula izingalo zakho futhi uzivumele zilenge emaceleni futhi uphendule ingxenye engenhla yomzimba wakho. Izingalo zakho kufanele zishaye kancane umgogodla wakho njengoba utshikiza, ujikajika.

Beka unyawo olulodwa phambi kolunye bese ujikajikisa amaqakala, ukhumbule ukuphendukela ezinhlangothini zombili. Yenza lokho onyaweni ngalunye ngezindilinga ezine ohlangothini ngalunye.

Manje nyakazisa wonke umzimba ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka. Gxumagxuma uye phezulu kakhulu! Guqa uye phansi kakhulu! Ushukumise yonke indawo!

Vala amehlo akho bese uphakamise izingalo zakho kancane kancane ziye ngaphezu kwekhanda lakho njengoba udonsa umoya. Yehlisela izingalo zakho ohlangothini kancane kancane njengoba ukhipha umoya.

Zinike isikhathi sokucabanga ngokwenzeke kuwe.

SourceText: Well done! You can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need to release stress and energise your mind and body.
text: Wenze kahle! Ungenza lo msebenzi nganoma yisiphi isikhathi lapho uzizwa unesidingo sokunciphisa ukucindezeleka futhi uqinise ingqondo kanye nomzimba.

SourceText:
Make a list of healthy activities that you like to do. Here are some suggestions:
* Listening to your favourite music
* Going for a walk (if allowed)
* Doing some exercise
* Drinking a cup of tea by yourself
* Calling up a friend
* Singing, dancing, praying, or reading
* Sitting in the sun with your eyes closed
* Watching your favourite T.V. show

Pick one and do it today!
text:
Yenza uhlu lwezinto ongazenza ezinempilo ongathanda ukuzenza. Nanka amacebiso amabalwa:
* Ukulalela umculo wakho owuthandayo
* Ukuhambahamba ngaphandle (uma kuvumelekile)
* Ukuzivocavoca
* Ukuphuza inkomishi yetiye uwedwa
* Ukushayela umngane
* Ukucula, ukudansa, ukuthandaza noma ukucula
* Ukuhlala elangeni uvale amehlo akho
* Ukubukela uhlelo lwe-T.V oluthandayo

Khetha okokudwa ukwenze namuhla!

SourceText: When you take care of yourself, you take care of your children. We all need to connect. Try to talk to friends, family, and other support networks every day. If it has been a while since you reached out to someone, do it now!
text: Lapho uzinakekela, usuke unakekela izingane zakho. Sonke sidinga ukuxhuma. Zama ukuxoxa nsuku zonke nabangane, umndeni, kanye nezinye izinhlaka ezinikeza usizo. Sekuyisikhathi wagcina ukuxhumana nothile, yenza lokho manje!

SourceText:
Think about what makes you angry? When does it happen? How do you normally react?

Prevent anger from starting in the first place. Get some sleep or rest when you are tired. Try to eat something when you are hungry. Ask someone for support when you are feeling alone.
text:
Cabanga ngalokho okukwenza uthukuthele? Kwenzeka nini? Ngokuvamile usabela kanjani?

Zisuka nje gwema ukuthi uthukuthele. Lala noma uphumule lapho ukhathele. Zama ukudla okuthile lapho ulambile. Cela othile ukuba akusekele lapho uzizwa uwedwa.

SourceText:
Managing anger can be really difficult. Take a break when you feel you are getting angry at your children or someone else.

Go somewhere else for 5 minutes to regain control of your emotions. If you have safe outdoor space, go outside. You can get through this!
text:
Ukulawula intukuthelo kungaba nzima kakhulu. Thatha ikhefu lapho uzwa ukuthi uqala ukuthukuthelela izingane zakho noma omunye umuntu.

Hamba uye kwenye indawo imizuzu emihlanu ukuze ukwazi ukulawula imizwelo yakho. Uma unendawo ephephile ngaphandle, yiya ngaphandle. Ungadlula kulokhu!

SourceText: Quick Parenting Tips
text: Amacebiso Asheshayo Okuba Umzali

SourceText: Raising teens can be hard, and we all struggle sometimes.
text: Ukukhulisa intsha kungase kube nzima, futhi sonke sidonsa kanzima ngezinye izikhathi.

SourceText: What is the main challenge you are experiencing right now?
text: Iyiphi inselele eyinhloko obhekene nayo njengamanje?

SourceText: My relationship with my teen is not good
text: Ubudlelwane nengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili abubuhle

SourceText: My teen’s behaviour is difficult
text: Ukuziphatha kwengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kuyinkinga

SourceText: I feel stressed, lonely, angry
text: Ngizizwa ngicindezelekile, nginomzwangendwa, ngithukuthele

SourceText: I have money worries
text: Ngikhathazeke ngemali

SourceText: I worry about my teen’s safety
text: Ngikhathazeka ngokuphepha kwengane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili

SourceText: We often fight in our family
text: Sivame ukulwa emndenini wami

SourceText: I have a different problem…
text: Nginenkinga ehlukile…

SourceText: Building a better relationship starts with spending time together - even 5 minutes a day makes a difference! At first, it can be hard to spend time together, as we are all busy and our teens can be in a bad mood sometimes. But spending even 5 minutes a day of focused time with your teen helps to build trust. Try asking your teen what they would like to do together. It can be fun and relaxing for you too!
text: Ukwakha ubuhlobo obungcono kuqala ngokuchitha isikhathi ndawonye - ngisho nemizuzu emihlanu ngosuku iyawenza umehluko! Ekuqaleni, kungase kube nzima ukuchitha isikhathi ndawonye, njengoba sonke simatasa futhi izingane zethu ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili zingase zizizwe zingeneme ngezinye izikhathi. Kodwa ukuchitha ngisho nemizuzu engu-5 ngosuku ugxile enganeni yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kuyasiza ekwakheni ukwethembana. Zama ukubuza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi yini engathanda niyenze ndawonye. Kungaba mnandi futhi kukukhulule nawe!

SourceText: You can get more support on how to spend one-on-one time with your teen here:
text: Ungathola ukusekelwa okwengeziwe ngokuphathelene nendlela yokuchitha isikhathi nobabili nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili lapha:

SourceText: All teenagers sometimes behave just horribly! One thing that can help with teenage behaviour is to praise them any time that they do something good – however small. Teens may not look like they want or seek your praise but they still really, really do.
text: Yonke intsha ngezinye izikhathi iziphatha ngendlela engathandeki! Into eyodwa engasiza ekuziphatheni kwengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuncoma ingane yakho noma nini lapho yenza kahle - noma ngabe kuncane kanjani. Izingane ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili zingabukeka sengathi azikuthandi ukunconywa nguwe kodwa empeleni zikuthanda ngempela.

SourceText: You can get more support here on how to encourage good behaviour through praising:
text: Ungathola ukwesekwa okwengeziwe lapha mayelana nendlela yokukhuthaza ukuziphatha kahle ngokuncoma:

SourceText: Parenting stress is really high right now. We know exactly how overwhelming life can be. Doing something for yourself can reduce your stress. You deserve it! And when you feel overwhelmed, take back control over your body by taking five slow, deep breaths before responding. Lots of parents found this helpful.
text: Ukucindezeleka kokuba umzali kuphezulu kakhulu njengamanje. Siyazi ukuthi ukuphila kungakhungathekisa kangakanani. Ukuzenzela ento ethile kunganciphisa ukucindezeleka kwakho. Kukufanele lokhu! Lapho uzizwa ukhungathekile, zilawule ngokuthi udonse umoya ngokunensa kahlanu ngaphambi kokuba uphendule. Abazali abaningi bathole lokhu kuwusizo.

SourceText: You can get more support on how to take care of yourself here:
text: Ungathola ukusekelwa okwengeziwe mayelana nendlela ongazinakekela ngayo lapha:

SourceText: You are not alone. Money stress is so hard for parents. Try talking to your teen about how much money comes in and what you need to spend money on as a family each month. This can help them to understand why you cannot afford something they want. And when everyone understands where the money goes, it is easier to agree on where you can save together too!
text: Awuwedwa. Ukucindezeleka okubangelwa yimali kunzima kakhulu kubazali. Zama ukukhuluma nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngokuthi ingakanani imali engenayo nokuthi yini okudingeka nisebenzise imali kuyo njengomndeni inyanga ngayinye. Lokhu kungayisiza iqonde ukuthi kungani ungeke ukwazi ukuthenga okuthile ekufunayo. Lapho wonke umuntu eqonda ukuthi imali iyaphi, kulula ukuvumelana nangokuthi ningayonga kanjani imali ndawonye!

SourceText: You can get more support on how to budget and save here:
text: Ungathola ukusekelwa okwengeziwe mayelana nokwenza isabelomali nokonga imali lapha:

SourceText: Teens spend a lot of time outside the house or online, where it is harder for us to keep them safe - many parents worry about this. Try to start a conversation with your teen about safe and unsafe places in your community and online (you might need to try a few times). They may even know some you do not. This can start to help you make a plan together about how to stay safe.
text: Intsha ichitha isikhathi esiningi ingaphandle noma iku-inthanethi, lapho kunzima khona ngathi ukuba siyigcine iphephile - abazali abaningi bakhathazeka ngalokhu. Zama ukuqala ingxoxo nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngezindawo eziphephile nezingaphephile emphakathini wakho naku-inthanethi (kungase kudingeke ukuba uzame izikhathi ezimbalwa). Kungenzeka yazi nalezo wena ongazazi. Lokhu kungakusiza ukuba nenze uhlelo ndawonye lwendlela yokuzigcina niphephile.

SourceText: You can get more support on how to keep your teen safe here:
text: Ungathola ukusekelwa okwengeziwe mayelana nokugcina ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphephile lapha:

SourceText: When a problem comes up, try to talk about it together. What is the problem exactly? What different solutions are there and what are the consequences of one? That way, you can find a solution that can be OK for everyone.
text: Uma kuvela inkinga, zamani ukukhuluma ngayo ndawonye. Iyini kahle hle inkinga? Yiziphi izixazululo ezikhona kanti yimiphi imiphumela yesixazululo ngasinye? Ngaleyo ndlela, ungathola isixazululo esingafanela wonke umuntu.

SourceText: You can get more support on how to solve problems together here:
text: Ungathola ukwesekwa okwengeziwe mayelana nendlela yokuxazulula izinkinga lapha:

SourceText:
It is not easy to look after our families. We all have challenges sometimes, but we hope this app will help you navigate them well. @global.parent_app is based on ten years of experience running parenting programmes in South Africa, and thousands of parents have found that the tips that are shared help with many parenting challenges. We hope this app will help you and your family too.

Here are some of the key proven tips for you:
text:
Akulula ukunakekela imindeni yethu. Sonke sibhekana nezinselele ngezikhathi ezithile, kodwa le-app izokusiza ubhekane nazo ngokuphumelelayo. @global.parent_app isekelwe ocwaningweni lweminyaka eyishumi lwezinhlelo zokukhulisa izingane eNingizimu Afrika, futhi izinkulungwane zabazali ziye zathola ukuthi amacebiso anikezwayo ayasiza ekubhekaneni nezinselele eziningi zokukhulisa izingane. Sinethemba lokuthi le-app izokusiza kanye nomndeni wakho.

Nanka amanye amacebiso ayinhloko avivinyiwe angakusiza:
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText: Customise for your needs
text: Hlela ngendlela evumelana nezidingo zakho

SourceText:
Every parent in the world is struggling in these hard times. The next questions about your parenting experiences will help us to get you the support you need.

Be honest. Remember that you are not alone! Millions of parents feel like you do, and we all deserve support.
text:
Wonke umzali emhlabeni uthwele kanzima kulezi zikhathi ezinzima. Imibuzo elandelayo emayelana nobhekana nakho njengomzali izosisiza sikutholele ukwesekwa okudingayo.

Yiba qotho. Khumbula ukuthi awuwedwa! Izigidi zabazali zizizwa njengawe, futhi sonke siyakufanelekela ukwesekwa.

SourceText: It is hard to find time to have fun with your teenager.
text: Kunzima ukuthola isikhathi sokuzijabulisa nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: How many days in the past week were you able to give them your attention and do something that they enjoyed with them?
text: Zingaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule okwazile ngazo ukunaka izingane zakho kanye nokwenza nazo okuthile ezikujabulelayo?

SourceText: This is a very stressful time for families.
text: Lesi yisikhathi esicindezela kakhulu emindenini.

text: Zingaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule ozizwe ngazo ucindezeleke kakhulu njengomzali/njengomnakekeli?

SourceText: Sometimes our children make us really upset.
text: Ngezinye izikhathi izingane zethu zisithukuthelisa kakhulu.

SourceText: How many days in the past week did you shout, scream or yell at your teen?
text: Zingaki izinsuku phakathi nesonto elidlule lapho khona uye wamemeza, waklabalasa noma wathethisa ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili?

SourceText: Money is one of the biggest stresses for families now.
text: Imali ingenye yezinto ezicindezela imindeni kakhulu manje.

SourceText: How many days in the past week have you worried or felt anxious about money?
text: Zingaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule oye wakhathazeka ngazo noma wazizwa ukhathazekile ngemali?

text: Zingaki izinsuku enyangeni edlule (izinsuku ezingu-30) oye waphelelwa kuzo yimali yokuthenga ukudla?

SourceText: It is so stressful when children misbehave.
text: Kucindezela kakhulu lapho izingane zingalaleli.

SourceText: In the past week, did you physically discipline your children by hitting, spanking, or slapping with your hand or an object like a stick or a belt?
text: Esontweni elidlule, ingabe ujezise izingane zakho ngokuzishaya ngesandla sakho noma ngento enjengenduku noma ibhande?

SourceText: It is wonderful that you are responding calmly when your teen does something upsetting. They can learn so much from you!
text: Kuhle ukuthi usabela ngokuzola lapho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili yenza okuthile okucasulayo. Zingafunda lukhulu kuwe!

text: Zingaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule obuwazi ngazo ukuthi ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili yenzani nokuthi ibinobani?

SourceText: We all want to keep our children safe.
text: Sonke sifuna ukugcina izingane zethu ziphephile.

SourceText: How many days in the past month (30 days) did you talk with your teen about keeping safe from sexual violence online or offline?
text: Zingaki izinsuku enyangeni edlule (izinsuku ezingu-30) okhulume ngazo nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngokuzigcina iphephile ekuhlukunyezweni ngokocansi ku-inthanethi noma ekuphileni okungokoqobo?

SourceText: This could be when they are going out with friends, or talking about the websites they use.
text: Lokhu kungaba lapho zizikhipha nabangane noma lapho nikhuluma ngamawebusayithi eziwasebenzisayo.

SourceText: We have a new challenge now – keeping our teenagers safe from COVID-19.
text: Sinenselele entsha manje – ukugcina intsha yethu iphephile ku-COVID-19.

SourceText: How many days last week did your teenager stay safe through wearing a mask, keeping a distance from people and keeping away from crowded places?
text: Zingaki izinsuku ngesonto elidlule ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili eye yahlala ngazo iphephile ngokufaka isifonyo, ukuqhela kwabanye abantu nokungayi ezindaweni ezinezixuku?

SourceText: It can be challenging to keep your teen safe in COVID! We are putting together some advice - you will soon be able to access it in the @global.parent_centre.
text: Kungaba nzima ukugcina ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphephile ku-COVID! Sisahlanganisa ezinye izeluleko - maduze uzokwazi ukusithola ku @global.parent_centre.

SourceText: That’s great. We are putting together some advice for keeping your teen safe in COVID - you will soon be able to access it in the @global.parent_centre.

SourceText: Thank you for being honest

SourceText: We know this is hard. You can review some helpful tips on how you can spend time with your teen under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text or you can have another look at the @data.workshop.w_1on1.in_text_title.
text: Siyazi ukuthi kunzima lokho. Ungahlola amacebiso athile awusizo endlela ongachitha ngayo isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ngaphansi kwe-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text noma ungaphinde uhlole i-@data.workshop.w_1on1.in_text_title.

SourceText: Well done for laying such a good foundation! You can always review the @data.workshop.w_1on1.in_text_title to get more ideas on how to spend time together.

SourceText:

We all feel overwhelmed sometimes, and continuing to use @global.parent_app is a great step to help you and your family!

Our materials have helped thousands of parents and families to be less stressed and have more positive time together. We are here to support you.
