SourceText:
This is a real concern for parents everywhere. Remember to use your new skills to continue to build good communication with your teen. 

You can review core tips on planning for your teen’s safety in the @global.weekly_workshop or under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text!
text:
Lokhu kubakhathaza ngempela abazali yonke indawo. Khumbula ukusebenzisa amakhono akho amasha ukuze uqhubeke wakha ukukhulumisana okuhle nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. 

Ungahlola amacebiso ayinhloko okuhlela ukuphepha kwengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ku-@global.weekly_workshop noma ngaphansi kwe-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text!

SourceText: Great that you are aware of what your teen is doing. Parenting is hard, but you’re really succeeding in this to keep them safe.
text: Kuhle ukuthi uyakwazi lokho okwenziwa yingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Ukuba umzali kunzima, kodwa uyaphumelela ngempela ekugcineni ingane yakho iphephile.

SourceText:
Being a parent is not easy. It can be difficult to know how to keep our teens safe. We often feel powerless as parents in this, but we are here to support you!

Remember, you can find focused tools, extra content and resources on this in the @global.parent_centre at any time. You can also review core tips on rules and safety planning under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
text:
Ukuba umzali akulula. Kungase kube nzima ukwazi indlela yokugcina intsha yethu iphephile. Ngokuvamile sizizwa singenamandla njengabazali kulokhu, kodwa silapha ukuze sikusekele!

Khumbula, ungathola amathuluzi agxilile kokuthile, okuqukethwe okwengeziwe kanye nezinsiza kwi-@global.parent_centre nganoma yisiphi isikhathi. Ungahlola namacebiso amayelana nemithetho nokuhlela ezokuphepha ngaphansi kokuthi @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.

SourceText:
Being a parent is not easy. It can be difficult to know how to keep our teens safe. We often feel powerless as parents in this, but we are here to support you! Remember, you can find focused tools, extra content and resources on this in the @global.parent_centre at any time. 

You can also review core tips on making rules under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
text:
Ukuba umzali akulula. Kungase kube nzima ukwazi indlela yokugcina intsha yethu iphephile. Ngokuvamile sizizwa singenamandla njengabazali kulokhu, kodwa silapha ukuze sikusekele! Khumbula, ungathola amathuluzi agxilile kokuthile, okuqukethwe okwengeziwe kanye nezinsiza kwi-@global.parent_centre nganoma yisiphi isikhathi. 

Ungahlola namacebiso ayinhloko okubeka imithetho ngaphansi kokuthi @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.

SourceText:
Being a parent is not easy. Well done for focusing on keeping your teen safe. 

Remember, you can find more support on this in the @data.workshop.w_safe.in_text_title whenever you need it!
text:
Ukuba umzali akulula. Wenze kahle ngokugxila ekugcineni ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphephile. 

Khumbula, ungathola ukusekelwa okwengeziwe mayelana nalokhu ku-@data.workshop.w_safe.in_text_title noma nini lapho ukudinga!
note: The string @data.workshop.w_safe.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Remember you can access lots of helpful tips and resources in the @global.parent_centre - this is available for you at any time!
text: Khumbula ungathola amacebiso amaningi awusizo kanye nezinsiza ku-@global.parent_centre - lokhu ungakuthola noma nini!
note: The string @global.parent_centre should not be translated.

SourceText: Are there teens in your family?
text: Ingabe uyingane eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili emndenini wakini?

SourceText: This app focuses on families with teenagers age @global.teen_age_bracket, but you are welcome to continue - you may learn useful things for your family too!
text: Le-app igxila emindenini enezingane ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili @global.teen_age_bracket, kodwa uvumelekile ukuba uqhubeke - nawe ungafunda izinto eziwusizo emndenini wakho!
note: The string @global.teen_age_bracket should not be translated.

SourceText: Are there adults in your family?
text: Ingabe ungumuntu omdala emndenini wakho?

SourceText: This app focuses on parents of teenagers age @global.teen_age_bracket, but you are welcome to continue - you may learn useful things too!
text: Le-app igxila kubazali bezingane ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili @global.teen_age_bracket, kodwa uvumelekile ukuba uqhubeke - nawe ungafunda izinto eziwusizo!
note: The string @global.teen_age_bracket should not be translated.

SourceText: Are you sure you want to skip this question?
text: Ingabe uyaqiniseka ukuthi ufuna ukuweqa lo mbuzo?

SourceText:
Remember, if you DO answer, your answer stays anonymous.

You can always choose not to answer a question by checking the check box next to the slider.
text:
Khumbula, UMA uwuphendula, impendulo yakho ngeke idalule igama lakho.

Ungakhetha ukungawuphenduli umbuzo ngokuthikha ibhokisi eliseduze ne-slider.

SourceText: You selected "I would rather not answer"
text: Ukhethe okuthi "Ngithanda ukungaphenduli"

SourceText:
That's okay!

Remember, if you DO answer, your answer stays anonymous and you will receive content that is exactly right for you!
text:
Kulungile!

Khumbula, UMA uphendula, impendulo yakho ngeke idalule igama lakho futhi uzothola okuqukethwe okulungele wena!

SourceText:
We know this is hard. We have added some helpful tips on how you can spend time with your teen to @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text, so you can access it right away. 

Because @data.workshop.w_1on1.title builds the foundation for all other parenting tools,  it will be the @global.weekly_workshop you receive next week!
text:
Siyazi ukuthi kunzima lokho. Senezele amacebiso awusizo endlela ongachitha ngayo isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuze @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text, uzokwazi ukuwafinyelela ngokushesha. 

Ngenxa yokuthi i-@data.workshop.w_1on1.title yakha isisekelo sawo wonke amanye amathuluzi okuba umzali, izoba yi-@global.weekly_workshop ozoyithola ngesonto elizayo!

SourceText: Well done! Our next @global.weekly_workshop  will give you more ideas for this, as a foundation for all the other parenting tools. But you already have a great start!
text: Wenze kahle! @global.weekly_workshop kwethu okulandelayo kuzokunikeza amacebiso engeziwe alokhu, njengesisekelo sawo wonke amathuluzi okuba umzali. Kodwa usunesiqalo esihle kakade!
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop should not be translated.

SourceText:
Using this app shows that you care about your teen. We have added some essential tools on how to use praise to @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text for quick access.

In our @data.workshop.w_praise.in_text_title you will learn even more on how to use this skill well.
text:
Ukusebenzisa le-app kubonisa ukuthi uyayikhathalela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Sifake amanye amathuluzi abalulekile endlela yokusebenzisa ukuncoma ku-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text ukuze ukuthole ngokushesha.

Ku-@data.workshop.w_praise.in_text_title yethu, uzofunda okwengeziwe ngendlela yokusebenzisa leli khono kahle.

SourceText: Wonderful that you are praising your teen! This helps them feel valued – your encouragement means a lot. In our @data.workshop.w_praise.in_text_title you will learn even more how to use this skill well.
text: Kuhle ukuthi uyayincoma ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili! Lokhu kuzisiza zizizwe zibalulekile – isikhuthazo sakho sisho lukhulu. Ku-@data.workshop.w_praise.in_text_title yethu, uzofunda okwengeziwe ngendlela yokusebenzisa leli khono kahle.
note: The string @data.workshop.w_praise.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText:
Great that this has been a good week!

We will remind you regularly to relax, recognise and reward yourself, to help you continue to manage your stress and feel calm.
text:
Kuhle ukuthi leli kube yisonto elihle!

Sizokukhumbuza njalo ukuba uphumule, uziqaphele futhi uzivuze, ukuze sikusize uqhubeke ulawula ukucindezeleka kwakho futhi uzizwe uzolile.

SourceText:
Great that you felt calm most of the week! 

We will remind you regularly to relax, recognise and reward yourself, to help you continue to manage your stress and feel calm.
text:
Kuhle ukuthi uzizwe uzolile izinsuku eziningi phakathi nesonto! 

Sizokukhumbuza njalo ukuba uphumule, uziqaphele futhi uzivuze, ukuze sikusize uqhubeke ulawula ukucindezeleka kwakho futhi uzizwe uzolile.

SourceText:
We understand how stressful life can be. We will remind you regularly to relax, recognise and reward yourself, to help manage your stress and feel calmer.

We will learn more about managing stress in week @data.workshop.w_stress.number of the @global.weekly_workshops - but you can already access some helpful tools under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text to get you started!
text:
Siyayiqonda indlela ukuphila okungacindezela ngayo. Sizokukhumbuza nsuku zonke ukuba uphumule, uqaphele futhi uzivuze, ukuze sikusize uqhubeke ulawula ukucindezeleka kwakho futhi uzizwe uzolile.

Sizofunda okuningi ngokulawula ukucindezeleka esontweni @data.workshop.w_stress.number le-@global.weekly_workshops - kodwa kakade ungakwazi ukufinyelela amathuluzi awusizo ngaphansi kwe-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text ukuze uqalise!

SourceText: Well done. Brain science shows that controlling your anger improves your teen’s brain development. Be proud of yourself.
text: Wenze kahle. Isayensi yengqondo ibonisa ukuthi ukulawula intukuthelo yakho kuthuthukisa ukukhula kwengqondo yengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Ziqhenye ngawe ngokwakho.

SourceText:
Thank you for being honest. It can be so difficult to control our stress. To look after yourself and help you feel calmer when things get tough, we’ll remind you regularly to relax, recognise and reward yourself. You matter!

We will learn more about managing stress in week @data.workshop.w_stress.number of the @global.weekly_workshops, but you can already access some helpful tools under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text to get started.
text:
Siyakubonga ngokuba qotho. Kungaba nzima kakhulu ukulawula ukucindezeleka kwethu. Ukuze uzinakekele futhi sikusize uhlale uzolile lapho izimo ziba nzima, sizokukhumbuza njalo ukuba uphumule, uziqaphele futhi uzivuze. Ubalulekile!

Sizofunda okuningi ngokulawula ukucindezeleka esontweni @data.workshop.w_stress.number le-@global.weekly_workshops, kodwa kakade ungakwazi ukufinyelela amathuluzi awusizo ngaphansi kwe-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text ukuze uqalise.

SourceText: Thank you for being honest. It can be so difficult to control our stress. We hope our stress management tools will be useful to you. You can already find them under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
text: Siyakubonga ngokuba qotho. Kungaba nzima kakhulu ukulawula ukucindezeleka kwethu. Sithemba ukuthi amathuluzi ethu okulawula ukucindezeleka azoba usizo kuwe. Ungawathola kakade ngaphansi kokuthi @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
note: The string @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text should not be translated.

SourceText: Great. We have a workshop on family budgeting that can help with money stress more generally, and reduce money-related arguments.
text: Kuhle. Sinokuqeqeshwa okumayelana nokwenza isabelomali somndeni okungakusiza ngengcindezi yemali kabanzana, futhi kunciphise izingxabano ezihilela imali.

SourceText:
Money stress can be overwhelming. 

We have a workshop on family budgeting in five weeks, but you can already access some core family budgeting tips under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text!
text:
Ingcindezi yemali ingakhungathekisa. 

Sinokuqeqeshwa okumayelana nokwenza isabelomali somndeni emasontweni amahlanu, kodwa ungawathola kakade amacebiso ayinhloko esabelomali somndeni ngaphansi kwe-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text!
note: The string @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text should not be translated.

SourceText:
Thank you for being honest – and we’re sorry you’re having a difficult time with your teen. To look after yourselves and help you feel calmer when things get tough, we’ll remind you every day to relax, recognise and reward yourself. You matter!

We will learn more about managing stress in week 5 of the @global.weekly_workshops, but you can already access some helpful tools under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text to get started.
text:
Siyakubonga ngokuba qotho – siyaxolisa ngokuthi ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikuthwalise kanzima. Ukuze nizinakekele futhi sinisize nizizwe nizolile lapho izimo ziba nzima, sizonikhumbuza nsuku zonke ukuba niphumule, niqaphele futhi nizivuze. Ubalulekile!

Sizofunda okuningi ngokulawula ukucindezeleka esontweni 5 @global.weekly_workshops, kodwa kakade ungakwazi ukufinyelela amathuluzi awusizo ngaphansi kokuthi @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text ukuze uqale.

SourceText:
Thank you for being honest – and we’re sorry you’re having a difficult time with your teen. 

We all feel overwhelmed sometimes, and using @global.parent_app is a great step to help you and your family!

Our materials have helped thousands of parents and families to be less stressed and have more positive time together. We are here to support you.
text:
Siyakubonga ngokuba qotho – siyaxolisa ngokuthi ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikuthwalise kanzima. 

Sonke sizizwa sikhungathekile ngezinye izikhathi, futhi ukusebenzisa i @global.parent_app kuyisinyathelo esihle sokusiza wena nomndeni wakho!

Amathuluzi ethu aye asiza izinkulungwane zabazali kanye nemindeni ukuba ingacindezeleki kakhulu futhi ichithe isikhathi esimnandi ndawonye. Silapha ukuze sikusekele.
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText:
Thank you for being honest – and we’re sorry you’re having a difficult time with your teen. 

We hope our stress management tools will help you to feel calmer in hard situations. You can find them under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
text:
Siyakubonga ngokuba qotho – siyaxolisa ngokuthi ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ikuthwalise kanzima. 

Sinethemba lokuthi amathuluzi ethu okulawula ukucindezeleka azokusiza uzizwe uzolile ezimweni ezinzima. Ungawathola ngaphansi kokuthi-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
note: The string @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text should not be translated.

SourceText:
This is a real concern for parents everywhere. We’ll make sure you get support with building communication. 

We’ll talk more about planning for your teen’s safety later in the @global.weekly_workshops, but you can already access some first core tips to keep your teen safe under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text!
text:
Lokhu kubakhathaza ngempela abazali yonke indawo. Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi uthola ukwesekwa ngokwakha ukukhulumisana. 

Sizokhuluma kabanzi ngokuhlela ukuphepha kwengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kamuva ku @global.weekly_workshops, kodwa ungawathola kakade amanye amacebiso ayisisekelo okugcina ingane yakho iphephile ngaphansi kokuthi @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text!

SourceText: This is really great. Parenting is hard, but you’re really succeeding in this.
text: Lokhu kuhle ngempela. Ukuba umzali kunzima, kodwa uyaphumelela ngempela kulokhu.

SourceText:
Being a parent is not easy. It can be difficult to know how to keep our teens safe. We often feel powerless as parents in this, but we are here to support you! You can get focused tools, extra content and resources on this in the @global.parent_centre at any time. 

You can already access some first core tips which will help with making rules and safety planning under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
text:
Ukuba umzali akulula. Kungase kube nzima ukwazi indlela yokugcina intsha yethu iphephile. Ngokuvamile sizizwa singenamandla njengabazali kulokhu, kodwa silapha ukuze sikusekele! Ungathola amathuluzi agxilile, okuqukethwe okwengeziwe kanye nezinsiza kulokhu @global.parent_centre nganoma yisiphi isikhathi. 

Ungakwazi ukuthola amacebiso athile okuqala ayinhloko azokusiza ubeke imithetho futhi uhlele ezokuphepha ngaphansi kokuthi @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.

SourceText: @data.workshop.w_rules.tools and @data.workshop.w_safe.tools added to @data.parent_centre.my_tips.title.
text: @data.workshop.w_rules.tools kanye ne-@data.workshop.w_safe.tools kufakwe ku-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.title.

SourceText:
Being a parent is not easy. It can be difficult to know how to keep our teens safe. We often feel powerless as parents in this, but we are here to support you! You can get focused tools, extra content and resources on this in the @global.parent_centre at any time. 

You can already access some first core tips which will help with making rules under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
text:
Ukuba umzali akulula. Kungase kube nzima ukwazi indlela yokugcina intsha yethu iphephile. Ngokuvamile sizizwa singenamandla njengabazali kulokhu, kodwa silapha ukuze sikusekele! Ungathola amathuluzi agxilile, okuqukethwe okwengeziwe kanye nezinsiza kulokhu @global.parent_centre nganoma yisiphi isikhathi. 

Ungakwazi ukuthola amacebiso athile okuqala ayinhloko azokusiza ubeke imithetho ngaphansi kokuthi @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.

SourceText: @data.workshop.w_rules.tools added to @data.parent_centre.my_tips.title.
text: @data.workshop.w_rules.tools ifakwe ku-@data.parent_centre.my_tips.title.

SourceText:
Being a parent is not easy. Well done for focusing on keeping your teen safe. 

We’ll have more support for you on this in the later @global.weekly_workshops if you’d like to know even more!
text:
Ukuba umzali akulula. Wenze kahle ngokugxila ekugcineni ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphephile. 

Sizokunikeza ukwesekwa okwengeziwe kulokhu kamuva ku @global.weekly_workshops uma ungathanda ukwazi okwengeziwe!
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Content unlocked by these questions is now accessible under @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
text: Okuqukethwe okuvulwa ngale mibuzo sekuyatholakala ngaphansi kokuthi @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text.
note: The string @data.parent_centre.my_tips.location_text should not be translated.

SourceText: You have just unlocked the first workshop!
text: Usanda kuvula ukuqeqeshwa kokuqala!

SourceText: These quick questions will fit this app to your needs.
text: Le mibuzo esheshayo izokwenza le-app ifanelane nezidingo zakho.

SourceText: Let’s start with a few questions about you and your family.
text: Masiqale ngemibuzo embalwa emayelana nawe nomndeni wakho.

SourceText: We would love to know your first name or nickname:
text: Singathanda ukwazi igama lakho noma isiteketiso sakho:

SourceText: Are you a lady or a gentleman?
text: Ingabe ungowesifazane noma owesilisa?

SourceText: Lady
text: Owesifazane

SourceText: Gentleman
text: Owesilisa

SourceText: How old are you?
text: Umdala kangakanani?

SourceText: Adults
text: Abadala

SourceText: Teens
text: Intsha

SourceText: Children
text: Izingane

SourceText: Babies
text: Izinsana

SourceText: How many people are in your household?
text: Bangaki abantu abasekhayeni lakho?

SourceText: You can do the @global.weekly_workshops by yourself OR you can invite some other family members or friends to join you - you will learn a lot from each other. It's up to you!
text: Ungenza i @global.weekly_workshops ngokwakho NOMA ungamema amanye amalungu omndeni noma abangane ukuba bahlanganyele nawe - nizofunda okuningi komunye nomunye. Kusezandleni zakho!
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: How would you like to do your @global.weekly_workshops?
text: Ungathanda ukuyenza kanjani i @global.weekly_workshops yakho?
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Can you think of a name for your group?
text: Likhona igama ongabiza ngalo iqembu lakho?

SourceText: Which day of the week would you like to do your @global.weekly_workshops?
text: Yiluphi usuku evikini ongathanda ukwenza ngalo i @global.weekly_workshops yakho?
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Monday
text: UMsombuluko

SourceText: Tuesday
text: ULwesibili

SourceText: Wednesday
text: ULwesithathu

SourceText: Thursday
text: ULwesine

SourceText: Friday
text: ULwesihlanu

SourceText: Saturday
text: UMgqibelo

SourceText: Sunday
text: ISonto

SourceText: Great! We will unlock a new workshop for your group every week. This allows all of you to try what you learned with your families before building the next skill.
text: Kuhle! Sizovula ukuqeqeshwa okusha kweqembu lakho njalo ngesonto. Lokhu kunivumela nonke ukuba nizame lokho enikufundile nemindeni yenu ngaphambi kokuba nakhe elinye ikhono.

SourceText: Great! We will unlock a new workshop for you every week. This allows you to try what you learned with your family before building the next skill.
text: Kuhle! Sizovula ukuqeqeshwa okusha kwakho njalo ngesonto. Lokhu kuzokuvumela ukuba uzame lokho okufundile nomndeni wakho ngaphambi kokuba wakhe elinye ikhono.

SourceText: You can always change these settings in your @global.weekly_workshop_options.
text: Ungazishintsha noma nini lezi zinhlelo ku @global.weekly_workshop_options yakho.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop_options should not be translated.

SourceText: Great!
text: Kuhle!

SourceText:
I know life can be hard. I’m proud of you. 

Whatever you are feeling, it’s great that you are here!
text:
Ngiyazi ukuthi ukuphila kungaba nzima. Ngiyaziqhenya ngawe. 

Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi uzizwa kanjani, kuhle ukuthi ulapha!

SourceText: Using the app together
text: Ukusebenzisa i-app ndawonye

SourceText:
It’s great to see you!

First, let’s help your group get started.
text:
Kuhle ukukubona!

Okokuqala, masisize iqembu lakho liqale.

SourceText:
Agree on your ground rules together:
* Which day(s)/time(s) will we meet in the week?
* Who will hold the phone(s) during our activities?
* How can we make sure everyone can share freely?
* What can we do so we all feel respected?
text:
Vumelanani ngemithetho ndawonye:
* Yiluphi usuku (izinsuku)/isikhathi (izikhathi) enizohlangana ngaso phakathi nesonto?
* Ubani ozogcina omakhalekhukhwini ngesikhathi senza imisebenzi yethu?
* Singaqinisekisa kanjani ukuthi wonke umuntu uhlanganyela ngokukhululekile?
* Yini esingayenza ukuze sonke sizizwe sihlonishwa?

SourceText: You always can change your workshop day and your group name in the @global.weekly_workshop_options.
text: Ungalushintsha noma nini usuku lokuqeqeshwa kwakho noma igama leqembu lenu ku @global.weekly_workshop_options.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop_options should not be translated.

SourceText: Some rules that other groups made:
text: Eminye yemithetho ebekwe amanye amaqembu:

SourceText:
* Tuesday at 7pm is our @global.parent_app time together
* Take turns holding the phone (1 activity per person)
* Accept each other’s experiences. We are all different!
* Take turns speaking and listening
* All questions are welcome
* What we share stays among us
text:
* NgoLwesibili ngo-7pm yisikhathi sethu esisichitha ndawonye si-@global.parent_app
* Shintshanani ngokubamba ucingo (umsebenzi owodwa umuntu ngamunye)
* Yamukelani okwenzeka kumuntu ngamunye. Sonke sihlukile!
* Shintshanani ngokukhuluma nokulalela
* Yonke imibuzo yamukelekile
* Esabelana ngakho kuhlala phakathi kwethu

SourceText:
You are a star! 

Every day, recognise something you have done well. Reward yourself with something that makes you happy. And take a deep breath to relax. 

Remember, you earn a @global.parent_point every time you care for yourself - you matter!
text:
Uyiqhawe! 

Nsuku zonke, qaphela into oyenze kahle. Zivuze ngento ekwenza ujabule. Udonse umoya ukuze uzole. 

Khumbula, uthola i @global.parent_point njalo lapho uzinakekela - ubalulekile!
note: The string @global.parent_point should not be translated.

SourceText:
Being a parent can be so hard. Sometimes it feels like our children never listen to us.

But science shows that spending just a few minutes each day of focused one-on-one time with your teen helps build trust and love.
text:
Ukuba umzali kungaba nzima kakhulu. Ngezinye izikhathi siba nomuzwa wokuthi izingane zethu azisilaleli nhlobo.

Kodwa isayensi ibonisa ukuthi ukuchitha imizuzu nje embalwa usuku ngalunye nobabili nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kusiza ekwakheni ukwethembana nothando.

SourceText:
One-on-one time is when you focus on them, without TV or phones. Let them lead what you do or talk about.

It is great if you can do twenty minutes a day, but even five minutes a day is really good.
text:
Lapho uchitha isikhathi nengane yakho kulapho ugxila kuyo, ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa yi-TV noma omakhalekhukhwini. Yivumele ihole kulokho enikwenzayo noma enixoxa ngakho.

Kuhle uma ningachitha imizuzu engamashumi amabili ngosuku, kodwa ngisho nemizuzu emihlanu mihle kakhulu.

SourceText:
Hello.

Our topic today is one-on-one time with our children.

It is important to spend time with our children so that they can get to understand us, and for us to get an opportunity to understand them. 

Remember, a family with good understanding live in harmony.
text:
Sanibona.

Isihloko sethu namuhla ukuchitha isikhathi nezingane zethu.

Kubalulekile ukuchitha isikhathi nezingane zethu ukuze zikwazi ukusiqonda, nokuthi nathi sithole ithuba lokuziqonda. 

Khumbula, umndeni oqondana kahle uphila ngokuzwana.

SourceText:
Share ideas! 

What are things you could do to spend one-on-one time with your teens?

Feel like you have NO TIME and you are exhausted? Come up with ideas for one-on-one time that do not take up extra time, like walking to the shop together.
text:
Yabelana ngamacebiso! 

Yiziphi izinto ongazenza ukuze uchithe isikhathi nezingane zakho ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili?

Uzizwa sengathi AWUNASO ISIKHATHI futhi ukhathele kakhulu? Yiza namacebiso okuchitha isikhathi nengane angadli isikhathi esengeziwe, njengokuhamba ndawonye niye ezitolo.

SourceText:
It may take some time to get used to one-on-one time, but the more you do it the better it gets!

You are amazing parents for trying this.
text:
Kungase kuthathe isikhathi ukujwayela ukuchitha isikhathi nengane, kodwa lapho uqhubeka ukwenza kuya kujwayeleka!

Ungumzali omangalisayo ngenxa yokuzama lokhu.

SourceText: Let's think of ways to spend one-on-one time with your teen.
text: Masicabange ngezindlela zokuchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili.

SourceText: What could you do to spend one-on-one time with your teen?
text: Yini ongayenza ukuze uchithe isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili?

SourceText: Feel like you have NO TIME and you are exhausted? Remember to also think of ways that do not take up extra time.
text: Uzizwa sengathi AWUNASO ISIKHATHI futhi ukhathele kakhulu? Ukhumbule nokucabanga ngezindlela ezingadli isikhathi esengeziwe.

SourceText:
It may take some time to get used to one-on-one time, but the more you do it the better it gets!

You are an amazing parent for trying this.
text:
Kungase kuthathe isikhathi ukujwayela ukuchitha isikhathi nengane, kodwa lapho uqhubeka ukwenza kuya kujwayeleka!

Ungumzali omangalisayo ngenxa yokuzama lokhu.

SourceText: DAY - Try to do it every day
text: USUKU – Zama ukukwenza nsuku zonke

SourceText: Find 5 minutes (or more!) each day when your teen does not have something else they want to do.
text: Thola imizuzu emihlanu (noma ngaphezulu!) usuku ngalunye lapho ingane yakho engenalutho olunye efuna ukulwenza.

SourceText: PLAY - Let your teen choose
text: DLALA - Vumela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuba ikhethe

SourceText: Tell your teen that you would like to spend some time with them and that they can choose what to do or talk about. They might think this is weird at first, but will come to enjoy this time with you!
text: Tshela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi ungathanda ukuchitha isikhathi nayo nokuthi ingakhetha lokho efuna ukukwenza noma efuna ukukhuluma ngakho. Ingase idideke ekuqaleni kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi izokujabulela ukuchitha isikhathi nawe!

SourceText: STAY - Focus on your teen
text: HLALA - Gxila enganeni yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili

SourceText: Switch off TV and put aside phones. Look at your teen. Nod or say “I see” to show you are really paying attention. Accept what they say without judging them.
text: Vala i-TV ubeke eceleni omakhalekhukhwini. Bheka ingane yakho. Nqekuzisa ikhanda noma uthi “Ngiyabona” ukuze ubonise ukuthi ulalele ngempela. Yamukela ekushoyo ngaphandle kokuyahlulela.

SourceText: One-on-one time with your teen can be fun for you, too! It might even make you feel less stressed.
text: Ukuchitha isikhathi nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kungaba mnandi nakuwe! Kunganciphisa nokucindezeleka kwakho.

SourceText: Spend 5-20 minutes of one-on-one time with your teen, every day you can this week.
text: Chitha imizuzu engu-5 kuya kwengu-20 nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili uma ungakwazi kuleli viki.

SourceText:
Remember - whenever you can, relax, recognise and reward yourself. 

Care for yourself every day. You matter!
text:
Khumbula - noma nini uma ukwazi, phumula, naka futhi uzivuze. 

Zinakekele nsuku zonke. Ubalulekile!

SourceText: Fantastic! We are proud of you for all you have done over the past weeks.
text: Kuhle! Siyaziqhenya ngawe ngakho konke okwenziwe emasontweni adlule.

SourceText: We’re sorry it’s a difficult day. We are proud of you for all you have done over the past weeks.
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuthi usuku olunzima. Siyaziqhenya ngawe ngakho konke okwenziwe emasontweni adlule.

SourceText: Well done!
text: Wenze kahle!

Greetings everyone.

Today’s topic is celebration and next steps.

It has been amazing, it has been wonderful having you on this journey. Today we are celebrating our journey together. 

Today we are celebrating all the learnings that we have learned throughout.
text:
Sanibonani nonke.

Isihloko sanamuhla ukuhalalisa kanye nezinyathelo ezilandelayo.

Bekumnandi, bekukuhle kakhulu ukuhamba nawe kulolu hambo. Namuhla sibungaza uhambo lwethu ndawonye. 

Namuhla sibungaza konke esikufundile kulo lonke uqeqesho.

text: Namuhla sizobungaza, sibheke emuva siphinde sibheke phambili:

SourceText: Today you celebrate and reflect on your experiences.
text: Namuhla ubungaza futhi ucabanga ngalokho okwenzeke kuwe.

SourceText: You and your family have learnt so much. Let's think back and see what has changed.
text: Wena nomndeni wakho kuningi enikufundile. Ake sicabange sibuyele emuva ukuze sibone ukuthi yini eshintshile.

text: Cabanga

SourceText:
Close eyes and relax.

Think of your family life before you started your journey with this app.
       
Think back of skills you learned:
* Self-care
* One-on-one time
* Praise
* Positive instructions
* Managing stress
* Family budgeting
* Rules
* Calm consequences
* Problem solving
* Teen safety
* Dealing with crisis

Reflect on the journey – how was it for you to:
* Share ideas and experiences
* Reflect on and learn from the stories
* Practice skills with your teen

Did anything change for you and your family?

What do you need to continue to use skills?
text:
Vala amehlo akho uphumule.

Cabanga ngokuphila komndeni wakho ngaphambi kokuba uqale uhambo lwakho nale-app.
       
Cabanga ngamakhono owafundile:
* Ukuzinakekela

* Iziqondiso ezinhle

Cabanga ngohambo lwakho – bekunjani kuwe ukwenza lokhu:

* Cabanga ufunde ezindabeni ezixoxwayo

Ingabe kukhona okuye kwashintsha kuwe nasemndenini wakho?

Yini oyidingayo ukuze uqhubeke usebenzisa la makhono?

SourceText:

Remember to praise and encourage each other!

Khumbulani ukuncomana nokukhuthazana!

SourceText:
How will you support each other going forward? 

Here are some ideas from other families:

Nawa amanye amacebiso avela kweminye imindeni:

SourceText: TEXT
text: THUMELA UMYALEZO

SourceText:
You have been using @global.parent_app for the last months, but parenting a teen is long lasting!  The next questions about your parenting experiences will help us assess your parenting.

Be honest. Remember that millions of parents feel like you do, and we all deserve support. You are not alone!
text:
Ubulokhu usebenzisa i-@global.parent_app ezinyangeni ezidlule, kodwa ukukhulisa ingane eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili kuthatha isikhathi eside!  Imibuzo elandelayo emayelana nobhekana nakho njengomzali izosisiza sihlole indlela okhulisa ngayo ingane yakho.

Yiba qotho. Khumbula ukuthi izigidi zabazali zizizwa njengawe, futhi sonke siyakufanelekela ukwesekwa. Awuwedwa!

This song is for parents everywhere. Listen, dance together and celebrate yourselves!
text:

Le ngoma eyabazali yonke indawo. Yilaleleni, nidanse ndawonye futhi nizihalalisele!

SourceText: Self-care is a key parenting tool.
text: Ukuzinakekela kuyikhono elibalulekile lokuba umzali.

SourceText: So good to hear you are feeling well today. You are incredible!
text: Kuyajabulisa ukuzwa ukuthi uzizwa kahle namuhla. Uyamangalisa!

SourceText: Sorry that things are difficult right now. Take a deep breath and know that you are valued.
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuthi isimo sinzima njengamanje. Donsa umoya kakhulu futhi wazi ukuthi ubalulekile.

SourceText:
You can help your teenager to understand that breaking family rules leads to consequences. 

But HOW you do this matters. 

Getting consequences right helps teens behave better and makes family life calmer...
text:
Ungasiza ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iqonde ukuthi ukuphula imithetho yasekhaya kunemiphumela. 

Kodwa INDLELA okwenza ngayo lokhu ibalulekile. 

Ukuthola imiphumela efanele kusiza intsha ukuthi iziphathe kahle futhi kwenza ukuphila komndeni kube nokuthula...

SourceText:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is calm consequences.

It is important that when we introduce consequences to our teenagers we involve them, but also important that we are calm when we introduce consequences.

That will assist in us to agree on introducing calm consequences to our teenagers and our teenagers will easily remember them when they are involved and that will make them responsible.
text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sithi imiphumela eyethulwa ngendlela ezolile.

Kubalulekile ukuthi lapho sethula umphumela entsheni yethu siyihilele, kodwa kubalulekile nokuthi sizole lapho sethula imiphumela.

Lokhu kuzosisiza sivumelane ngokwethula imiphumela ngendlela ezolile entsheni yethu futhi intsha yethu izoyikhumbula kalula lapho ihilelwa futhi lokho kuzoyenza iziphathe kahle.

SourceText: Let's read what happened with @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 and his @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver:
text: Ake sifunde ngokwenzeke ku @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 no @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver wakhe:

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1! What time is this? You are late!”
text: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1! Ubani isikhathi manje? Ufike sekwephuzile!”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Sorry @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver – you can go back to sleep”.  

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!”
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Ngiyaxolisa @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver – ungabuyela uyolala.”  

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “Sesidlule KUDALA isikhathi obekumelwe ufike ngaso ekhaya!”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “I can explain, @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver, I can.” 

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1, you are not keeping our rule! I will give you a hiding!”
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Ngingachaza, @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver, ngingachaza.” 

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1, awulandeli umthetho wethu! Ngizokushaya!”

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “That’s unfair! You never listen to me!! I hate you!”
text: @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Akunabo ubulungisa lokho! Awungilaleli neze!! Ngiyakuzonda!”
note: The string @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 should not be translated.

SourceText:
Discuss together: 
* Why did giving a consequence this way not work well?
text:
Xoxani ndawonye: 
* Kungani ukwethulwa kwemiphumela ngale ndlela kungasebenzanga kahle?

SourceText: Giving a consequence this way did not work well because...
text: Ukwethulwa kwemiphumela ngale ndlela akusebenzanga ngoba...

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver was angry
text: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver bengicasukile
note: The string @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver did not let @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 explain
text: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver akavumanga @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 achaze

SourceText: The consequence was not discussed beforehand with @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1
text: Imiphumela beyingachazwanga kusengaphambili no @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1
note: The string @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: The consequence was too strong
text: Imiphumela beyiqine kakhulu

SourceText: Why did giving a consequence this way not work well?
text: Kungani ukwethulwa kwemiphumela ngalendlela kungasebenzanga kahle?

SourceText: Yes, a strong reaction like that just made everyone more angry and upset.
text: Yebo, ukusabela ngendlela enokhahlo ngalendlela kwenze wonke umuntu wathukuthela kakhulu futhi wacasuka.

SourceText:
Teenagers often break rules. Growing up is a difficult time when they are learning about who they are. 

Luckily, there are ways to discipline your teen without getting angry or using violence… and they work well!

Giving calm consequences helps teach our children responsibility for what they do – good and bad. 

Here are some examples - imagine you are the parent:
text:
Ngokuvamile intsha iyayiphula imithetho. Ukukhula kuyisikhathi ezinzima uma besafunda ukuthi bangobani. 

Ngenhlanhla, kunezindlela zokukhuza abantu abasha ngaphandle kokucasuka noma ukuba nodlame... futhi zisebenza kahle!

Ukwethula imiphumela ngomoya ophansi kusiza izingane zifunde ukuthi ezikwenzayo kunemiphumela – emihle noma emibi. 

Nazi ezinye izibonelo - zicabange uwumzali:

SourceText:
Calm consequences should be... 

FAIR: Not too harsh and you can actually do it 

IMMEDIATE: Give them as soon as possible 

CONSISTENT: The same consequence every time
text:
Ukwethula imiphumela ngomoya ophansi kumelwe kube... 

OKUNOBULUNGISA: Okungaqinile ngokweqile futhi cishe ongakwazi ukukwenza  

NGOKUSHESHA: Yinike ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka 

NGENDLELA ENGAGUQUGUQUKI: Umphumela ofanayo ngaso sonke isikhathi

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 came home late.
text: @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 ufike ekhaya sekwephuzile.
note: The string @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 should not be translated.

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 came home late.

What consequence would help here?
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 ufike ekhaya sekwephuzile.

Yimuphi umphumela engasiza lapha?
note: The string @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 should not be translated.

SourceText:
Consequences are not quite the same as punishment: they give our teens a chance to learn responsibility for their actions.

And they are more controlled AND effective than hitting or shouting!
text:
Imiphumela ayifani nesijeziso: inikela intsha yethu ithuba lokufunda ukuthwala umthwalo wezenzo zayo.

Futhi iyalawuleka FUTHI isebenza kangcono kunokushaya noma ukuthetha!

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_teen_girl_1 and @global.w_consequence_teen_girl_2 fight over a phone.
text: @global.w_consequence_teen_girl_1 kanye @global.w_consequence_teen_girl_2 nokulwela ucingo.

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_girl_1 and @global.w_consequence_teen_girl_2 fight over a phone.

What consequence would help here?
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_girl_1 kanye @global.w_consequence_teen_girl_2 nokulwela ucingo.

Yimuphi umphumela engasiza lapha?

SourceText:
Consequences are more successful if you discuss and agree in advance with teens before you apply them.

And: consequences are not all negative… You can also agree on GOOD consequences for GOOD actions to see more positive behaviour!
text:
Imiphumela isebenza kangcono uma kuxoxisanwa futhi kuvunyelwana ngayo kusengaphambili nomuntu omusha ngaphambi kokuthi isetshenziswe.

Okunye futhi: akuyona yonke imiphumela emibi... Ningabuye nivumelane ngemiphumela EMIHLE yokwenza izinto EZINHLE ukuze ubone ukuziphatha okuhle okwengeziwe!

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_2 helps washing dishes.
text: @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_2 ukusiza ukugeza izitsha.
note: The string @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_2 should not be translated.

SourceText: What consequence would help here?
text: Yimuphi umphumela engasiza lapha?

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_2 helps washing dishes.

What positive consequence would help here?
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_2 ukusiza ukugeza izitsha.

Yimiphi imiphumela emihle engasiza lapha?
note: The string @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_2 should not be translated.

SourceText: How you introduce calm consequences is important. Remember, when you involve your teen, things usually go better!
text: Indlela owethula ngayo imiphumela ngomoya ophansi iyasiza. Khumbula, uma uvumela intsha yakho ukuba ifake isandla, izinto ziba ngcono!

SourceText: EXPLAIN
text: CHAZA

SourceText:
Check you are both calm. Take a few breaths. Explain to your teen why you are concerned about their behaviour.

Explain the reasons why the rule mattered. You can share your feelings - it’s okay to say you are disappointed.
text:
Bheka ukuthi nobabili ninomoya ophansi yini. Donsa umoya izikhathi ezimbalwa. Chazela ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ukuthi kungani ukhathazekile ngokuzipha kwayo.

Chaza ukuthi kungani lo mthetho ubalulekile. Ungaveza indlela ozizwa ngayo - kulungile ukusho ukuthi uphoxekile.

SourceText: AGREE
text: VUMA

SourceText:
Plan consequences with your teen for following and not following the rule.

Ask for their ideas. Talk until you agree on something realistic.

Make a consequence for NOT following the rule and a privilege when they DO follow the rule.
text:
Hlela ingane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba ngemiphumela yokulandela neyokungawulandeli umthetho.

Bacela baveze imibono yabo. Khulumani kuze kube yilapho nivumelana khona ngokuthile okuzosebenza.

Yenza umphumela WOKUNGALANDELI umthetho nelungelo azolithola uma EWULANDELE umthetho.

SourceText: ACT
text: THATHA ISINYATHELO

SourceText: When your teen follows the rule, give praise and privileges!
text: Uma ingane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba iwulandela umthetho, yincome bese uyinikeza amalungelo!

SourceText: They will feel respected and valued. Remember: The more we praise them, the more they will show that good behaviour!
text: Bazozizwa behlonishwa futhi baziswa. Khumbula: Uma ubancoma kakhulu, bazothuthukisa kakhulu ukuziphatha okuhle!

SourceText: When your teen does not follow the rule, follow through with the consequence.
text: Uma ingane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba ingawulandele umthetho, namathela emphumeleni.

SourceText: When your teen breaks the rule, calmly give the consequence. This should be FAIR (not too harsh), IMMEDIATE (do it straight away) CONSISTENT (same every time).
text: Uma ingane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba iphula umthetho, ngomoya ophansi khipha umphumela walokho. Lokho kumelwe kube OKUNOBULUNGISA (akumelwe kube nokhahlo kakhulu), NGOKUSHESHA (kwenze ngaso leso sikhathi) UNGASHINTSHI (okufanayo ngaso sonke isikhathi).

SourceText:
Discuss together:
* What rules do your teens often break? 
* What consequence could you use for each specific broken rule? 

Consequences should be: 
FAIR (not too harsh)
IMMEDIATE (do it straight away) 
CONSISTENT (same every time).

Praise and encourage each other – we can give each other strength!
text:
Xoxani ndawonye:
* Yimiphi imithetho izingane zakho ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ezivame ukuyiphula? 
 * Yimuphi umphumela ongawusebenzisa emthethweni othile ophuliwe? 

Imiphumela kumelwe ibe: 
ENOBULUNGISA (engaqinile ngokwedlulele)
NGOKUSHESHA (kwenze ngaso leso sikhathi) 
UNGASHINTSHI (okufanayo ngaso sonke isikhathi).

Ncomanani futhi nikhuthazane – singanikana amandla!

SourceText: Let's go back to @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 and his @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver
text: Ake sibuyele ku @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 naku @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver wakhe

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: "I am concerned that you are often still coming home late, @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1. What can we do to help you remember to come home in time?"

@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: "If I come home in time, maybe I can stay up 30 minutes later than usual?"
text:
@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “Ngikhathazekile ngokuthi namanje usabuya sekwephuzile ekhaya, @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1. Yini esingayenza ukuze sikusize ukhumbule ukuthi ubuye ngesikhathi ekhaya?"

@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Uma ngingafika ngesikhathi ekhaya, mhlawumbe ngingahlala imizuzu engu-30 kunangesikhathi esivamile sokulala?”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: That is a good idea! And what should we do if you don’t follow the rule?  

@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 (mumbles): “Mgmluuhm”
text:
@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: Umbono omuhle lowo! Yini okumelwe siyenze uma ungawulandeli umthetho?  

@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 (uyabubula): “Ngmluuhm”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: "Oh come on, I know you have some ideas."

@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: "Okay…. What about: I have to do my homework?"
text:
@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “Woza nazo, ngiyazi ukuthi kukhona okuthile okucabangayo.” 

@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Kulungile…. Kuthiwani ngokuthi: Kumelwe ngenze umsebenzi wesikole?”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: "You have to do your homework anyway. If you forget the rule, it is fair that you will not be able to see your friends the next day."

@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: "Okay, @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver."
text:
@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “Kumelwe uwenze umsebenzi wakho wesikole noma kunjalo. Uma uwukhohlwa umthetho, kuyinto elungile ukuthi ungababoni abangane bakho ngosuku olulandelayo." 

@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Kulungile, @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver."

SourceText:
The next day...

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1! What time is it! It is late!”
text:
Ngosuku olulandelayo...

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1! Ngubani isikhathi! Sekwephuzile!”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Sorry @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver – you can go back to sleep.”  

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!”
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Ngiyaxolisa @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver – ungabuyela uyolala.”  

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “Sesidlule KUDALA isikhathi obekumelwe ufike ngaso ekhaya!”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “I can explain, @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver, I can.” 

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1, it is the middle of the night and you came home later than we agreed. Whatever the reason is, you must understand that this is not acceptable. @global.w_consequence_female_caregiver and I felt really worried.”
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Ngingachaza, @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver, ngingachaza.” 

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1, kuphakathi namabili futhi ubuye ekhaya sekudlule isikhathi esivumelene ngaso. Noma ngabe yisiphi isizathu, kumelwe uqonde ukuthi lokhu akwamukelekile. @global.w_consequence_female_caregiver bengikhathazeke kakhulu.”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “My friends wanted me to stay longer. They were calling me a baby for having to go home already.” 

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “I know it can be hard to say no to your friends. Let’s talk more about this in the morning when we have had some rest.”
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Abangane bami bebafuna ngihlale isikhathi esijana nabo. Bebengibiza ngengane ngoba besengifuna ukuya ekhaya.” 

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “Ngiyazi ukuthi kungaba nzima ukuthi cha kubangane bakho. Ake sikhulume ngalolu daba ekuseni uma sesiphumulile.”

SourceText:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “I am sorry I worried you and @global.w_consequence_female_caregiver.” 

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “Thank you. Now go to bed, but just to be clear, as you came home later than we agreed, you will not be allowed to go out tomorrow night.”
text:
@global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1: “Ngiyaxolisa ngokukukhathaza futhi @global.w_consequence_female_caregiver.” 

@global.w_consequence_male_caregiver: “Ngiyabonga. Njengamanje hamba uyolala, kodwa ngifuna kucace, njengoba ubuye ekhaya sekudlule isikhathi esivumelene ngaso, awuvumelekile ukuphuma kusasa kusihlwa.”

SourceText: Let's talk about this story
text: Ake sikhulume ngalolu daba

SourceText: Using a consequence worked well this time because...
text: Ukusebenzisa umphumela kusebenze kahle lapha ngoba...

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 and his @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver discussed consequences when they were both calm
text: @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 no @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver baxoxe ngemiphumela ngesikhathi bobabili bezolile

SourceText: They agreed on consequences together
text: Bobabili bavumelene ngemiphumela

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver responded calmly but firmly when @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 broke the rule
text: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver usabele ngomoya ophansi kodwa engagwegwesi ngesikhathi @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1 ephule umthetho

SourceText: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver listened to @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1
text: @global.w_consequence_male_caregiver ulalele @global.w_consequence_teen_boy_1

SourceText: The consequence was realistic and appropriate
text: Umphumela ubunengqondo futhi ufaneleka

SourceText: Why did using a consequence work well this time?
text: Kungani ukusebenzisa umphumela kusebenze kahle kulokhu?

SourceText:
What would be a calm consequence for your teenagers arguing with each other during dinner? 

Remember it needs to be: 
FAIR - IMMEDIATE - CONSISTENT
text:
Kungaba yimuphi umphumela owethulwa ngomoya ophansi ezinganeni zakho eziseminyakeni yokuthomba uma ziphikisana phakathi nesikhathi sokudla? 

Khumbula ukuthi kumelwe ube : 
ONOBULUNGISA - NGOKUSHESHA - UNGASHINTSI

SourceText: Not seeing any friends for a month
text: Ukungaboni noma imuphi umngane inyanga yonke

SourceText: This may be hard to do for you and also too harsh!
text: Lokhu kungaba nzima kuwe ukukwenza futhi kungaba okuqine kakhulu!

SourceText: Cancelling their birthday plans in a month’s time
text: Ukukhansela izinhlelo zezinsuku zabo zokuzalwa kusasele inyanga

SourceText: This is too far in the future, and too harsh as well!
text: Lokhu kuzothatha isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuthi kwenzeke, futhi kuzoba okuqine kakhulu!

SourceText: No TV this evening
text: Ukungabukeli i-TV namuhla kusihlwa

SourceText: Perfect, this sounds fair and can be done straight away
text: Kuhle, kuzwakala kunobulungisa futhi kungenziwa khona manje

SourceText:
Plan a calm consequence for your teenagers arguing with each other during dinner. Remember they need to be 

FAIR - IMMEDIATE - CONSISTENT
text:
Hlela umphumela owethulwa ngomoya ophansi wezingane zakho eziseminyakeni yokuthomba uma ziphikisana phakathi nesikhathi sokudla. Khumbula ukuthi kudingeka ube 

ONOBULUNGISA - NGOKUSHESHA - UNGASHINTSI

SourceText:
Your home practice for this week will be to talk together with your teen about a ONE negative consequence and ONE positive consequence.

Consequences should be:
FAIR (not too harsh)
IMMEDIATE (do it straight away)
CONSISTENT (same every time)
text:
Enizokuprakthiza ekhaya kuleli viki kuzoba ukukhulumisana nengane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba ngomphumela OWODWA obuhlungu nomphumela OWODWA omuhle.

Imiphumela kumelwe ibe:
ENOBULUNGISA (engaqinile ngokwedlulele)
NGOKUSHESHA (kwenze ngaso leso sikhathi)
UNGASHINTSHI (okufanayo ngaso sonke isikhathi)

SourceText:
Negative Behaviour: Coming home after the agreed hour. 

Negative Consequence: Cannot see friends the next day. 

Negative Behaviour: Talking rudely. 

Negative Consequence: Write a letter of apology. 
 
Positive Behaviour: Helping out with shopping. 

Positive Consequence: 30 minutes extra of loved activity of their choice.  

Positive Behaviour: Helping look after younger siblings. 

Positive Consequence: One hour of extra time with friends on the weekend.
text:
Ukuziphatha Kabi: Ukufika ekhaya sekudlule isikhathi esivumelene ngaso. 

Umphumela Obuhlungu: Awuvunyelwe ukubona abangane bakho kusasa. 

Ukuziphatha Kabi: Ukukhuluma kabi ngokungenanhlonipho. 

Umphumela Obuhlungu: Bhala incwadi yokuxolisa. 
 
Ukuziphatha Okuhle: Ukusiza ngokuyothenga. 

Umphumela Omuhle: Imizuzu engu-30 eyengeziwe yokwenza okuthile akuthandayo.  

Ukuziphatha Okuhle: Ukusiza ngokugada izingane zakubo ezincane. 

Umphumela Omuhle: Ihora elilodwa elengeziwe lokuba nabangani ngempelasonto.

SourceText: How are you feeling today?
text: Uzizwa kanjani namuhla?

SourceText: Great that today is going well! What is one thing that has gone well today? Remember to praise yourself for it.
text: Kuhle ukuthi kuhamba kahle namuhla! Iyiphi into eyodwa ehambe kahle namuhla? Khumbula ukuzincoma ngayo.

SourceText: Sorry to hear you are feeling difficult feelings today. Well done for recognising those emotions, and trying to be calm and kind to yourself. You are setting a great example for your family.
text: Ngiyaxolisa ukuzwa ukuthi awuzizwa kahle namuhla. Wenze kahle ngokuthi uyiqaphele leyo mizwa, nokuzama ukwehlisa umoya nokuba nomusa kuwe. Ubekela umndeni wakho isibonelo esihle.

SourceText: Every small thing you do matters. We hope you are proud of yourself too.
text: Zonke izinto ezincane ozenzayo zibalulekile. Sethemba ukuthi nawe uyaziqhenya ngawe.

SourceText: All families experience crises. When we prepare together and know where to get help BEFORE something bad happens, we can overcome any crisis.
text: Yonke imindeni ibhekana nezinkinga. Uma sizilungiselela ndawonye futhi sazi ukuthi sizoluthola kuphi usizo NGAPHAMBI kokuthi okuthile okubi kwenzeke, singakwazi ukubhekana nezinkinga.

SourceText:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is dealing with crises.

Crises may occur anywhere. Crises may occur anytime. Therefore, it is important as a family to have plans in place should any family member find themselves in a crisis situation. 

It is important to have plans so that every family member may feel protected. 

When we are dealing with crises, remember to take a pause, breathe, and keep yourself calm. That will help you to deal with crises better.
text:
Sanibonani, nonke.

Isihloko sanamuhla simayelana nokubhekana nezinkinga.

Izinkinga zingavela nomaphi. Izinkinga zingavela noma nini. Ngakho-ke, kubalulekile ukuthi njengomndeni nibe nezinhlelo zokuthi nizokwenza kanjani uma ilunga lomndeni lizithola lisenkingeni. 

Kubalulekile ukuba nezinhlelo ukuze ilungu ngalinye lomndeni lizizwe livikelekile. 

Lapho sibhekele nenkinga, kumelwe sikhumbule ukuma, sidonse umoya, bese sizigcina sizolile. Lokho kuzokusiza ubhekane nenkinga ngendlela engcono.
