text: Lesi simo besiyingozi ngoba...

SourceText:
* The man in the car was pressuring  @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 with gifts 
* @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1's friend was encouraging her  
* Going with an older man puts @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 in a dangerous situation where she can get hurt or be forced to do things 
* Many girls in our communities get pregnant or catch HIV from older men 
* There were no other trusted adults to advise @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1

* Umngane ka-@global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 ubemkhuthaza ukuthi ahambe  
* Ukuzikhipha nendoda endala kungafaka u@global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 esimweni esiyingozi lapho engalimala khona noma aphoqwe ukuba enze izinto 
* Amantombazane amaningi emphakathini ayakhulelwa noma athole i-HIV emadodeni amadala 
* Bekangekho omunye umuntu omdala onganikeza u-@global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 iseluleko

text: Zonke lezi zinto ziyiqiniso!

SourceText: Let's look at another example of a dangerous situation together.
text: Ake sibheke esinye isibonelo sesimo esiyingozi ndayonye.

SourceText: @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1: "My friend has been talking with a guy our age online... She’s going to send him photos of herself. Is that better because he’s our age?"
text: @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1: “Umngane wami ubelokhu ekhuluma nomunye umfana olingana nathi ku-inthanethi... Uzomthumelela izithombe zakhe. Ingabe lokhu kungcono ngoba ulingana nathi?”
note: The string @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.w_safe_female_caregiver: "You are a good friend for being worried about her. Sending sexy photos is a real risk too."
text: @global.w_safe_female_caregiver: “Uwungane omuhle ngoba ukhathazekile ngaye. Ukuthumela izithombe zakhe zobulili nakho kuyingozi.”
note: The string @global.w_safe_female_caregiver should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.w_safe_female_caregiver: "Sometimes people aren’t who they say they are online – he could say he is your age but be a 50 year old man. Or when they break up, he could send those photos to everyone and your friend would feel awful."
text: @global.w_safe_female_caregiver: “Ngezinye izikhathi abantu abasho lokho abayikho ngempela ku-inthanethi - angase athi ulingana nani uthole ukuthi uyindoda eneminyaka engu- 50. Noma uma behlukana, angathumela lezo zithombe kuwo wonke umuntu lokho kungenza umngane wakho azizwe kabi.”
note: The string @global.w_safe_female_caregiver should not be translated.

SourceText: Let's talk about our teens' online safety.
text: Ake sikhulume ngokuphepha kwentsha yethu ku-inthanethi.

SourceText: What are some of the online risks for teens these days?
text: Yiziphi ezinye izingozi intsha engabhekana nazo ku-inthanethi kulezi zinsuku?

SourceText:
* Adults use social media, gaming and messaging apps and websites to meet teenagers and persuade them to do sexual things 
* People put things online to make us hurt other people – like making violence seem cool, or hating people from another race or country
* People put things online to persuade teenagers to hurt themselves or commit suicide
* Teenagers share sexy videos or photos or information about themselves, and people show it to others or use it to upset them
* People can often be nasty to teenagers online – they feel like they can bully people safely
text:
* Abantu abadala basebenzisa ezokuxhumana, ezemidlalo nezinhlelo zokuthumelelana imilayezo namawebusayithi ukuze bahlangane nentsha bese beyiheha ukuthi yenze izenzo zobulili 
* Abantu bafaka izinto ku-inthanethi ukuba balimaze abanye abantu - njengokwenza udlame lubonakala lulungile, noma ukuzonda abantu bolunye uhlanga noma abavela kwelinye izwe
* Abantu bafaka izinto ku-inthanethi ukwenza intsha ukuba izilimaze noma izibulale
* Intsha ifaka amavidiyo noma izithombe zayo zobulili noma imininingwane ephathelene nayo, bese kuthi abanye bayakusebenzisa lokho ukuze bayilimaze noma bayithukuthelise
* Izikhathi eziningi abantu bangaba nonya kubantu abasha ku-inthanethi - bazizwa bengahlukumeza abantu ngendlela ephephile

SourceText: Let's think about our teens' online safety.
text: Ake sicabange ngokuphepha kwentsha yethu ku-inthanethi.

SourceText: What is the biggest online risk for teens these days?
text: Iyiphi ingozi enkulu yabantu abasha ku-inthanethi kulezi zinsuku?

SourceText: Adults use social media, gaming and messaging apps and websites to meet teenagers and persuade them to do sexual things
text: Abantu abadala basebenzisa ezokuxhumana, ezemidlalo nezinhlelo zokuthumelelana imilayezo namawebusayithi ukuze bahlangane nentsha bese beyiheha ukuthi yenze izenzo zobulili

SourceText: People put things online to make us hurt other people – like making violence seem cool, or hating people from another race or country

text: Intsha ifaka amavidiyo noma izithombe zayo zobulili noma imininingwane ephathelene nayo, bese kuthi abanye bayakusebenzisa lokho ukuze bayilimaze noma bayithukuthelise

SourceText: People can often be nasty to teenagers online – they feel like they can bully people safely
text: Izikhathi eziningi abantu bangaba nonya kubantu abasha ku-inthanethi - bazizwa bengahlukumeza abantu ngendlela ephephile

SourceText:
To keep our teens safe, we need to understand the dangerous situations they could get into!

Let’s make two maps together of safe and unsafe places:
* A map of our community
* A map of apps/websites we use online

Let’s make these maps as a group now. 

You’ll do the same with your teen as home practice this week.
text:
Ukuze sigcine intsha yethu iphephile, kumelwe siqonde izimo eziyingozi engangena kuzo!

Ake senze amabalazwe amabili ndawonye ezindawo eziphephile nezindawo ezingaphephanga:
* Ibalazwe lomphakathi wethu 
* Ibalazwe lama-app/amawebusayithi esingawasebenzisa ku-inthanethi

Ake senze la mabalazwe siyiqembu njengamanje. 

Uzokwenza okufanayo ngengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili njengomsebenzi wasekhaya waleli viki.

SourceText:
Discuss together:

* Which areas on your map are safe for teenagers 
     – CIRCLE these 
* Which areas on your map are unsafe for teenagers 
     – CROSS those off  
* What makes a place safe or unsafe?  
* What could you and your teen do to keep your teen safer?
text:
Xoxani ndawonye:

* Yiziphi izindawo ebalazweni lenu eziphephile ezinganeni zakho ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili 
      - yenza INDINGILIZA kuzo 
 * Iziphi izindawo ebalazweni lakho ezingaphephile entsheni yakho  
     - faka ISIPHAMBANO kuzo  
 * Yini eyenza indawo iphephe noma ingaphephi?   
* Yini wena nentsha yakho eningayenza ukuze nigcine intsha yakho iphephile?

SourceText:
Sometimes, we can find ourselves in trouble. Discuss together:
 
* Where can you and your teen get support when you face a crisis? 
     – MARK those areas with a little object like a stone or piece of paper.
text:
Ngezinye izikhathi zingazithola sisenkingeni. Xoxani ndawonye:
 
* Intsha yakho nawe ningaluthola kuphi usizo uma uzithola usenkingeni? 
     – PHAWULA lezo zindawo ngokuthile okunjengetshe noma isiqeshana sephepha.

SourceText:
* Draw pictures of the apps and websites your teenagers use 
* Praise each other for how good they are at using the web!  
* Talk about which ones might be unsafe. Why? 
* What could you and your teen do to make using the internet safer for your teen and their friends?
text:
* Dweba izithombe zama-app namawebusayithi intsha yakho ewasebenzisayo  
* Ncomanani ngokusebenzisa kahle lawa mawebusayithi!   
* Khulumani ngokuthi yimaphi okungenzeka akaphephile. Kungani? 
* Yini wena nentsha yakho eningayenza ukuze nenze ukusebenzisa i-inthanethi kwengane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba kanye nabangane bayo kuphephe?

SourceText: Safety Plan
text: Uhlelo Lokuphepha

SourceText: To keep our teens safe, we need to understand the dangerous situations they could get into!
text: Ukuze sigcine intsha yethu iphephile, kumelwe siqonde izimo eziyingozi engangena kuzo!

SourceText: Every time you plan or keep a safety plan, click the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!
text: Ngaso sonke isikhathi uma nihlela noma nigcina uhlelo lokuphepha, chofoza u-@global.parent_point bese niyayibungaza leyo mpumelelo yenu!
note: The string @global.parent_point should not be translated.

SourceText:
Let’s make two maps together of safe and unsafe places: 
* A map of our community 
* A map of apps/websites we use online 

You’ll do the same with your teen as home practice this week - if your teen is here now, you can do it together now!
text:
Ake senze amabalazwe amabili ndawonye ezindawo eziphephile nezindawo ezingaphephanga: 
* Ibalazwe lomphakathi wethu  
* Ibalazwe lama-app/amawebusayithi esingawasebenzisa ku-inthanethi 

Uzokwenza okufanayo nentsha yakho njengomsebenzi wasekhaya waleli viki - uma intsha yakho ikhona njengamanje lapha, ningakwenza ndawonye lokhu njengamanje!

SourceText: My family can join in now!
text: Umndeni wami ungahlanganyela njengamanje!

SourceText: Let me try it out by myself
text: Ake ngizizamele ngokwami

SourceText: Step 1: What are important places in your community?
text: Isinyathelo 1: Yiziphi izindawo ezibalulekile emphakathini wakho?

SourceText:
* Get a piece of paper (or old newspaper or a cardboard box) and a pen. 
* Draw a map of your teen’s community, with pictures of all the main places like streets, your house, school, shops, places your teen visits.
text:
* Thola isiqeshana sephepha (noma iphephandaba elidala noma ikhadibhodi) kanye nepeni. 
* Dweba ibalazwe lomphakathi wentsha yakho, libe nezithombe zazo zonke izindawo eziyinhloko njengemigwaqo, indlu yakho, isikole, izitolo, izindawo ezivakashelwa ingane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba.

SourceText: Step 2: Which places are safe and unsafe?
text: Isinyathelo 2: Yiziphi izindawo eziphephile nezingaphephanga?

SourceText:
Discuss together:
* Which areas on your map are safe for teenagers 
     – CIRCLE these 
* Which areas on your map are unsafe for teenagers 
     – CROSS those off  
* What makes a place safe or unsafe?  
* What could you and your teen do to keep your teen safer?
text:
Xoxani ndawonye:
* Yiziphi izindawo ebalazweni lenu eziphephile ezinganeni zakho ezevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili 
      - yenza INDINGILIZA kuzo 
 * Iziphi izindawo ebalazweni lakho ezingaphephile entsheni yakho  
     - faka ISIPHAMBANO kuzo  
 * Yini eyenza indawo iphephe noma ingaphephi?   
* Yini wena nentsha yakho eningayenza ukuze nigcine intsha yakho iphephile?

SourceText: Step 3: Where can you get support?
text: Isinyathelo 3: Kukuphi lapho ungathola khona ukusekelwa?

SourceText:
Sometimes, we can find ourselves in trouble. Discuss together:
* Where can you and your teen get support when you face a crisis? 
     – MARK those areas with a little object like a stone or piece of paper.  

Below are some places that can be helpful

* Intsha yakho nawe ingaluthola kuphi usizo uma uzithola usenkingeni?

Ngezansi ezinye izindawo ezingaba usizo

* Draw pictures of the apps and websites your teenagers use 
* Recognise how good they are at using the web!  
* Think about which ones might be unsafe. Why? 
* What could you and your teen do to make using the internet safer for your teen and their friends?
text:
* Dweba izithombe zama-app namawebusayithi intsha yakho ewasebenzisayo  
* Qaphela indlela intsha ekwazi ngayo ukusebenzisa kahle lawa mawebusayithi!   
* Cabanga ngokuthi yimaphi okungenzeka awaphephile. Kungani? 
* Yini wena nentsha yakho eningayenza ukuze nenze ukusebenzisa i-inthanethi kwengane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba kanye nabangane bayo kuphephe?

SourceText: MAPS
text: AMABALAZWE

SourceText: Make MAPS with your teen of safe and unsafe areas in your community and online. Talk about how to keep their information, photos and videos private online. Talk about how once something goes online, it stays there forever. They might know an example from their friends.
text: Yenza AMABALAZWE nentsha yakho ezindawo eziphephile nezindawo ezingaphephanga emphakathini wakho naku-inthanethi. Xoxa nayo ngokuthi ingayigcina kanjani imininingwane, izithombe namavidiyo azo afihlekile ku-inthanethi. Xoxa nayo ngokuthi kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi uma okuthile kufakwa ku-inthanethi kuzohlala lapho unomphela. Kungenzeka iyasazi isibonelo salokho ngabangane bayo.

SourceText: RULES
text: IMITHETHO

SourceText:
Make RULES with your teen about safely using the apps and websites that they like. 

Remember the story about Online Safety? See it again here.
text:
Beka IMITHETHO nentsha yakho mayelana nokuphepha uma isebenzisa ama-app namawebhuyasithi ewathandayo. 

Khumbula indaba Yokuphepha ku-Inthanethi? Lubone futhi lapha.

SourceText: Online Safety Story
text: Indaba Yokuphepha Ku-inthanethi

SourceText: AMNESTY
text: USHWELE

SourceText:
Make an AMNESTY agreement. If something happens that makes them upset, uncomfortable or scared, they can talk to you and you won’t get angry or punish them, even if they were doing something wrong.

Remember the story about Safety Amnesty? See it again here.
text:
Yenzani isivumelwano sikaSHWELE. Uma kwenzeka okuthile okubathukuthelisayo, okubenza bazizwe bangakhululekile noma bethuke, bangakhuluma nawe ngakho futhi angeke ucasuke noma ubajezise, ngisho noma kuthiwa bebenza okuthile okungalungile.

Khumbula udaba Lokuphepha Kukashwele? Lubone futhi lapha.

SourceText: Digital parenting is just like parenting in the real world. You have taken a BIG STEP to keeping your teen safe in the community AND online. Good for you!
text: Ukuba umzali kwezobuchwepheshe kuyafana nokuba umzali ekuphileni okuvamile. Uthathe ISINYATHELO esikhulu sokugcina intsha yakho iphephile emphakathini KANYE naku-inthanethi. Kuhle lokho!

SourceText: Resources to help in the community
text: Izinsiza zokusiza emphakathini

SourceText: Online Safety Resources
text: Izinsiza Zokuphepha Ku-inthanethi

SourceText:
Make two maps with your teen of safe and unsafe places:
* Map of your community
* Map of apps and websites your teen uses 

Make sure you're both happy with the safety plan.  

What really matters is that you talk with your teen as you do this – often teens know much more than we do about where it is safe and unsafe!
text:
Yenza amabalazwe amabili nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ezindawo eziphephile nezindawo ezingaphephile:
* Yenza ibalazwe lomphakathi wakho 
* Ishadi lama-apps namawebusayithi asetshenziswa yingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili 

Qiniseka ukuthi nobabili niyajabula ngohlelo lokuphepha.  

Into ebaluleke ngempela ukuthi nikhulume nengane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba njengoba nenza lokhu - ngokuvamile abantu abasha bazi okuningi ngokuthi ikuphi lapho kuphephe khona nalapho kungaphephanga khona!

SourceText:
If you have not done it together yet, make two maps with your teen of safe and unsafe places:
* Map of your community
* Map of apps and websites your teen uses 

Make sure you're both happy with the safety plan.  

What really matters is that you talk with your teen as you do this – often teens know much more than we do about where it is safe and unsafe!
text:
Uma ningakakwenzi nobabili okwamanje lokhu, yenza amabalazwe amabili nengane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba yezindawo eziphephile nezindawo ezingaphephanga:
* Yenza ibalazwe lomphakathi wakho 
* Ishadi lama-apps namawebusayithi asetshenziswa yingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili 

Qiniseka ukuthi nobabili niyajabula ngohlelo lokuphepha.  

Into ebaluleke ngempela ukuthi nikhulume nengane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba njengoba nenza lokhu - ngokuvamile abantu abasha bazi okuningi ngokuthi ikuphi lapho kuphephe khona nalapho kungaphephanga khona!

SourceText: Safety Plan Activity
text: Umsebenzi Wehlelo Lokuphepha

SourceText:
Welcome! It’s great to have you here. This week is about YOU. 

In this welcome workshop you will: 
* Get tools to care for yourself 
* Customise the app for your needs
text:
Siyakwamukela! Siyajabula ukuba nawe lapha. Leli sonto limayelana NAWE. 

Kulokhu kuqeqeshwa kokukwamukela:  
* Uzothola amathuluzi okuzinakekela  
* Uhlele ne-app ngokwezidingo zakho

SourceText: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.
text: Kuhle kakhulu, ngiyajabula ukuthi izinto zikuhambela kahle.

SourceText: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!
text: Ngiyaxolisa ngokuthi isimo sinzima njengamanje. Kuvamile ukubhekana nobunzima ngezinye izikhathi. Khumbula ukuthi awuwedwa!

SourceText: Why @data.workshop.w_self_care.short_title?
text: Kungani @data.workshop.w_self_care.short_title?
note: The string @data.workshop.w_self_care.short_title should not be translated.

SourceText:
We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent! 

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our teenagers.
text:
Ngokuvamile asizinakekeli ngokwanele. Kodwa kubalulekile, ikakhulu njengabazali! 

Ukuphungula ukucindezeleka kwethu nokuziphatha kahle kusiza thina KANYE nentsha yethu.

SourceText:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is self-care. 

There are times where we experience challenging times, where we face problems and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves to learn the techniques of how we can keep ourselves calm in case problems, challenges or issues come up. 

When we are calm we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.
text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sikhuluma ngokuzinakekela. 

Kunezikhathi lapho sibhekana nezikhathi ezinzima, lapho sibhekana khona nezinkinga singazi ukuthi kumelwe senzeni. Kubalulekile ukuzinakekela ukufunda izindlela zokuthi sihlale sehlise umoya uma kwenzeka kuvela inkinga, inselele noma isimo esithile. 

Uma sehlise umoya sisuke sisesimweni esihle sokucabanga kahle nokuza nesixazululo esihle sokubhekana nanoma iyiphi inkinga.

SourceText:
Today you will experience 3 activities that can help you care for yourself, and we will ask you a few
questions to ensure the app is exactly right for you.
text:
Namuhla sizokwenza imisebenzi engu-3 ezosisiza sizinakekele, futhi sizokubuza
imibuzo embalwa ukuze siqiniseka ukuthi le-app ikulungele.

SourceText:
* Relax activity
* Recognise activity
* Reward activity
* Tools: How to add self-care
* Customise the app
* Home practice suggestions
text:
* Umsebenzi wokuphumula
* Umsebenzi wokubona
* Umsebenzi wokuvuza
* Amathuluzi: Indlela yokunezela ukuzinakekela
* Hlela i-app ngendlela oyithandayo
* Amacebiso alokho ongakwenza ekhaya

SourceText: Let's try it out and do a short relaxation activity together!
text: Ake sikuzame bese senza umsebenzi omfushane wokuphumula ndawonye!

SourceText:
As parents, we often don’t have time to look after ourselves - but this is so important to do! Reducing our stress helps us AND our teens. 

Let’s take a first step and do a short relaxation activity together.
text:
Njengabazali, ngokuvamile asinaso isikhathi sokuzinakekela - kodwa lokhu kubalulekile! Ukwehlisa ukucindezeleka kwethu kusiza thina KANYE nentsha yethu. 

Ake sithathe isinyathelo sokuqala bese senza umsebenzi omfushane wokuphumula ndawonye.

SourceText:
Paying attention to what we do well helps us to focus on the positive. 

Let’s take a moment to praise ourselves. We’ll show you how.
text:
Ukunaka esikwenzayo kuzosisiza sigxile ezintweni ezakhayo. 

Ake sithathe umzuzwana sizincome. Sizonibonisa ukuthi ningakwenza kanjani lokhu.

SourceText:
Think of one thing YOU have done well recently.

Say it aloud to each other: "Well done to me for…"

Here is one thing you deserve praise for: Well done for using @global.parent_app!
text:
Cabanga ngento eyodwa OYENZE kahle muva nje.

Kutshele abanye ngokuzwakalayo: “Ngiyazincoma...”

Nakhu okukodwa okufanelekayo ukunconywa ngakho: Wenze kahle ngokusebenzisa i @global.parent_app!
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText: Recognise
text: Naka

SourceText:
Take a moment to praise yourself. 

We will now show you how.
text:
Thatha umzuzwana uzincome. 

Njengamanje sizokubonisa ukuthi ungakwenza kanjani.

SourceText: Think of one thing YOU have done well recently.
text: Cabanga ngento eyodwa OYENZE kahle muva nje.

SourceText: "Well done to me for..."
text: “Ngiyazincoma...”

SourceText: Showing love to my children
text: Ngokubonisa izingane zami uthando

SourceText: Getting up even though I felt tired
text: Ngokuvuka ngisho noma bengikhathele

SourceText: Smiling at someone
text: Ngokumomotheka kothile

SourceText: Making food to stay strong
text: Ngokwenza ukudla ukuze sihlale sinamandla

SourceText: Spending time with my children
text: Ngokuchitha isikhathi nezingane zami

SourceText: Helping my children with schoolwork
text: Ngokusiza izingane zami ngomsebenzi wazo wesikole

SourceText:
Say it aloud if you can.

Here is one thing you deserve praise for: Well done for using @global.parent_app!
text:
Kusho ngezwi elizwakalayo uma ungakwazi.

Nakhu okukodwa okufanelekayo ukunconywa ngakho: Wenze kahle ngokusebenzisa i @global.parent_app!

SourceText: Well done! Try to do this every day.
text: Wenze kahle! Zama ukukwenza lokhu nsuku zonke.

SourceText: Things to praise yourself for:
text: Izinto ongazincoma ngazo:

SourceText:
* Showing love to your children 
* Getting up even though you felt tired 
* Smiling at someone 
* Making food to stay strong 
* Spending time with your children 
* Helping your children with schoolwork
text:

* Ngokuvuka ngisho noma uzizwa ukhathele 
* Ngokumomotheka lapho ubheka othile 
* Ngokwenza ukudla ukuze sihlale sinamandla 
* Ngokuchitha isikhathi nezingane zakho 
* Ngokusiza izingane zakho ngomsebenzi wazo wesikole

SourceText:
Taking care of ourselves is an important parenting skill. Share with each other:

What small things make you happy?
text:
Ukuzinakekela kuyikhono elibalulekile lokuba umzali. Khulumisanani:

Yiziphi izinto ezincane ezikujabulisayo?

SourceText:
Try to do something to reward yourself every day.

You can use these skills at home and find them anytime in your @global.parent_centre!

Ungawasebenzisa ekhaya la makhono futhi uwathole noma nini ku @global.parent_centre yakho!

SourceText: RELAX

text: Yeqa inhlolovo yokuhlela

SourceText:
Whenever you can, relax, recognise and reward yourself. 

Care for yourself every day. You matter!
text:
Noma nini lapho ungakwazi, phumula, bona bese uyazivuza. 

Zinakekele nsuku zonke. Ubalulekile!

text: Umsebenzi wokuphumula

SourceText: Every time you relax, recognise something you've done well or reward yourself, tap the @global.parent_points to celebrate your success!
text: Ngaso sonke isikhathi uma uphumula, bona okuthile okwenze kahle noma uzivuze, chofa i-@global.parent_points ukuze ujabulele impumelelo yakho!
note: The string @global.parent_points should not be translated.

SourceText:
You've completed this week's workshop.

We’ll do some of the self-care activities again when you get together with your group for the first time - you all deserve some extra self-care!
text:
Usukuqedile ukuqeqeshwa kwaleli viki.

Sizokwenza eminye futhi imisebenzi yokuzinakekela uma uhlangana neqembu lakho okokuqala - nonke nifanelwe ukuzinakekela okwengeziwe!

SourceText: We care about you, and how life is treating you.
text: Sinendaba nawe, nokuthi impilo ikuphethe kanjani.

SourceText: You are a star. And you are making a real difference. Be proud of yourself.
text: Uyiqhawe. Wenza umehluko wangempela. Ziqhenye ngawe ngokwakho.

SourceText: Sorry that things are not easy today. All parents have these days.
text: Ngiyaxolisa ngokuthi isimo sinzima namuhla. Bonke abazali bayabhekana nalokhu.

SourceText: Close your eyes, breathe in, and know that everything you have done is so important.
text: Vala amehlo, donsa umoya, wazi ukuthi konke okwenzile kubalulekile.

SourceText:
Every family faces challenges, but when we work together we can deal with problems in an effective and peaceful way. 

What a great skill for your teen to learn too!
text:
Yonke imindeni iyabhekana nezinkinga, kodwa uma sisebenza ndawonye singakwazi ukubhekana nezinkinga ngendlela ephumelelayo nenokuthula. 

Leli ikhono elihle ukuthi ingane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba ilifunde!

SourceText:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is problem solving. 

We all know that in life there are times where we face problems, and we all know in a way that when we find ourselves in these situations, it is difficult to think of immediate positive solutions. 

Therefore, it is important that when we are facing problems we take a pause, we breathe, keep calm and think of problem-solving skills that we may use. 

Remember to include our teenagers when we are solving problems. This will help them to become responsible and learn how to solve their own problems in the future.
text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sikhuluma ngokuxazulula inkinga. 

Sonke siyazi ukuthi ekuphileni kunezikhathi lapho sibhekana khona nezinkinga, futhi sonke siyazi ukuthi uma sizithola sikulezi zimo, kuba nzima ukucabanga ngokushesha ngezixazululo ezinhle. 

Ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuthi uma sibhekane nezinkinga sime kancane, sidonse umoya, sizole bese sicabanga ngamakhono okuxazulula izinkinga esingawasebenzisa. 

Khumbula ukuhilela intsha yethu uma sixazulula izinkinga. Lokhu kuzoyisiza izimele futhi ifunde ukuxazulula izinkinga zayo esikhathini esizayo.

SourceText:

KNOW IT – SOLVE IT – TRY IT – TEST IT

SourceText: Let’s look at what happened to @global.w_solve_teen_girl and her @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 when @global.w_solve_teen_girl got a phone from a boy… a phone!
text: Ake sibheke okwenzeke ku @global.w_solve_teen_girl no @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 ngesikhathi @global.w_solve_teen_girl athole ucingo okuvela kumfana.... ucingo!

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “@global.w_solve_teen_girl, where did you get that thing?” 

@global.w_solve_teen_girl: “@global.w_solve_teen_boy_1 bought it for me. It’s a nice phone, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1. It takes great photos!"
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “@global.w_solve_teen_girl, uyithole kuphi leyo nto?” 

@global.w_solve_teen_girl: “@global.w_solve_teen_boy_1 uyitholele mina. Umakhalekhukhwini omuhle, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 . Ithatha izithombe ezinhle!”

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “I don’t want to see that expensive thing! That boy is no good! How does he think you are going to repay him for this?!”  

@global.w_solve_teen_girl: “That’s not how it works, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1! That’s not fair!”
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “Angifuni ukuyibona leya nto ebizayo! Lo mfana akalungile! Ucabanga ukuthi uzomkhokhela ngani ngalokhu?!” @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1:  

@global.w_solve_teen_girl: “Akuyona indlela okusebenza ngayo lokho, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1! Akubona ubulungisa lokho!”

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “I don’t want to hear it!” 

@global.w_solve_teen_girl: “You’re not even trying to listen to me! I don’t know why I even try with you!”
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “Angifuni ukukuzwa lokho!” 

@global.w_solve_teen_girl: “Awuzami ngisho nokungilalela! Angazi nokuthi kungani ngikuzama nawe!”

SourceText:
With teenagers – and in life – unexpected problems come up. 

Here are 4 problem-solving steps to do together.
text:
Kanye nentsha - nasempilweni - izinkinga ezingalindelekile ziyaqubuka. 

Nazi izinyathelo ezingu-4 zokuxazulula izinkinga ndawonye.

SourceText: Take a few deep breaths to calm down, and
text: Donsa umoya izikhathi ezimbalwa ukuze uzole, bese

SourceText: KNOW IT
text: YAZI

SourceText: Identify the problem.
text: Ibone inkinga.

SourceText: SOLVE IT
text: IXAZULULE

SourceText: Think of possible solutions and what would happen if we used them.
text: Cabanga ngezixazululo ezikhona nokuthi kungenzekani uma uzisebenzisa.

SourceText: TRY IT
text: KUZAME

SourceText: Choose a solution and try it out.
text: Khetha isixazululo bese uyasizama.

SourceText: TEST IT
text: SIHLOLE

SourceText: Did it work? Great! If it did not work, then try another solution.
text: Ingabe sisebenzile? Kuhle! Uma singasebenzanga, zama esinye isixazululo.

SourceText: Let’s see how problem solving works in practice.
text: Ake sibone ukuthi ukuxazulula inkinga kusebenza kanjani ngokuprakthiza.

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 is coming home from work. 

@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 (thinking): "Ay my poor feet! I need to sit down a moment and drink a cup of coffee before I start preparing food for everyone."
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 ubuya ekhaya evela emsebenzini. 

@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 (uyacabanga): “Awu izinyawo zami bandla! Ngidinga ukuhlala phansi isikhashana ngiphuze ikhofi ngaphambi kokuthi ngilungisele wonke umuntu ukudla.”

SourceText: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2! What are you doing? That bread is for dinner! Now there won’t be enough for us all!"
text: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2! Wenzani? Lesi sinkwa sizodliwa kusihlwa! Manje angeke sisasenela sonke!”

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Sorry, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2, I was just hungry. I can explain, you see, there is this guy at school...” 

@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 (thinking): “Take a Pause… just breathe…”
text:
@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Ngiyaxolisa, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2, bengilambile. Ngingachaza, uyabona, kunalo mfana esikoleni....” 

@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 (uyacabanga): “Thatha Ikhefana... udonse umoya...”

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Just give me a moment. I am tired and now worried about having enough food for dinner.” 

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “I am sorry, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Ngiphe umzuzwana. Ngikhathele futhi manje sengikhathazekile ngokuthi ukudla kwakusihlwa angeke kusenele.” 

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Ngiyaxolisa, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"

SourceText: Step 1: KNOW IT
text: Isinyathelo 1: YAZI

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Now tell me, why are you so hungry? Did you not eat your lunch at school?” 

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "That is the problem. There’s a guy at school who bullies me. He says if I do not give my lunch to him every day, he and his friends will hurt me. He makes me so mad!"
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Ake ungitshele, kungani ulambe kangaka? Ingabe awuwudlanga umphako wakho esikolweni?” 

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Ileyo inkinga. Kukhona umfana esikoleni ongiqhwagayo. Uthi uma ngingamniki umphako wami nsuku zonke, yena nabangane bakhe bazongilimaza. Uyangicasula!”

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "I am sorry to hear that but am glad that you told me, @global.w_solve_teen_boy_2. It doesn’t mean that you can eat everybody’s dinner. After we speak, you need to go to the shop to buy some more bread. But first: What do you think we should do about the bully problem?"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "Well… I want to just hit him or get him back."
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Ngiyaxolisa ukuzwa lokho kodwa ngiyajabula ngokuthi ungitshele, @global.w_solve_teen_boy_2. Akusho ukuthi kumelwe udle ukudla kwawo wonke umuntu kwakusihlwa. Uma siqeda ukukhuluma, kumelwe uye esitolo uyothenga esinye isikwa. Kodwa okokuqala: Ucabanga ukuthi kumelwe senzeni ngale nkinga yokuqhwagwa?”

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Empeleni.... Ngifuna ukumshaya nje kwaphela noma ngiziphindiselele.”

SourceText: Step 2: SOLVE IT
text: Isinyathelo 2: IXAZULULE

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Hmmm… what do you think will happen to you if you do that?"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "I don’t know. He is bigger than me so he will probably hurt me more. And I could get into trouble at school and expelled."
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Hmmm... ucabanga ukuthi kuzokwenzakani kuwe uma wenza kanjalo?”

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Angazi. Mkhulu kakhulu kunami kungenzeka angilimaze kakhulu. Futhi kungenzeka ngingene enkingeni esikoleni bese ngixoshwa.”

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Yes, that could happen. What could we do instead?"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "I guess I could tell the teacher. But then the other kids will call me a tattletale. Maybe you could talk to the teacher?"
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Kunjalo, lokho kungenzeka. Yini esingayenza esikhundleni salokho?”

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Ngicabanga ukuthi ngingatshela uthisha. Kodwa ezinye izingane zizongibiza ngesiyoyoyo. Mhlawumbe ungakhuluma nothisha?”

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "That sounds like a better idea. I could also have a word with his parents if you want me to."

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "Sure. If you think that would help too. Thanks, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Kuzwakala kuyicebo elihle lelo. Ngingabuye ngikhulume nabazali bakhe uma ufuna ngenze kanjalo.”

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Kulungile. Uma ucabanga ukuthi nalokho futhi kuzosiza. Ngiyabonga, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Anything for you, my dear. I will do it first thing after dinner. And you know? If that doesn’t work, we can always try something else together."

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "Thanks, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Ngingakwenzela noma ngabe yini, sthandwa sami. Ngizokwenza kanjalo into yokuqala ngemva kwedina. Futhi, uyazi? Uma lokho kungasebenzi, singabuye sizame okunye sobabili.”

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: Ngiyabonga, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"

SourceText: Step 3: TRY IT
text: Isinyathelo 3: KUZAME

SourceText: Step 4: TEST IT
text: Isinyathelo 4: SIHLOLE

SourceText:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "I am sorry to hear that, @global.w_solve_teen_boy_2. Shall I ask your uncle to go talk to his parents? If that does not work, we will try something else!"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "Yes, thank you @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2. At least I know you are on my side."
text:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Ngiyaxolisa ngokuzwa lokho, @global.w_solve_teen_boy_2. Ngingakhuluma yini nomalume wakho ahambe ayokhuluma nabazali bakhe? Uma kungasebenzi lokho, sizozama okunye!”

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Yebo, ngiyabonga @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2. Okungenani ngiyazi ukuthi usohlangothini lwami.”

SourceText:
Discuss together: 

How could @global.w_solve_teen_girl and @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 use the 4 steps of problem solving, like @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 and @global.w_solve_teen_boy_2 did? 

KNOW IT - SOLVE IT - TRY IT - TEST IT
text:
Xoxani ndawonye: 

U @global.w_solve_teen_girl no @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 bebangazisebenzisa kanjani izinyathelo ezingu-4 zokuxazulula inkinga, njengo @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 no @global.w_solve_teen_boy_2 abenze ngayo? 

ZAZI - ZIXAZULULE - ZIZAME - ZIHLOLE

KNOW IT - SOLVE IT - TRY IT - TEST IT

ZAZI - ZIXAZULULE - ZIZAME - ZIHLOLE

SourceText: Let’s go back to @global.w_solve_teen_girl and her @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 and see what solutions they came up with.
text: Ake sibuyele ku@global.w_solve_teen_girl no @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 wakhe bese sibona ukuthi iziphi izixazululo esingaqhamuka nazo.

SourceText: @global.w_solve_teen_girl and her @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 came up with three solutions.
text: @global.w_solve_teen_girl no @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 bona beze nezixazululo ezintathu.

SourceText:
Parenting teens is really hard. 

Often there are no simple and easy solutions, but now @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 learned she can talk to her daughter about these things. 

Before, she worried alone, now they can come up with solutions together!
text:
Ukukhulisa intsha kunzima ngempela. 

Ngokuvamile azikho izixazulula ezilula, kodwa manje @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 ufunde ukuthi angakwazi ukukhuluma nendodakazi yakhe ngalezi zinto. 

Ngaphambili, ubekhathazeka yedwa, njengamanje beza nezixazululo bobabili!
note: The string @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: Ground @global.w_solve_teen_girl for a month
text: Ujeziswa @global.w_solve_teen_girl inyanga
note: The string @global.w_solve_teen_girl should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “You can’t go out for the next month”
text: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “Angeke uphume ngenyanga ezayo”
note: The string @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: That didn’t work... Let's try something else.
text: Lokhu akusebenzanga... Ake sizama okunye.

SourceText: Return the phone and save up
text: Buyisela ifoni wonge imali

SourceText: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: "I am not trying to accuse your friend or be jealous. I am worried that when someone gives a gift it is hard to say 'no' when they ask something in return – like sex. If you want to have a phone, we’ll save up together so you can make your own decisions without owing him anything."
text: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “Angizami ukusola umngane wakho noma ukuba nomona. Ngikhathazwa ukuthi uma umuntu ekupha isipho kunzima ukuthi ‘cha’ uma becela ukuthi ubenzela okuthile njengembuyiselo - njengokuya nawe ocansini. Uma ufuna ukuba nefoni, sizokonga imali sobabili ukuze uzokwazi ukwenza isinqumo sakho ngaphandle kokumkweleta okuthile.”
note: The string @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: This is great! Try the third option as well.
text: Kuhle lokhu! Zama indlela yesithathu futhi.

SourceText: Learn about safe sex
text: Funda ngocansi

SourceText: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “This makes me realise we should talk about boyfriends and protecting yourself. Many teens your age get pregnant or become HIV positive. Let’s go to the clinic so you can talk with the nurse to learn how you can stay safe.”
text: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: “Lokhu kungenza ukuba ngibone ukuthi kumelwe sikhulume ngamasoka nokuzivikela. Intsha eningi elingana nawe iyakhulelwa noma ingenwe yi-HIV. Ake siye emtholampilo ukuze ukhulume nomhlengikazi akwazise ukuthi ungahlala kanjani uphephile.”
note: The string @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: This is great!
text: Kuhle lokhu!

SourceText: Let's practice problem-solving!
text: Ake sizame ukuxazulula inkinga!

SourceText:
Practice together on a problem you have now. One of you is the parent and one the teen. 

Praise and encourage each other – we are proud of you! 

Remember the steps: 
KNOW IT - SOLVE IT - TRY IT - TEST IT
text:
Prakthizani ndawonye ukuxazulula inkinga eninayo njengamanje. Oyedwa wenu ungumzali kuthi oyedwa ebe osemusha. 

Ncomanani futhi nikhuthazane - siyaziqhenya ngawe! 

Khumbula izinyathelo: 
ZAZI - ZIXAZULULE - ZIZAME - ZIHLOLE

SourceText:
Teach your teenagers the four steps of problem-solving:
KNOW IT - SOLVE IT - TRY IT - TEST IT 

Use these steps together when a problem comes up!

When something bad happens, we often get upset and blame. But what our teens really need is someone to help find solutions together. Listen to them, accept how they see and feel things, and thank them for trusting you.

Teaching your teen how to deal with problems will help them for the rest of their lives. What a gift!
text:
Fundisa intsha yakho izinyathelo ezine zokuxazulula inkinga:
ZAZI - ZIXAZULULE - ZIZAME - ZIHLOLE 

Sebenzisani lezi zinyathelo ndawonye uma kuqubuka inkinga!

Uma kwenzeka okuthile okubi, ngokuvamile siphatheka kabi bese siyagxeka. Kodwa okudingwa intsha yethu othile ongasiza kutholakale izixazululo ndawonye. Balalele, yamukela indlela ababona nabazizwa ngayo, futhi ubabonge ngokukuthemba.

Ukufundisa ingane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba indlela yokuxazulula izinkinga kuyoyizuzisa ukuphila kwayo konke. Yeka isipho esihle kangaka!

SourceText: Some problems other parents solved with their teens:
text: Ezinye izinkinga abazali abazixazulula nentsha yabo:

SourceText:
* My teenager does not want to go to school
* I am worried my teenager will get pregnant or will get someone pregnant
* I am worried about what my teen does online
* My teenager is hanging out with bad friends
* My teenager is lazy
* My teenager is not doing their school work
* My teenager might be using drugs
text:
* Ingane yami eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ayifuni ukuya esikoleni
* Ngikhathazeke ngokuthi ingane yami eseminyakeni yokuthomba ingakhulelwa noma ikhulelise othile 
* Ngikhathazwa yilokho ingane yami eseminyakeni yokuthomba ekwenza ku-inthanethi 
* Ingane yami eseminyakeni yokuthomba ichitha isikhathi nabangane ababi 
* Ingane yami eseminyakeni yokuthomba iyavilapha 
* Ingane yami eseminyakeni yokuthomba ayiwenzi umsebenzi wesikole 
* Kungenzeka ingane yami eseminyakeni yokuthomba isebenzisa izidakamizwa

SourceText: Looking after yourself matters.
text: Kubalulekile ukuzinakekela.

SourceText: Great! So good to hear that you are in a good space today. What a wonderful feeling!
text: Kuhle! Kuhle uzwa ukuthi kuhamba kahle namuhla. Umuzwa umuhle lowo!

SourceText: Sometimes things go great. Sometimes they don't. And sometimes we don't quite know what to think... and that's totally okay! Remember that you are not alone.
text: Ngezinye izikhathi izinto zihamba kahle. Ngezinye izikhathi azihlambi kahle. Futhi ngezinye izikhathi asazi ukuthi sicabange ini.... kulungile lokho! Khumbula ukuthi awuwedwa.

SourceText: This is fantastic, especially in such difficult times as this. You are a star.
text: Kuhle kakhulu lokho, ikakhulu ezikhathini ezinzima njengalezi. Uyiqhawe.

SourceText: We know how stressful it is to bring up teenagers in these times. Learning to manage your stress helps you - and your family.
text: Siyazi ukuthi kukhathaza kangakanani ukukhulisa intsha kulezi zinsuku. Ukufunda ukulawula ukucindezeleka kusiza wena - nomndeni wakho.

SourceText:
Greetings everyone. 

Today's topic is managing stress. 

It is important to know how to manage our stress. At times our children can behave in ways that makes us feel stressed and us as parents can make our children feel stressed too. 

So, it is important to notice when we feel stressed and take a pause and breathe. That will help you manage your stress.
text:
Sanibonani nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sikhuluma ngokulawula ukucindezeleka. 

Kubalulekile ukukwazi ukulawula ukucindezeleka kwethu. Ngezinye izikhathi zingane zethu zingaziphatha ngendlela eyenza sicindezeleke futhi nathi njengabazali singenza izingane zethu zicindezeleke. 

Ngakho-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela lapho sizizwa sicindezelekile bese siyema kancane sidonse umoya. Lokho kuzokusiza ukuthi ulawule ukucindezeleka kwakho.

SourceText: Today you will explore:
text: Namuhla uzohlola:

SourceText:
* Story & discussion – that didn’t work…
* Story & discussion – that worked!
* Safety Amnesty story & discussion – that worked!
* Tools: How to manage stress
BREATHE - SHARE - SHOW
* Home practice suggestions
text:
* Indatshana kanye nengxoxo – okungasebenzanga ...

SourceText: Let’s look at an example of how stress can sometimes just get too much, for all of us:
text: Ake sibheke isibonelo sendlela ukucindezeleka okungaba mandla ngayo ngezinye izikhathi, kithi sonke:

SourceText:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Can I have money to buy some airtime?”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “Leave me alone and mind your own business!”
text:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Ngicela imali yokuthenga i-airtime.”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “Ngiyeke phansi unake izindaba zakho!”

SourceText:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “What did I do? You never listen!”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “I said leave me alone or you will get a beating!”
text:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Ngenzeni? Awukaze ungilalele!”   

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “Ngithe ngiyeke uma kungenjalo ngizokushaya!”

SourceText: @global.w_stress_girl: “Look! I have made a house!”
text: @global.w_stress_girl: “Bheka! Ngakhe indlu!”
note: The string @global.w_stress_girl should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Who cares about your stupid house!”
text: @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Ubani onendaba nendlu yakho embi!”
note: The string @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: Thank you for thinking along! Let’s go back in time and see what @global.w_stress_male_caregiver does now:
text: Siyabonga ngokuthi nicabanga kanye nathi! Ake sibuyele emuva sibone lokho @global.w_stress_male_caregiver akwenzayo njengamanje:
note: The string @global.w_stress_male_caregiver should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.w_stress_male_caregiver lost his job. He was sitting at home feeling frustrated and stressed, when @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 entered.
text: @global.w_stress_male_caregiver ulahlekelwe umsebenzi. Ubehlezi ekhaya ekhungathekile futhi ecindezelekile, ngesikhathi @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 engena.

SourceText:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Can I have money to buy some airtime?”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver (taking a breath): “I’m sorry son. I had a difficult day today. The boss fired me.”
text:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Ngicela imali yokuthenga i-airtime.”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver (udonsa umoya): “Ngiyaxolisa ndodana. Ngibe losuku okunzima namuhla. Umphathi ungixoshile emsebenzini.”

SourceText:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Oh no!  I need a new school uniform.”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “I’ll try, son, And your @global.w_stress_female_caregiver’s job will help us get by while I look for another job.”
text:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Habe!  Ngidinga umfaniswano wesikole.”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “Ngizozama ndodana, umsebenzi ka @global.w_stress_female_caregiver wakho uzosisiza uma ngisafuna omunye umsebenzi.”

SourceText:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “I can help out with looking for work, too, @global.w_stress_male_caregiver?”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “No it’s okay, @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1. I appreciate your offer. The most important thing is that you work hard at school. Thanks for listening to me.”
text:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Ngingakusiza nami ukufuna umsebenzi, @global.w_stress_male_caregiver?”  

@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: Cha, kulungile! @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1. Ngiyalubonga usiza lwakho. Into ebaluleke ukuzedlula zonke ukuthi usebenze kanzima esikoleni. Ngiyabonga ngokuthi ungilalele.”

SourceText:
@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “Let’s play some soccer together. It will help me get this stress off my mind for a bit.”  

@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Okay, @global.w_stress_male_caregiver!”
text:
@global.w_stress_male_caregiver: “Ake sidlale ibhola lezinyawo ndawonye. Kuzongisiza ngisuse ukucindezeleka kancane engqondweni yami.”  

@global.w_stress_teen_boy_1: “Kulungile, @global.w_stress_male_caregiver!”

SourceText:
That went so much better! 

Taking a pause helps to respond calmly when you feel angry or stressed. Try it, you will see!
text:
Lokhu kuhambe kangcono kakhulu! 

Ukuthatha ikhefu kusiza siphendule ngokuzolile uma uzizwa ucasukile noma ukhathazekile. Kuzame, uzobona!

SourceText: Safety Amnesty
text: Ukuphepha Kukashwele

SourceText:
Think back to when you were a teenager. 

Was there ever a time when you were in danger but you couldn’t tell your family because they would have been angry?

This ALMOST happened to @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2 and @global.w_stress_teen_girl! Let’s have a look:
text:
Cabanga ngesikhathi usesemusha. 

Ingabe kwake kwaba nesikhathi lapho waba sengozini kodwa ungakwazi ukutshela umndeni wakho ngoba usaba ukuthi uzokucasukela?

Lokho CISHE kwenzeka ku @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2 no @global.w_stress_teen_girl! Ake sibone:

SourceText:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_2: "Don’t tell the adults, but I’m going to bar with my friends tonight" 

@global.w_stress_teen_girl: "Have fun! I’ve told them I’m staying with my girlfriend, but I’m actually going to a cool party"
text:
@global.w_stress_teen_boy_2: “Ungabatsheli abantu abadala, kodwa ngiya etshwaleni nabangane bami namuhla kusihlwa” 

@global.w_stress_teen_girl: “Ube nesikhathi esimnandi! Ngibatshele ukuthi ngiya kumngane wami wentombazane, kodwa empeleni ngiya ephathini emnandi”

SourceText: @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2: "I think they are dealing drugs. We could all get arrested. But I can’t tell my parents – they’ll be so angry"
text: @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2: “Ngicabanga ukuthi bathengisa izidakamizwa. Sonke singaboshwa. Kodwa angikwazi ukutshela abazali bami - bazothukuthela kakhulu”
note: The string @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2 should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.w_stress_teen_girl: "I’m scared. Everyone is too drunk to drive me home. This boy says he’ll take me but he wants us to go to his house first. I can’t tell my parents – I lied about coming to this party."
text: @global.w_stress_teen_girl: “Ngethukile kakhulu. Wonke umuntu udakiwe ukuba angashayela angihambise ekhaya. Lo mfana uthi angangihambisa kodwa uthi ufuna sidlule kubo kuqala. Angakwazi ukutshela abazali bami - ngiqambe amanga ngokuthi ngiya ephathini.”
note: The string @global.w_stress_teen_girl should not be translated.

SourceText:
These are dangerous situations! Thankfully, @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2 and @global.w_stress_teen_girl then remembered what @global.w_stress_parent told them:  

"I care about your safety more than anything. If you are ever upset, or scared, you can always call me for help, or tell me about it. 

Just say 'SAFETY AMNESTY'. I promise that I will try my best to help and I won’t be angry – even if you are doing something you shouldn't."
text:
Lezi yizimo eziyingozi! Ngenhlanhla, @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2 u @global.w_stress_teen_girl bakhumbulile ukuthi @global.w_stress_parent ubatsheleni:  

“Nginendaba nokuphepha kwakho ukudlula noma yini enye. Uma uthukuthele, noma uthukile, ungangishayela ucingo noma nini uma ufuna usizo noma ufuna ukukhuluma. 

Mane uthi ‘USHWELE WEZOKUPHEPHA’. Ngiyathembisa ukuthi ngizozama okusemandleni ukusiza futhi angeke ngithukuthele - ngisho noma wenze okuthile ebekungakafaneli ukwenze.”

SourceText: @global.w_stress_teen_girl: "@global.w_stress_parent, it’s a safety amnesty. Can you come and pick me up? I really need a lift home."
text: @global.w_stress_teen_girl: "@global.w_stress_parent, ushwele wezokuphepha. Ngicela uze uzongilanda? Ngidinga ukuhanjiswa ekhaya.”

SourceText: @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2: "@global.w_stress_parent, safety amnesty. I think my friends are in trouble. I don’t want to stop being their friend, but I’m worried. Can we talk?"
text: @global.w_stress_teen_boy_2: "@global.w_stress_parent, ushwele wezokuphepha. Ngicabanga ukuthi abangane bami basenkingeni. Angifuni ukuyeka ukuba umngane wabo, kodwa ngikhathazekile ngabo. Singakhuluma?”

SourceText: BREATHE. Slowly. Pause.
text: DONSA UMOYA. Kancane. Yima.

SourceText: Before you say anything, slowly breathe in and out five times. It will calm you, and give you a chance to think.
text: Ngaphambi kokuthi usho okuthile, kancane donsa uphinde ukhiphe umoya izikhathi ezinhlanu. Kuzokwenza wehlise umoya, kukunikele nethuba lokucabanga.

SourceText: SHARE how you feel
text: KHULUMA ngendlela ozizwa ngayo

SourceText: This is hard. Many of us were told not to cry, or show our feelings to our children. But take a deep breath and calmly tell them how you feel. They will understand better, and also learn from you how to deal with stress.
text: Kunzima lokho. Iningi lethu latshelwa ukuthi lingakhali, noma libonise imizwa ezinganeni. Kodwa donsa umoya bese ngomoya ophansi ubatshele indlela ozizwa ngayo. Bazokuqonda kangcono, futhi bafundi kuwe ukubhekana nokucindezeleka.

SourceText: SHOW them you care
text: BABONISE ukuthi uyabakhathalela

SourceText: This is also hard! Stress makes us focus on ourselves. But our teens need our support. Ask them how they feel. Listen to them and comfort them. Try a hug or say ‘I understand’. It can change everything.
text: Nalokhu kunzima! Ukucindezeleka kusenza sicabange ngathi kuphela. Kodwa intsha yethu idinga ukuthi siyisekele. Ibuze ukuthi izizwa kanjani. Balalele futhi ubaduduze. Zama ukubanga noma ubatshele ukuthi ‘Ngiyaqonda’. Kungashintsha yonke into.

SourceText: SEEK the positive
text: BHEKA okuhle

SourceText: Can you and your teen think about ideas that might help? Can you do something positive together to take your mind off the stress?
text: Ungakwazi yini ukuthi wena kanye nengane yakho eseyintsha nicabange ngamacebiso angakusiza? Ningakwazi yini ukwenza okuthile okuhle ndawonye okususa ingqondo yakho ekucindezelekeni?

SourceText: If all else fails, breathe. You can do this.
text: Uma konke kungaphumeleli, phefumula. Ungakwazi ukukwenza lokhu.

SourceText: There are two home practices for this week.
text: Kunokubili ongakuprakthiza ekhaya kuleli viki.

SourceText:
Whenever you are feeling stressed or upset: take five breaths in and out before you react. 

And when you're both calm, share with your teen how you feel.
text:
Uma uzizwa ucindezelekile noma uthukuthele: donsa umoya uphinde uwukhiphe kahlanu ngaphambi kokuba uthathe isinyathelo. 

Uma nobabili seniwehlisile umoya, khuluma nentsha yakho ngendlela ozizwa ngayo.

SourceText: Discuss "safety amnesty" with your teenager, and think of a situation together when you could use this.
text: Xoxani “ngoshwele wezokuphepha” nengane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba, bese nicabange ngesimo lapho ningakusebenzisa khona lokhu.

SourceText: Welcome to @global.parent_app
text: Siyakwamukela ku @global.parent_app
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText:
Welcome to @global.parent_app.

You deserve to feel good, and have happier family relationships.

@global.parent_app will support you and your family in three ways:
text:
Siyakwamukela ku @global.parent_app.

Ufanelwe ukuzizwa ujabule, nokuba nobuhlobo obujabulisayo bomndeni.

@global.parent_app izokusekela wena nomndeni wakho ngezindlela ezintathu:

SourceText:
This big button takes you to your @global.weekly_workshops

Once per week a new workshop will be ready for you - every time focusing on a different a parenting skill. Press it to start your first workshop!
text:
Le nkinobho enkulu izokuyisa ku @global.weekly_workshops

Kanye ngeviki ukuqeqeshwa okusha kuzokwenziwa kutholakalele wena - ngaso sonke isikhathi kuzogxila ekhonweni elihlukile lokuba umzali. Kuchofoze ukuze uqale ukuqeqeshwa kwakho kokuqala!
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.weekly_workshops quick start
text: @global.weekly_workshops ukukuqala ngokushesha
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: The round button appears when a new @global.weekly_workshop is ready for you to do.
text: Inkinobho eyindilinga ivela uma @global.weekly_workshop okusha sekutholakala kuwe.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop should not be translated.

SourceText:
Press this big button to get you to your @global.parent_points screen.

Track your success in self-care and parenting.

See your progress.

Celebrate your daily achievements!
text:
Cindezela inkinobho enkulu ukuze ubuyele @global.parent_points esikrinini sakho.

Bona impumelelo yakho yokuzinakekela nokuba umzali.

Bona intuthuko yakho.

Jabulela okufinyelelayo nsuku zonke!
note: The string @global.parent_points should not be translated.

SourceText:
This button takes you to the @global.parent_centre

Stacked with the resources you need whenever you want.

Instant access to help sections with @global.essential_tools for each skill.

Extra information and local resources.
text:
Lena nkinobho izokuyisa ku @global.parent_centre

Thola izinsiza ozidingayo noma inini uma uzidinga.

Ukutholakala ngokushesha kwengxenye yosizo ne @global.essential_tools ekhonweni ngalinye.

Ukwaziswa okwengeziwe kanye nezinsiza ezikhona endaweni.

SourceText: However you start, just the fact you are here shows you care.
text: Akunandaba ukuthi uqala kanjani, iqiniso lokuthi ulapha libonisa ukuthi uyakhathalela.

SourceText: Go to the @global.weekly_workshops
text: Iya ku @global.weekly_workshops
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Press this button on the home screen to go to the @global.weekly_workshops
text: Cindezela inkinobho esekhasini lokuqala ukuze uye ku @global.weekly_workshops
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Go to the @global.weekly_workshop_options
text: Iya ku @global.weekly_workshop_options
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop_options should not be translated.

SourceText: Press this button to go to the @global.weekly_workshop_options
text: Cindezela le inkinobho ukuze uye ku @global.weekly_workshop_options
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop_options should not be translated.

SourceText: Use the @global.weekly_workshop_options to change your workshop settings.
text: Sebenzisa i @global.weekly_workshop_options ukuze ushintshe izinhlelo zokuqeqeshwa kwakho.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop_options should not be translated.

SourceText: You can change your name here.
text: Ungashintsha igama lakho lapha.

SourceText:
This shows the day of the week that your new @global.weekly_workshop becomes available.

If you want to change it, just press it.
text:
Lokhu kubonisa usuku evikini lapho @global.weekly_workshop kwakho okusha okuzotholakala ngalo.

Uma ufuna ukuyishintsha, vele uyicindezele.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop should not be translated.

SourceText: This shows the @global.weekly_workshop that you're currently on.
text: Lokhu kubonisa @global.weekly_workshop okuyo njengamanje.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop should not be translated.

SourceText: You can change here whether you want to do your @global.weekly_workshops as a group or by yourself.
text: Ungakushintsha lapha uma ufuna ukwenza @global.weekly_workshops yakho njengeqembu noma uwedwa.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Tap here to change your group name.
text: Chofoza lapha uma ufuna ukushintsha igama leqembu lakho.

SourceText: That’s wonderful! Well done for spending time together. It lays the foundation for a great relationship with your teen!
text: Kuhle kakhulu lokho! Nisebenzile ngokuchitha isikhathi ndawonye. Kwenza isisekelo sokuba nobuhlobo obuhle n.ntsha yakho!

SourceText: Good for you! One-on-one time shows your teens they are important to you. It really makes a difference!
text: Kuhle lokho! Ukuchitha isikhathi nobabili kubonisa intsha yakho ukuba ibalulekile kuwe. Kwenza umehluko ngempela!

SourceText: Wonderful! Spending time with your teen may make your teen more willing to help out more often. You are doing great!
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ukuchitha isikhathi nentsha yakho kungenza intsha yakho izimisele ukusiza kakhudlwana. Wenza kahle kakhulu!

SourceText: Well done! One-on-one time with your teen gives you a chance to learn more about your teen’s interests and abilities. You are a star!
text: Wenze kahle! Ukuchitha isikhathi nentsha yakho kukunika ithuba lokufunda ngezinto ezithandwa yintsha yakho namakhono ayo. Uyiqhawe!

SourceText: Excellent job! Spending time together helps to build a strong and positive relationship between you and your teen.
text: Wenze umsebenzi omuhle! Ukuchitha isikhathi ndawonye kusiza kwakhe ubuhlobo obuqinile futhi obuhle phakathi kwakho nentsha yakho.

SourceText: Sometimes it will be easy and fun to spend time with your teens, and sometimes it will be more challenging. Spending time together will greatly improve your relationship; well done for trying!
text: Ngezinye isikhathi kuzokuba lula futhi kube mnandi ukuchitha isikhathi nentsha yakho, kodwa ngezinye izikhathi kuzoba yinselele. Ukuchitha isikhathi ndawonye kuzothuthukisa ubuhlobo benu; usebenzile ngokuzama!

SourceText: Sorry to hear that it was difficult for you to spend time with your teen. We all have challenges sometimes. Just be patient with yourself and your teen - things will get better. Well done for trying!
text: Siyaxolisa ukuzwa ukuthi bekunzima ukuchitha isikhathi nentsha yakho. Sonke sibhekana nezinselele ngezinye izikhathi. Yiba nesineke kuwe nakosemusha wakho - izinto zizoba ngcono. Wenze kahle ngokuzama!

SourceText: Great to hear it went well; you are a star!
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa ukuthi kuhambe kahle; uyiqhawe!

SourceText: Wonderful! You deserve all the happy times!
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ufanelwe yizo zonke izikhathi ezimnandi!

SourceText: Sorry that this was difficult for you. You are a star for trying!
text: Siyaxolisa ukuthi lokhu bekunzima kuwe. Uyiqhawe ngokuthi uzame!

SourceText: Amazing to hear it made you feel good! Keep up the great work. Your teen is learning so much from you!
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa ukuthi kukwenze wazizwa ujabule! Qhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi omuhle. Intsha yakho ifunda okuningi kuwe!

SourceText: Talking about how we feel can be difficult at first, but you and your teen will get used to it. Keep trying, and you will see the positive results!
text: Ukukhuluma indlela esizizwa ngayo kungaba nzima ekuqaleni, kodwa wena nentsha yakho nizokujwayela. Qhubeka uzama, uzobona imiphumela emihle!

SourceText: Great to hear it went well. Talking about your finances together really makes your family stronger!
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa ukuthi kuhambe kahle. Ukukhuluma ngezimali ndawonye kwenza umndeni usondelane ngempela!

SourceText: Sorry to hear it was difficult for you. Well done for trying!
text: Siyaxolisa ukuzwa ukuthi lokhu bekunzima kuwe. Wenze kahle ngokuzama!

SourceText: Great to hear it went well! Consistent rules help make our teens feel secure, and keep them safe!
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa ukuthi kuhambe kahle! Imithetho engaguquguquki yenza intsha izizwe iphephile, futhi kuyigcina iphephile!

SourceText: Sorry that this has been difficult. Creating rules together requires some practice but it's worth it!
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuthi lokhu bekunzima. Ukubeka imithetho ndawonye kudinga ukuprakthize kodwa kuwufanele umzamo!

SourceText: Great to hear it went well!
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa ukuthi kuhambe kahle!

SourceText: Sorry that this was difficult. Setting consequences together will make your teen want to follow the rules more often!
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuthi lokhu bekunzima. Ukubeka imiphumela ndawonye kuzokwenza ukuba intsha ufune ukulandela imithetho ngokwengeziwe!

SourceText: Sorry that this was hard. Sometimes we just have to keep trying. Find a time when you and your teen are calm and try again to talk through a problem using the four steps of problem-solving. Together, you can do so much!
text: Siyaxolisa ukuthi lokhu bekunzima. Ngezinye izikhathi kumelwe siqhubeke sizama. Thola isikhathi lapho wena nentsha yakho nizolile bese niyazama futhi ukukhuluma ngenkinga nisebenzisa izinyathelo ezine zokuxazula inkinga. Ndawonye, singenza okuningi!

SourceText: Great to hear it went well! Talking about risks and support options prevents problems and really helps to keep your teen safe.
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa ukuthi kuhambe kahle! Ukukhuluma ngezingozi nezindlela zokwesekwa ezikhona kuvimbela izinkinga futhi kusiza ngempela ekugcineni ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphephile.

SourceText: Sorry that this was hard. Mapping risks and places to get support can be challenging and emotional. It really does help to keep your teen safe!
text: Siyaxolisa ukuthi lokhu bekunzima. Ukubona izingozi kanye nezindawo ongathola kuzo ukwesekwa kungaba nzima futhi kuhlukumeze ngokomzwelo. Kuyasiza ngempela ukugcina ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili iphephile!

SourceText: Sorry that it didn’t go so well. This is not easy to do. Try to sit down and discuss it with your teen again. Also, is there someone your teen trusts who could join you in the discussion with your teen?
text: Siyaxolisa ukuthi akuhambanga kahle. Lokhu akulula ukukwenza. Phinde uzame ukuhlala phansi nixoxisane nentsha yakho futhi. Okunye, ingabe ukhona omunye umuntu intsha yakho emethembayo ongahlanganyela nawe engxoxweni yakho nengane yakho eseyintsha?

SourceText: Great to hear it went well! Getting consequences right helps teens behave better and makes family life calmer.
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa ukuthi kuhambe kahle! Ukuthola imiphumela emihle kusiza intsha ukuthi iziphathe kahle futhi kwenza umndeni ube nokuthula.

SourceText: Great to hear it went well! When your teen learns how to solve problems, they can use that skill their whole life. What a gift!
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa ukuthi kuhambe kahle! Lapho ingane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili ifunda ukuxazulula izinkinga, ingasebenzisa lelo khono ukuphila kwayo konke. Yeka isipho esihle kangaka!

SourceText: Welcome to ParentApp. Click here to start your journey!
text: Siyakwamukela kuParentApp. Chofoza lapha ukuze uqale uhambo lwakho!

SourceText: Hope you are feeling OK. Parenting is hard, but it’s never too late to start again with your teenager. Your first parenting workshop is ready for you! Click here to start your ParentApp journey!
text: Sithembe ukuthi uzizwa KAHLE. Ukuba umzali kunzima, kodwa akwephuzanga ukuthi uphinde uqale futhi nosemusha wakho. Sekuyatholakala ukuqeqeshwa kwakho kokuqala kokuba umzali! Chofoza lapha ukuze uqale uhambo lwakho ParentApp!

SourceText: Hi! Is everything OK? It seems you haven’t opened ParentApp lately. Why don’t you give it a try? Millions of parents have found these materials helpful. We are still here to support you.
text: Sawubona! Ingabe konke kuhamba KAHLE? Kubonakala sengathi muva nje awuyivulanga i-ParentApp. Kungani ungayizami? Izigidi zabazali zithole ewusizo la mathuluzi. Sisekhona lapha ukuba sikusekele.

SourceText: Hello again! It’s never too late to use ParentApp and get tailored parenting support. Why don’t you give it a try when you are commuting to work or when the food is cooking? Millions of parents found our materials helpful.
text: Sawubona futhi! Akukaze kwephuza ukuthi usebenzise i-ParentApp bese uthola ukusekelwa okuqhubekayo ekubeni umzali. Kungani ungakuzami lapho usendleleni eya emsebenzini noma uma upheka? Izigidi zabazali ziwathole ewusizo amathuluzi ethu.

SourceText: ParentApp misses you! There is a lot to explore. We are still here to support you.
text: I-ParentApp iyakukhumbula! Kuningi ongakuhlola. Sisekhona lapha ukuba sikusekele.

SourceText: Hope you are feeling OK. We know parenting is hard - use ParentApp to help you manage parenting stress.
text: Sithembe ukuthi uzizwa KAHLE. Siyazi ukuthi kunzima ukuba wumzali - sebenzisa i-app yabazali ukuze uzisize ukulawula ukucindezeleka.

SourceText: Hope you are feeling OK. We know parenting is hard - use ParentApp to prepare your teen for success in life.
text: Sithembe ukuthi uzizwa KAHLE. Siyazi ukuthi kunzima ukuba umzali - sebenzisa i-ParentApp ukuze ulungiselele intsha yakho ukuthi iphumelele empilweni.

SourceText: Hope you are feeling OK. We know parenting is hard - use ParentApp to help you manage your teen's behaviour.
text: Sithembe ukuthi uzizwa KAHLE. Siyazi ukuthi kunzima ukuba umzali - sebenzisa i-ParentApp ukuze ikusize ulawule indlela osemusha wakho aziphatha ngayo.

SourceText: New message from PLH
text: Umlayezo omusha ovela ku-PLH

SourceText: Hope you are feeling OK. We know parenting is hard - use ParentApp to bond with your teen again!
text: Sithembe ukuthi uzizwa KAHLE. Siyazi ukuthi kunzima ukuba umzali - sebenzisa i-ParentApp ukuze nizwane kakhulu nengane yakho eseminyakeni yokuthomba!
